column1: evam mayA Srutam
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ste / bcu gang zhe na / 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bskyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po @2a #// byang chub la 'khod do // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do // ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed cing; byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do //

column1: ekasmin samaye BagavAn SrAvastyAm viharati sma jetavane nATapiNxadasya ArAme mahA vyUhe
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing / byang chub sems @2b dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do // yid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do // ji ltar mthun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do // rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do // bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang @3a *// chub la 'khod do // kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o // kye rgyal ba'i sras / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod nas kyang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste / bcu gang zhe na / kye rgyal ba'i sras /

column1: jyotiH Dvajena ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ste / 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o //

column1: meru Dvajena ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la; 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtsva dang / gel pa dang / sdong po dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod ko lta ste / snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag 'tshal te / 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o // byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur te / ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te / 'di ni ngo mtshar @4a *// rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o //

column1: ratna Dvajena ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen po kun nas yog par 'gyur te / 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o //

column1: asaFga Dvajena ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba shin tu rgya chen po rnams / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste / 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o //

column1: kusuma Dvajena ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes mchog gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te / 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o //

column1: vimala Dvajena ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te / ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa @4b dang; dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te /

column1: sUryaDvajena ca
column2: te / 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o //

column1: rucira Dvajena ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing / ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te / 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o //

column1: viraja Dvajena ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams te; byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go /

column1: vErocana Dvajrena ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena ratna tejasA ca mahA tejasA ca jQAna vajra tejasA ca vimala tejasA ca Darma sUrya tejasA ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par mthong nas / snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te / bcu gang zhe na / 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa na 'thab mo dang / g-yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir / byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to // yid gnyis dang / the tshom du gyur pa'i mi dang / lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang / the tshom gcad pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to //

column1: puNya parvata tejasA ca jQAna avaBAsa tejasA ca
column2: bdud kyi sde @5a *// yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to // 'thab mo dang / g-yul la mos pa'i lha dang / mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang / kun nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to // byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to // sems can gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to // phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to // snying po byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to // nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis nyams smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa ston to // dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to // kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir / byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to //

column1: samantaSrI tejasA ca samanta praBa tejasA ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / don bcu po de dag gi dbang mngon pas na / byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to //

column1: samanta praBa SrI tejasA ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena DAraNI garBeNa ca gagana garBeNa ca padma garBeNa ca ratna garBeNa ca sUrya garBeNa ca guNa viSudDi garBeNa ca Darma samudra garBeNa ca vErocana garBeNa ca nABi garBeNa ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni / @5b byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste / bcu gang zhe na /

column1: padma SrI garBeNa ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena sunetreNa ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byams klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin / chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par bsags pa yin / chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin / sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang / dbyangs su ldan pa yin / byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyis brlabs pa yin / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin / skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin /

column1: viSudDa netreNa ca
column2: shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te / 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i @6a *//

column1: vimala netreNa ca
column2: stobs dang ldan pa yin / zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te / kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste / stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o // kye rgyal ba'i sras / de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcu bskor te / rnam pa bcu gang zhe na / 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la yo ba med cing / sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang; sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / @6b dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras / sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro // kye rgyal ba'i sras / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te / bcu gang zhe na / 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul ba dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / tshig gi dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud par byed pa ste / kye rgyal ba'i sras / chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @7a *// pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang /

column1: asaFga netreNa ca samanta darSana netreNa ca su vilokita netreNa ca avalokita netreNa ca utpala netreNa ca
column2: mngon par med par 'gyur bar 'gyur ro; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te / bcu gang zhe na / 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthus phyir mi ldog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang bsgyur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste / mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa @7b dang; kun 'byung zhing 'jigs pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de / dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te / 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te / mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o // kye rgyal ba'i sras; don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to //

column1: vajra netreNa ca ratna netreNa ca gagana netreNa ca
column2: kye rgyal ba'i sras / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste /

column1: samantanetreNa ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena deva mukuwena ca DarmaDAtu pratiBAsa maNi mukuwena ca boDimaNxa mukuwena ca diS vErocana mukuwena ca
column2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o // don tshad med pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o // mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o // sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te / thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par gyur nas kyang nan @8a *// tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras / de ci'i phyir zhe na / byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi / nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no // kye rgyal ba'i sras / de lta bas na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas / don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog /

column1: sarva budDa saMBUta garBa maNi mukuwena ca
column2: chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba / ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa /

column1: sarva loka DAtu udgata mukuwena ca samanta vErocana mukuwena ca
column2: 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba / 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa / chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa / 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di / rim gror byas te / mnyan par bya'o // blang bar bya'o // yongs su gzung bar bya'o // yongs su bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub @8b pa la brtson par bya'o // kye rgyal ba'i sras / de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g-yos par gyur to // 'jig rten gyi khams g-yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa / kye rgyal ba'i bu / legs so // legs so // ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag gzhol ba / ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa; 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba / 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa / @9a *// chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa / 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste / rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de /

column1: anaBiBUta mukuwena ca
column2: nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so // kye rgyal ba'i bu / khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir / nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te /

column1: sarva taTAgata siMhAsana saMpratizWita maNi mukuwena ca
column2: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so // gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa // gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras // gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa // dpe @9b zla med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos // gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa // gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang // gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa // de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya // gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang // gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po // gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba // 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya; ;gang rnams de dag bdud g-yo 'gro ba kun las brgal te thams cad dbang byed pa // 'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston // sems bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa // de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya // srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang // 'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas // de dag thar bar bya phyir @10a *// snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'god pa // de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyi rtse cig mnyan par byos // sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen // shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang // dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa // de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyi de dag nyon // gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skem pa // gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang // gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba // byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya // rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi // de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang // dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang go / sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos // gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar @10b po 'phel byed kyang // mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong mi 'gyur // 'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste // ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin // byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste // ze ba ye shes dri ni tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can // sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dga' byed pa // de dang de dag padmo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang // sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dang ni rtsa ba ste // sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga // bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste // chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs // rim gyis dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste // dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge / stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te // de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed // 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog @11a *// dgon nyon mongs mi bzad 'khyams gyur te // bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs gyur pa // lam ni rab stor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni // lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god // 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing // yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal rab 'bar ba // sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing // nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston // rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston pa // sdig pa spong la dge la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces // rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba // rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor // tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon // ye shes rno ba'i gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa // chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yin // 'khor lo mchog rnams @11b bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms // ye shes chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan // byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge / de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro // 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa // bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi sgul ba // gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur // de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltas // lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de // bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod rab brtan pa // de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las zlog par byed // byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu zhing ldog / thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog / tha dad yang dag shes dang @12a *// tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu yi char 'bebs pa // de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags // shes rab dga' dang khrel yod dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng // ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba yin // bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa // srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston // thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan // gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yin // ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra // srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god // tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes // 'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms shing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed // stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can padmo yongs su rgyas byed pa // de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun du 'byung // chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na @12b mdzes pa ste // nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan // sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par stan // de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'// chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan // ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni mig ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur gnas pa // lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis blta ba'i dbang po ste // chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin // srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po // byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos // srid pa gsum po kun du tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go 'byed pa // de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel // 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang // phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la // chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba // thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang //

column1: samanta Darma DAtu gagana pratiBAsa mukuwena ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena
column2: nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang @13a *// rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba // 'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa med pa ste // 'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa // de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra // de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa lhar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos // chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rje nyon mongs me ni rab tu sel // de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal // ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu // de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel // de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms // de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed // ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin // de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtse // phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas // de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim // de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag / gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla @13b res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed // ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal mtshan snyol // de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu 'phags // gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed // theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin // de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas // de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'// klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs // de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog au dum war mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon // dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrugs // mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud // de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can thams cad lam yang ston // de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro / de dang de dag zam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol // gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed // de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god // de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' brtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston // de @14a *// dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa // mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel // sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so // de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel // yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed // de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas // de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs // zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston // de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod yul shes // de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med // de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes // gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa // kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin // gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston // de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun du brjod par mi nus so // gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan @14b thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing // yod dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can // thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min // de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya // chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab rtogs nas // mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed // sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i // byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam pa med pa legs par grags // lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston // sems med yid med sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun du de dag ston // khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par rjod byed kyang // 'gro ba dag gis sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu rjod // nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te // brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston // de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes // 'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig @15a *// rten sna tshogs ston // de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed // 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas pa ji snyed pa // thams cad kun du skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med // rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste // mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing // me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams // thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing // mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas lus kyi 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun du ston // mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi // 'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed // chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing // blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med // 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin // sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston // sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston // 'gro ba thams cad la ni @15b 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med // 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba ston // la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston // la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams // la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston // mkhas pa rtogs med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston // la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba // la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su gyur // bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las ldog pa med //

column1: brahma indra cuxena ca
column2: de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur // de dag la lar lha yi bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod pa ston // la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur // la lar chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston // la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur // la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed // la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe yis dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston // de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur @16a *// te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur // la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston // la lar mngal zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor // la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob // la lar bud med tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung // la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs // la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol // la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang // byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma yin no // bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag / khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed // 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston // gsog pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston // gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na // 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong // @16b sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong // de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur // de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes // sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams // de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun du ston pa byed // bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed // dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas // 'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor ba byed // dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang // dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa'ang rab tu shes // de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes; ;sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te // sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin // ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed // de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag / sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub @17a *// mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgya // sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas // sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god // rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags // sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro / de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang // skra rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med // 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang // sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin par yang dmigs pa med // de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams // sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shing rab tu ston // nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams // ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin // de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams // 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi @17b yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin // la la gnyid log rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed // lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad; ;de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te // skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad mi 'gyur //

column1: nAga indra cUxena ca
column2: ri yi dbang po'i ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra // kun nas sgra yi sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g-yo ba med // de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag / rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston // dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu g-yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas // de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je skom rnams 'phel ba // de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g-yo ba'i rnams // shes pas rtog nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel // gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra // 'du shes thams cad smig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra // sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston // de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang @18a *// bsgyur dag ni de la gnas pa med // skye mched stong pa'i rang bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun du 'byin byed dang // khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston // dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston // de ltar de dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med // 'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi // nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du // rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu 'das pa yi // yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po med la gnas pa rab tu ston // skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston // 'dod dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed; ;sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston; ;gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin // khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun du 'gro ba thob gyur pa // mig @18b gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag / sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs pa med // sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun du mngon sum chos bzhed de // nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mi mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med // 'byung ba thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad // 'di yi gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa med // 'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g-yo ba'ang mi mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste // mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams pa med pa // thams cad mkhyen pa mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba // 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med brnyes pa // chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog / de dag yon tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya // de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par mi nus te // 'on kyang ji ltar sa la sa rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya // sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa @19a *// rnams // spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing // tshul khrims mi g-yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed // lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed // sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed // bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med // gzungs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal // bstan pa mtshungs med sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya // sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed // snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan // brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas // khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya // mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa // yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur // dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med @19b pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs // ye shes mchog dang de bzhin gshegs sprul sgrub cing byang chub zhi ba nye bar 'gro / mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byams klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu thob // zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa rnams // ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin // snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya // ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen // rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra // gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po; ;'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g-yo ba med // bsam pa shin tu shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin 'gyur bas // mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs ba'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis // 'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra // ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod // de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas // shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro @20a *// ba kun na thub pa med // byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas // sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o // rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul ba rnams la mkhas pas na // zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas //

column1: sarva budDa nirmANa pratiBAsa cUxena ca
column2: lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te // 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston // mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse // khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa med // mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan // sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan // de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge / de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed; ;dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston // rgyal ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu @20b gnas // bsam bdag cing g-yo rgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur // mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston // bag chags thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin // nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya // bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob // mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags // mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed // ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston // spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog / snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin // shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin; ;tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun bzhi byed sna yin te // spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa sna yin te // yin //

column1: boDimaNxa cUxena ca
column2: spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni sna yin te // yin // 'dug pa yin // tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo // gang gis de dag @21a *// snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul // sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings // sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang // bzod pa mi 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin; ;rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren // skyo ba med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang snyoms // don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos // ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste // 'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med // nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad // rgyal ba rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin // nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed // bdud rnams byin gyis brlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags // chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong // lha rnams @21b byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro / skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed // mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston // chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed // stong pa stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa skye zhing yang dag bskul ba byed // bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor // sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud // gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas // sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang // rnam pa kun du sems can mi gnas chos la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i // de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan te // de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse // zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te // lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la'ang ngal dub gang yang med // mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med // 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag / kun kyang ba @22a *// sbu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston // mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang // 'phel zhing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston // khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing // zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed // zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de // de 'dra'i rjes su dang ba zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do // 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang // gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od // mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed // 'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston // 'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa // sku mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod // srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thob dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur // rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur // gang yang ji snyed @22b 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston // gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston // khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed // 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god // 'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa // de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston // sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems // de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med // lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing // brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi yi rnams // gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la // sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston // 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams // thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston // 'du shes dra ba rnams bsgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba // bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang @23a *// chub spyod pa sten // de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston // de dag gang la 'jig rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag bya ba ston // ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed // de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug / lus ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso // tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan // chos kyi go 'phang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste //

column1: sarva praNiDAna sAgara nirGoza maNi rAja cUxena ca
column2: bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas // pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog / ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin // spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o // thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los bsgyur // stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o // shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin // 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te / @23b ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng // de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms // gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing; ;me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rnam par brgyan // stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin // thar pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse // de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ongs khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang // gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su mi skyo bar // ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god // kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed; ;zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang 'grang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la // bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de // skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi // sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so // gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang // gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro ba thar byas bde la dgod par 'dod pa dang // gang zhig bde bar @24a *// gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag / des ni rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo / sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste / bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o //// bam po brgyad cu drug pa; bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal / skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba'i nang /

column1: sarva taTAgata praBA maNxala pramuQcana maNi ratna nigarjita cUxena ca
column2: pho brang brtsegs pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang; chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags med rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal @24b mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / padmo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' padmo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig dang / rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / chags pa med pa'i mig dang / kun nas blta ba'i mig dang / shin tu rnam par blta ba'i mig dang / autpa la'i mig dang; rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros @25a *//

column1: sarva AkASa tala asaMBeda vijQapti maNi ratna viBUzita cUxena ca
column2: cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa med pa'i cod pan dang; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug phud dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad tha mi dad par rnam par dmigs pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug phud dang /

column1: sarva taTAgata vikurvita pratiBAsa Dvaja maNi rAja jAla saMCAdita cUxena ca
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan rin po che'i rgyal po dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug phud phud dang / dang /

column1: sarva taTAgata Darma cakra nirGoza cUxena ca sarvatri aDva nAma cakra nirGoza cUxena ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena mahA praBeNa ca vimala praBeNa ca vimala tejaH praBeNa ca ratna praBeNa ca viraja praBeNa ca jotizpraBeNa ca Darma praBeNa ca SAnti praBeNa ca sUrya praBeNa ca vikurvita praBeNa ca deva praBeNa ca boDisattvena mahAsattvena puNya ketunA ca jQAna ketunA ca DarmaketunA ca
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa @25b thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang /

column2: byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang / gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i 'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang / zhi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang; rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / sa sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbugs 'byin @26a *// pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun du snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye shes rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g-yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa @26b med pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su bskul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom zhing med par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma med pa'i blo dang / chags pa med pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun du snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste /

column2: khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang; sgo dang / rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skabs kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing /

column1: parama suviBakta upaSoBitaH sarvam ca jetavanam vipula AyAma vistAram saMsTitam aBUt
column2: shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes @30b par kun nas gnas par gyur to // dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang /

column2: chu zheng kun du rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i rva bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to //

column2: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to //

column1: anaBilApya ratna padma meGa saMCanna alaMkAram anaBilApya ratna siMhAsana divya maNi ratna vastra prajQapta boDisattva nizaNNa taTA gata stuti meGa maDura nirGoza alaMkAram

column1: pIta varNa pIta nirBAsa ratna vastra meGa alaMkAram gagana talam aDitizWan nAnA ganDa parivAsita maNi vastra meGa pravarzita alaMkAram ganana talam aDitizWan Aditya Dvaja maNi rAja vastra meGa alaMkAram gagana talam aDitizWan

column1: akzaya budDavaMSa nirdeSAyAH lokaDAtoH samanta jQAna maNxala pratiBAsa nirGozasya taTAgatasya budDa kzetrAt Darma DAtu praNiDi tala nirBedaH nAma boDisattvaH sArDam anaBilApya loka DAtu samudra paramANu rajaH samEH boDisattvEH tena
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyings kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba / / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des / / gnang nas /

column1: BagavatA anujQAtaH tatas parzad maNxala samudrAt uccalitvA yena saha AlokaDAtuH tena upasaMkrAntaH

column1: sarva lakzaNa anuvyaQjaneByaH sarva roma muKeByaH sarva kAyAt sarva aFga pratyaFgeByaH sarva vacana paTeByaH sarva cIvara parivAreByaH sarva boDisattva parivArasya AtmanaH
column2: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang / gos dang / smad g-yogs thams cad nas /

column1: BagavataH ca vErocanasya pUrva anta kowI gatAnAm ca atIta anAgatAnAm sarva taTAgatAnAm apara anta kowI gatAnAm
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs @44a *//

column1: ca anAgatAnAm vyAkRta avyAkRtAnAm sarva taTAgatAnAm pratyutpannAnAm ca daSasu dikzu sarva kzetra prasara pratizWitAnAm sarva dAna pAramitA pratisaMyuktAn pUrva yoga samudrAn sarva pratigrAhaka deya vastra pratibimbAni ca lakzaNa anuvyaQjana roma muKa sarva SarIra aFga pratyaFga vacana paTa sarva SarIra parivArezu pratiBAsa prAptAni vijQApayan sarva SIla pAramitA pratisaMyuktAn api pUrva yoga samudrAn pratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSayan sarva kzAnti pAramitA saMprayuktAnAm ca aFga pratyaFga= Cedena nidarSana saMprayuktAn api pUrva yoga samudrAn pratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSay
column2: pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / ma byon pa thams cad dang / da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len pa dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / ba spu'i sgo dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / tshig gi lam dang / gos dang / smad g-yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa /

column1: sarva boDisattva vIrya vega vikrama saMprayuktAn api pUrva yoga samudrAn pratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSayan
column2: yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang @44b ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing /

column1: sarva taTAgata DyAna sAgara paryezwi nizpatti saMprayuktAn api pUrva yoga samudrAn pratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSayan sarva taTAgata Darma cakra gati parinizpatti Darma paryezwi saMprayuktAn api sarvAH ti parityAga mahA vyavasAya SarIra muKa bimba vijQApanAn pUrpratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSayan sarva taTAgata darSana prIti sarva boDisattva mArga sarva jagat aBirocana saMprayuktAn api pUrva yoga samudrAn pratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSayan
column2: shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par grub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /

column1: sarva boDisattva praNiDAna sAgara aBinirhAra muKa pariSudDi vyUha saMprayuktAn api pUrva yoga samudrAn pratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSayan
column2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / dang / rnam par mngon pa dang / @45a *// rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste /

column1: sarva boDisattva bala pAramitA nizpatti vikrama viSudDi saMprayuktAn api pUrva yoga samudrAn pratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSayan vipula vipulam DarmaDAtum sarva vikurvita meGEH sParitvA sarva boDisattva jQAna maNxala saMprayuktAn api pUrva yoga samudrAn gv
column2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing /

column1: pratiBAsa prAptAn saMdarSayan yena BagavAn= tena upasaMkramya sArDam parivAreNa Bagavantam

column1: sarva loka DAtu eka kAya sParaNa vizayAH sarva taTAgata parzat maNxala aByudgata virocana kAyAH

column1: eka paramANu rajasi sarva loka DAtu eka loka DAtu pratiBAsa samavasaraNa saMdarSana vizayAH
column2: rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa /

column1: mAyA upama sarva sattva DAtu parijQA pratilabDAH pratiBAsA upama sarva taTAgata avatIrNAH

column1: sarva Darma anAvaraNa jQAna pratilabDAH sarva boDisattva aBijQA jQAna maNxala viSudDAH

column1: anAlaya gagana gocarAH anAyUha sarvajQa tA BUmi gagana vIryAH sarva Bava anilamBa jQAna gocarAH

column2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa dang / dog pa sna tshogs rab tu tshogs pa / shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa / dmigs pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa /

column1: vipula Alambana sUkzma jQAna anugatAH sarva budDa eka cit takzaNa vihAra pratilabDAH sarva taTAgata jQAna SarIrAH
column2: sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa /

column1: sarva diS sAgarA saMmoha jQAna pratilabDa asarva diS samudra eka cittakzaNa vikurvita sParaNAH
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa / phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa / sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste /

column1: evaMrUpa apramANa samanvAgatEH boDisattvEH sarvam jetavanam paripUrNam aBUt yat ut taTAgatAnAm aDizWAnena

column2: byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng @47b ge'i khri bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo //

column1: sattva DAtu sama tayA sarva loka DAtu sama tayA sarva karma vaMSa sama tayA sattva ASaya sama tayA sattva aDimukti samatayA Darma pratiBAsa samatayA sattva paripAka kAla samatayA sarva jagat indriya sama tayA ca
column2: chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid /

column1: yat uta AkASa DAtu paramezu sarva budDa kzetrezu apara anta kowI gata kalpa taTA gata guNa anucaraNa nirdeSaH

column1: yat uta sarva budDa kzetra taTA gata samutpatti ananta maDya aBisaMboDi muKa samudra saMdarSana nirdeSaH

column1: yat uta AkASa DAtu parama budDa kzetra taTA gata parzad maNxala boDisattva saMGa boDimaNxa aBimuKa avasTAna nirdeSaH

column2: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa / ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /

column1: yat uta sarva diS samudrezu sarva kzetra sAgara sama tala aDizWAna eka kAya sParaNa praBAsa nirdeSaH
column2: phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing / lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /

column1: yat uta sarva ArambaNa talezu budDa BUmi vikurvita sarvatri aDva sama vasaraNa DizWAna saMdarSana nirdeSaH
column2: dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /

column1: yat uta sarva kzetra paramANu rajaH samatri aDva kzetra paraMpara AnAnA abudDa vikurvita kalpa sAgara saMdarSana nirdeSaH
column2: zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la / dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /

column1: yat uta sarvatri aDva budDa praNiDAna sAgara sarva roma nigarjana aparyanta aDizWAna boDisattva saMBava nirdeSaH
column2: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas @63b rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste /

column1: yat uta DarmaDAtu pramANa budDa siMhAsana boDisattva parzad maNxalA saMBinna boDimaNxa alaMkAra nAnA Darma cakra pravartana aparAnta aDizWAna nirde
column2: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snying po'i rgyan tha mi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o // kye rgyal ba'i sras /

column1: iti hi Bo jinaputrAH etAn daSAn pramuKAn kRtvA anaBilApya budDa kzetra paramANu urajaH samAn etasya siMha vijRmBitasya samADi nirdeSa nan
column2: de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa / sangs rgyas rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de /

column1: vyavalokya acintya traya DvabudDa sama tAm vyavalokya acintya ananta maDya sarva vAc paTa nirukti sarva DarmanayAn
