column2: de bas kyang brnan te dgod par mdzad pa'i don du / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas / chos kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs @65a *// pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po /

column1: nAma raSmim niScArayitvA anaBilApya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama raSmi parivArAm daSa diS sarva loka DAtu samudrezu sarva kzetra prasarAn avaBAsayati sma
column2: 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brngod [*brjod?] du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do //

column1: aTa Kalu ye te boDisattva jetavane saMnipatitAH
column2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gis /

column1: te paSyanti sma sarva Darma DAtu gatezu sarva budDa kzetrezu AkASa DAtu paryavasAnezu
column2: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing /

column1: sarva budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama budDa kzetra paramANu raja untargatezu budDa kzetra saMgatezu nAnA balezu nAnA viSudDezu nAnA pratizWAnezu nAnA saMsTAnezu budDa kzetrezu boDimaNxa vara gatam
column2: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam pa dag pa dang / gzhi sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na /

column1: boDisattva siMhAsana nizaNNam sarva loka indra saMpUjitam boDisattva gaNa parivRtam anuttarAm
column2: byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba /

column1: samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbuDyamANam kvacid Darma cakram pravartayantam DarmaDAtu sParaNena
column2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste /

column1: svara maNxalena anaBilApya budDa kzetra vipulezu parzad maNxalezu
column2: la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor @65b gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngo // la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug /

column1: kvacid deva Bavana gatam kvacid nAga Bavana gatam kvacid yakza Bavana gatam kvacid ganDarva Bavana gatam
column2: la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug / la la na ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug / la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug /

column1: kvacid asura Bavana gatam kvacid garuxa Bavana gatam kvacid kinnara Bavana gatam kvacid mahA uraga Bavana gatam
column2: la la na ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug / la la na ni mi'am ci'i gnas na 'dug / la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug / la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug /

column1: kvacid manuzya indra Bavana gatam kvacid manusya loke grAma nagara nigama janapada rAzwra rAja DAnIzu nAnA vikurvitEH Darmam deSayamAnam na aneryApaTEH nAnAviDEH Atma BAvEH nAnA samADi muKa vijQaptiBiH nAnA samADi aBijQABiH nAnA kula gotra saMBavEH nAnA varNa vijQaptiBiH nAnA praBAmaN deSayantam paSyanti sma yAvantaH ca te boDisattvAH tezu tezu parzad maNxalezu taTAgatasya gamBIra budDa samADi vikurvitAni paSyanti sma
column2: la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang; lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / tshig dang / nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to // byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa / nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa /

column1: DarmaDAtu paramezu lokaDAtuzu AkASa DAtu paryavasAnezu daSa diS vyavasTAnezu ananta diS parivarta samavasaraNezu
column2: phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa / phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas pas 'dus pa / @66a *// phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa / chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa / phyogs kyi ming du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa /

column1: sarva diS samudrezu nAnA Darma diS dvArezu nAnA AdiS saMjQA gatesu nAnA diS samavasaraNezu
column2: phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba; phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa / phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba / phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa / 'di lta ste /

column1: nAnA diS BAgezu nAnA diS anugamezu nAnA AdiS sAgarezu yat uta pUrvasyAm diSi dakziNAyAm paScimAyAm uttarasyAm uttara pUrvAyAm pUrva dakziNAyAm dakziNa paScimAyAm paScima uttarasyAm aDas UrDvam diSi kzetra kAya dikzu sattva kAya dikzu api sattva saMjQA gata dikzvati pUrva anta kowI gata dikzu api daSa diS pratyutpanna dikzu api sarva AkASa paTa sUkzma vAla muKa nikzepa pragrahaNa dikzu api
column2: shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs /

column1: sarva kzetra paramANu rajaH paraMpara Adikzu api diS praveSavata raNa dikzu api nAnA karma aBisaMskAra samutTita dikzu api eka vAla paTa anantam aDyAkASa tala saMjQA gata diS paTezu api
column2: sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcu da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang / nam mkha'i khong thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs dang / las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ming du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khong du chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas /

column1: samatA anusRta aBisaMBinna tri aDva tala samatA anugata sarva jagat asaMBinna sarva sattva saMjQA gata samaruta sarva jagat cittezu pratiBAsa prAptAni sarva sattva kAyezu aBimuKa pralamba sarva parzad upasaMkramaNa rUpANi
column2: kun @66b tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa / sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par blta pa dmigs par bya bas / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa /

column1: sarva kalpezu jQAna asaMBinnAni sarva kzetrezu sarvatra sama tayA gv
column2: bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa / zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas /

column1: yaTA ASayAnAm sattvAnAm aBimuKa rUpa saMdarSana vijQaptIni sarva budDa Darma saMprakASana sarva sattva vinaya apratiprasrabDAni taTAgata vikurpaSyanti sma
column2: sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa / rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa / de dag thams cad ni /

column1: sarve te BagavatA vErocanena pUrva kuSala caryA saBA ga tayA caturBiH saMgraha vastuBiH saMgRhItAH darSanena SravaNena anusmRtyA paryupAsanena ca paripAcitAH
column2: sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa bskal pa mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyam pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongs su smin par byas pa dag go /

column1: pUrvam anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAditAH
column2: sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dag go / de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe /

column1: tatra taTAgatezu upasaMkramantaH kuSala mUlEH saMgRhItAH
column2: dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa dag ste /

column1: yaTA kuSala mUla saBAga tayA sarvajQa tA paripAka upAyasu parigRhItattvAt tat acintyam BagavataH vErocanasya samADi vikurvitam avataranti Dar
column2: de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal ba mnyam @67a *// pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis yongs su shin tu bzung ba'i phyir / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te /

column1: kecid Darma kAyam avataranti
column2: la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go /

column1: kecid rUpa kAyam
column2: la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go /

column1: kecid pUrvam boDisattva samudAgamam
column2: la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go /

column1: kecid pAramitA paripUrim
column2: la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go /

column1: kecid caryA maNxala viSudDi vyUham
column2: la la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go /

column1: kecid boDisattva BUmi vikurvitam
column2: la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /

column1: kecid aBisaMboDi vikurvitam
column2: la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /

column1: kicid budDa vihAra samADya saMBeda vikurvitam
column2: la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go /

column1: kecid taTAgata bala vESAradya jQAnam
column2: la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug go /

column1: kecid budDa pratisaMvid sAgaram avataranti
column2: la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go /

column1: evaMpramuKAn daSa budDa kzetra an aBilApya paramANu rajaH samAn budDa vikurvita samudrAn avataranti
column2: de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug ste /

column1: nAnA DimuktiBiH nAnA paTEH nAnA dvArEH nAnA praveSEH nAnA avatAra enArnAnayEH nAnA anugamEH nAnA digBiH nAnA BAjanEH nAnA deSEH nAnA lokEH nAnA aDigamEH n tAn budDa vikurvita samudrAn avataranti nAnA samADi avatArEH yat uta samanta Darma DAtu vyUhena boDisattva samADinA avataranti
column2: mos pa sna tshogs dang / lam sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / @67b 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod sna tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs dang / khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste /

column1: sarvatri aDvAsaFga jQAna vizaya avaBAsena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang /

column1: DarmaDAtu tala asaMBeda jQAna Alokena boDisattva samADinA taTAgata vizaya tala praveSena boDisattva samADinA gagana tala avaBAsena boDisattva samADinA daSa taTAgata bala AkramaNa vivareNa boDisattva samADinA budDa= SamBita vyUha vikrama vijRmBitena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha mi dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi klong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' @68a *//

column1: sarva Darma DAtu naya Avarta garBeNa boDisattva samADinA sarva Darma DAtu aFga nigarjana sParaNa candreNa boDisattva samADinA
column2: ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrogs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang /

column1: samantavyUha Darma praBeNa ca boDisattva samADinA te boDisattvAH tAn BagavataH vErocanasya budDa vikurvita samudrAn avataranti asaFga pawwa DarmarAja Dvajena ca boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan pa'i 'od kyis byang chub sems dpa'i de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu zla ba dang / 'jug go /

column1: sarva AvaraNa budDa samudra vipaSyinA boDisattva samADinA sarva loka gati asaMBeda kAya pratiBAsa Dvajena boDisattva samADinA taTAgata kAya asaMBeda vizaya praveSena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang /

column1: sarva loka avarti anupravartana karuNArgarBeNa ca boDisattva samADinA sarva Darma pada pratizWAna aDizWAna aDizWitena ca boDisattva samADinA atyanta SAnta praSAnta sama tA avaBAsa maNxalena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyis rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /

column1: anilamBa su nirmita samanta nirmANa pratiBAsena boDisattva samADinA sarva kzetra samanta samavasaraNa aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA sarva budDa kzetra aBisaMboDya AkAreNa aBinirhAreNa boDisattva samADinA sarva jagat indra bala vivaraNena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing @68b thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

column1: sarva jagat viSeza AsaFga maNxala vivaraNena boDisattva samADinA sarva taTAgata janetrI saMBava aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /

column1: sarva sAgara guNa pratipatti avatAreNa boDisattva samADinA aSeza sarva ArambaNa vikurvita aBinirhAra aparAnta aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis rlabs dang /

column1: sarva taTAgata pUrva yoga samudra avatAreNa boDisattva samADinA gv aparAnta sarva taTAgata vaMSa saMDAraNa aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA pratyutpanna daSa diS sarva kzetra sAgara pariSudDa aDimukti aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA sarva budDa eka cit takzaNa vihAra avaBAsena boDisattva samADinA
column2: 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad @69a *//

column1: sarva ArambaNa AsaFga kowi praveSena boDisattva samADinA sarva loka DAtu ekabudDa kzetra aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA sarva budDa kAya nirmANa aBinirhAreNa boDisattva samADinA vajra indra sarva indriya sAgara prativeDena boDisattva samADinA
column2: dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying bo'i byin gyi rlabs dang /

column1: sarva taTAgata eka SarIra garBa aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA cit takzaNa kowi sarva Darma DAtu naya anuga makzaNa vihAreNa boDisattva samADinA sarva Darma DAtu kzetra prasara nirvRti saMdarSana aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA aDamUrDa tala vihAra aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA sarva budDa kzetra sattva kAya asaMBeda aDizWAnena boDisattva samADinA sarva jQAna Avarta aBimuKa samavasaraNena boDisattva samADinA sarva Darma svaBAva lakzaNa aparijQA praBedena boDisattva samADinA tri aDva eka cit takzaNa saMBeda maNxalena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byams klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par @69b gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /

column1: sarva cittakzaNa Darma DAtu naya SarIra garBeNa boDisattva samADinA sarva taTAgata vaMSa anugama siMhena boDisattva samADinA sarva ArambaNa DarmaDAtum ati cakzuH maNxalena boDisattva samADinA
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi / dkyil 'khor dang /

column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin klong mi g-yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gi tshig / @70a *// tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag /

column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang /

column1: sarva budDa taTAgata kowi praveSena boDisattva samADinA sarva taTAgata vimokza Bavana vyavalokana siMha vijRmBitena boDisattva samADinA etad pramuKEH anaBilApya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samEH boDisattva samADi varga avatArEH te boDisattvAH tAn BagavataH vErocanasya budDa viku
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas sengge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis / byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go /

column1: pUrva sa BAga carita vikurvitam ca samanusmaranti cit takzaNe cit takzaNe sarva Darma DAtu sParaNena avatAreNa tezAm punar boDisattvAnAm
column2: sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug @72b pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing /

column1: BagavataH saMmuKIBAva gatAnAm jetavana anuprAptAnAm daSa budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama loka DAtu vipula nAnA ratna padma garBa siMhAsana saMn

column1: mahA jQAna aBijQA vikurvita niryAtAnAm tIkzNa jQAna aBijQAvati BUmi anuprAptAnAm samanta jQAna vyavacArANAm

column1: prajQA kara gotra saMBavAnAm sarvajQa jQAna aBimuKAnAm vitimira jQAna cakzuzAm sattva sAraTi BAva anuprAptAnAm
column2: shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byung ba / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa / ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa / sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa /

column1: sarva budDa samatA anugatAnAm sadA vikalpa Darma caraNAnAm sarva Darma ArambaNa pratividDAnAm

column1: sarva Darma prakRti SAnta rambaNAnAm sarva loka praSAnta nirvANa Alaya paramANAm sarva loka nAnA tva pratizWAnAm
column2: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa; 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba / 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa / gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba /

column1: aniketa sarva kzetra gamanAnAm apratizWAna sarva Darma padAnAm anAryUha sa vaDam avimAna pratizWAnAm
column2: chos kyi gnas thams cad la bstan pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du byin pa / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa du byin pa /

column1: sarva jagat paripAka vinaya pratipannAnAm sarva sattva kzema gati saMdarSakAnAm aByudgata jQAna vimokza Bavana gocarANAm

column1: Darma sAgara prajQA avaBAsa maNxalAnAm sAgaravatI DAtu samADi su samAhita mahA karuNA cittAnAm

column1: mAyA gata Darma naya su pratividDAnAm svapna upama sarva loka DAtu avatIrNAnAm pratiBAsA upama sarva taTAgata darSana pratividDAnAm
column2: chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa /

column1: pratiSrutka upama sarva ruta ravita Goza vijQaptInAm nirmita upama sarva Darma aBinirvRtti jQAna pratividDAnAm
column2: sgra skad dang / dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa / chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa /

column1: su samArjita vizaya praNiDAnAnAm samanta jQAna maNxala viSudDi kOSalya anugatAnAm
column2: khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bsags pa / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa /

column1: atyanta SAnta praSAnta cittAnAm sarva DAraNI gotra jQAna vizayANAm acCamBita samADi bala samanta parAkramANAm DarmaDAtu sTiti kowI gata cakzuz
column2: sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa / gzugs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dogs pa med pa kun nas rab tu gnon pa /

column1: sarva Darma anilamBa vihAra prAptAnAm ananta prajQA sAgara vicAriNAm jQAna pAramitA pAraMgatAnAm
column2: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan @73b pa; chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa / shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa /

column1: prajQApAramitA bala ADAna prAptAnAm RdDi pAramitA sarva jagat pAraMgatAnAm samADi pAramitA vaSa gatAnAm
column2: rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa /

column1: sarva taTAgata arTa kOSalyA viparIta jQAninAm Darma kOSalya prakASana viDi jQAnAm nirukti jQAna aBijQAnAm akzaya pratiBAna bala Darma meGAnAm
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa / chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa / nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa / spobs pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa /

column1: vESAradya RzaBa siMhanAdinAm anAlaya DarmA samarati ratAnAm vitimira sarva Darma prasArita cakzuzAm
column2: mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa / gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa / chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis blta ba /

column1: sarva loka saMvitti Bava jQAna candrANAm prajQA maNxala sarva satya naya vyavahAra raSmInAm
column2: 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa / shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can /

column1: jQAna vajra puNya cakravAlAnAm sarva Opamya Opamya samatikrAntAnAm sarva Darma indriya jQAna aFkura virUXAnAm
column2: ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa / dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa / chos thams cad la dbang po dang / ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa / dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa /

column1: SUra DvajAnAm sarva mAra Dvaja pramardana vIryANAm ananta jQAna maNxala tejasAm sarva jagat aByudgata kAyAnAm

column1: sarva Darma anAvaraNa prajQAnAm kzaya akzaya kowi jQAna vibudDAnAm samanta kowI anugata BUta kowi pratizWAnAm
column2: chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med pa / zad pa dang mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa / yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa /

column1: samanta muKa kuSala avaBAsa pratilabDAnAm upAya garBa mArga samADi jQAna Aloka avaBAsitAnAm vipula puNya sAgara saMBRta saMBArANAm sarva Sukla upacaya apratiprasrabDAnAm sarva kalyANa mitra upastabDa upAya apariKinnAnAm kAya jIvita napekzANAm sarva vastu udgraha vigatAnAm animna unnata pRTivI samacittA nAmA prakRti kRpA sneha anugatAnAm sarva Bava gati saMvAsa aBimuKAnAm taTAgata vizaya aBilAziNAm sattvAnAm boDAya cittam utpadyate
column2: dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob dang / thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa dang / dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / lus dang srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mthon dman med pa'i sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang / rang bzhin gyis snying rje che zhing byams par sems pa dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i @102b lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye ste /

column1: yat uta mahA karuNA cittam sarva sattva paritrANAya mahAmEtrI cittam sarva jagat sama yoga tAyE suKa cittam sarva jagat duHKa skanDa vyupaSamanAya hita cittam sarva akuSala Darma vinivartana tAyE dayA cittam sarva Baya ArakzAyE asaFga cittam sarva AvaraNa vinivartana tAyE vipula cittam sarva DarmaDAtu sParaNa tAyE ananta cittam AkASa DAtu samavasaraNa samatA anugamAya
column2: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal kyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i sems dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang /

column1: vimala cittam sarva taTAgata darSana vijQaptyE viSudDa cittam tri aDva a= aSeza jQAna sParaNa tAyE jQAna cittam sarva AvaraNa jQAna vinivartana tAyE sarvajQa jQA sAgara avataraNa tAyE

column2: mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang ba dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang / bags kyis gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang / chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems pa byed cing gnas gnas te / rigs kyi bu / de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so //

column1: tasya mama kula putraH evam Bavati  asti na punar anyaH kaScid iha loke yaH smAt manAsAgarAt vipulataraH ca vistIrNataraH ca apramANatarvicitrataraH ca

column1: tasya mama kula putraH evam yoniSas cintA manasikAra prayuktasya mahA sAgarasya aDastAt mahApadmam prAduraBUt

column1: daSa nAga indra Sata sahasra ganDa udaka meGa aBipravarzitam daSa garuxa indra Sata sahasra muKa pralambita pawwa maNi dAmahAram
column2: klu'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos chu'i char mngon par phab pa / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang / sen mo do mang po mchus gzung zhing rab tu dbyangs pa /

column1: daSa kinnarendra Sata sahasra hita citta saMprekzitam daSa mahA uraga indra Sata sahasra muKa praNata upacAram

column1: daSa rAkzasa indra Sata sahasra praNata kAya aBipUjitam daSa ganDarva indra Sata sahasra vicitra tUrya saMgIti stuta upacitam
column2: srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa /

column1: daSa deva indra Sata sahasra divya puzpa ganDa mAlya DUpa vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja patAkA meGa aBipravarzitam
column2: dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa / lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa /

column1: daSa brahma indra Sata sahasra mUrDa praNata upacAram daSa SudDAvAsa kAyikA devatA Sata sahasra kRta aQjali puwa namaskRtam
column2: tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba /

column1: daSa cakra parivarta manuja indra Sata sahasra sapta ratna pratyudgata aBipUjitam daSa sAgara devatA Sata sahasra aByudgata namaskRtam
column2: mi'i dbang po 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya @104a *// stong phrag bcus rin po che sna bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa / rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'thon cing phyag bya ba /

column1: daSa jyotIrasa maNi ratna Sata sahasra raSmi vyUha avaBAsitam daSa puNya SudDa maNi ratna Sata sahasra su niScita vinyasta upaSoBitam
column2: nor bu rin po che skar ma'i ngad brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa / nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhos su phebs par 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa /

column1: daSa vErocana maNi ratna Sata sahasra vimala garBam daSa SrI maNi ratna Sata sahasra mahA SrI pratApanam
column2: nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa /

column1: daSa vicitra koSa maNi ratna Sata sahasra ananta avaBAsitam daSa jambUDvaja maNi ratna Sata sahasra su parigRhita sTita prApta upaSoBitam
column2: nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa / nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa /

column1: daSa vajra siMha maNi ratna Sata sahasra aparAjita vyUham daSa sUrya garBa maNi ratna Sata sahasra udAra uttapta upacitam
column2: nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med tu brgyan pa / par brgyan pa / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal ba bsgrubs pa /

column1: daSa rucira maNi ratna Sata sahasra viviDa varNa upacAram daSa cintA rAja maNi ratna Sata sahasra akzaya vyUha praBA ujjvalitam
column2: nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa / nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang / 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste / padmo chen po de ni /

column1: tat ca mahApadmam taTAgata loka uttara kuSala mUla nirjAtam boDisattva ASayaMsaMprasTitam sarva diS aBimuKa vijQapanam
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das @104b ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o // byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brtan pa'o // phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o // sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyis byung ba'o // rjen pa'i dri ma med pa'i las kyis byung ba'o //

column1: mayA gata Darma niryAtam nirAma ganDa karma saMButam araNa aDarma tAnaya vyUham svapna sama Darma tA samudAcAram
column2: nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o // rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su byung ba'o //

column1: yat uta sarva budDArA gaNa tAyE sarva budDa aBirADana tAyE sarva budDa darSana tAyE sarva budDa vijQaptaye sarva budDa samatA anugamAya sarva budDa praNiDi anugamAya sarva budDa praNiDi paripUraye sarva budDa samudAgama jQAna Alokana tAyE sarva budDa sva SarIra aBinirharaNa tAyE sarva budDa samudAgama sva caryA aBinirharaNa tAyE
column2: sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas @122b thams cad la rim gror bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa rang gi spyod par mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /

column1: sarva budDa vikurvita pratyakza aBijQa tAyE sarva budDa bala vESAradya pariSudDaye sarva Darma deSanA SravaNa avitRpta tAyE sarva budDa Darma deSanA SravaNa udgrahaNa tAyE sarva budDa Darma deSanA saMDAraNa tAyE sarva budDa Darma deSanA viBa janatAyE sarva budDa SAsana saMDAraNa tAyE sarva budDa sattva ekatva tAyE
column2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba mngon sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos brtan pa mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang @123a *//

column1: sarva boDisattva saBA gatAyE sarva boDisattva caryA pariSudDye sarva boDisattva pAramitA paripUraye gv sarva boDisattva praNiDi aBinirhAra viSudDaye sarva boDisattva budDa aDizWAna koSa pratilABitAyE
column2: skal pa mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par / bgyi ba dang /

column1: sarva boDisattva Darma niDAna koSa akzaya jQAna AlokatAyE sarva boDisattva niDAna koSa anugamAya sarva boDisattva apramANa koSa aBinirharaNa tAyE sarva boDisattva mahA karuNA niDAna koSa sattva vinaya nizWA paryanta gamana tAyE
column2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi gter dang mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang mdzod sems can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i gter dang mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang /

column1: sarva boDisattva vikurvita niDAna koSa vijQaptaye sarva boDisattva vaSitA niDAna koSa sva citta vaSa vartana tAyE
column2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gi gter dang mdzod rang gi sems kyi dbang du dang / bgyi ba dang /

column1: sarva boDisattva viSudDi niDAna koSa sarva AkAra vyUha tAyE
column2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad dang / bgyi ba dang / du / bla na med pa yang @123b dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas / 'phags pa /

column1: evaMcittaH hamAryaH iha upasaMkrAntaH
column2: de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag 'dir mchis so //

column1: evam aBiprAyaH evaMmanoraTaH evam aBinandyaH evam ASayaH evaMniDi apti paramaH evaMgocara aBimuKaH eva naya anugama aBimuKaH evaMviSudDi paramaH evaMvyUha aBiprAyaH evaMpraNata cittaH evaMkalyANa prayogaH evam aBimuKa indriyaH
column2: bsam pa de lta bu dang / yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang / sems pa de lta bu dang / gdon mi 'tshal bar bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang / rnam par dpyod pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang / dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis te /

column1: Srutam ca me AryaH boDisattvAnAm avavAda anuSAsanIm dadAti iti
column2: 'phags pa ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su ston pa mdzad cing /

column1: nayam upadiSati
column2: tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad /

column1: anugamanam avaBAsayati
column2: rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad /

column1: mArgam upadiSati
column2: lam ni bstan par mdzad /

column1: tIrTam avatArayati
column2: mu stegs la ni 'jog par mdzad /

column1: Darma dvAram vivRNoti
column2: chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad /

column1: saMSayAn Cinatti
column2: the tshom ni yongs su gcod par mdzad /

column1: kAFkzAm vinodayati
column2: nem nur ni sel bar mdzad /

column1: kaTaMkaTA Salyam udDarati

column1: vicikitsAmalam apakarzayati
column2: dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad /

column1: citta gahanam avaBAsayati citta malam apaharati
column2: sems kyi thibs po ni snang bar mdzad; sems kyi dri ma ni yongs su sel bar mdzad /

column1: citta saMtatim prasAdayati
column2: sems kyi rgyud ni rab tu dang bar mdzad /

column1: citta kOwilyam apanayati
column2: sems kyi g-yo sgyu ni yongs su sel bar mdzad /

column1: citta tApam prahlAdayati
column2: sems kyi gdung ba ni yongs su @124a *//

column1: vyAvartayati
column2: sim par mdzad /

column1: saMsAra cittam vinivartayati
column2: 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad /

column1: akuSaleByaH vivartayati
column2: mi dge ba'i las ni phyir bzlog par mdzad /

column1: narakeByaH vivecayati
column2: sems can dmyal ba las ni ldog par mdzad /

column1: niketaneByaH uccAlayati
column2: gnas dang ni dbral bar mdzad /

column1: anaBiniveSAt parimocayati

column1: sarva saFgeByaH Avarjayati
column2: chags pa thams cad las ni yongs su 'grel ba mdzad /

column1: sarvajQa tAyAm aBimuKIkaroti
column2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub pa mdzad /

column1: Darma nagara anupraveSAya Avartayati
column2: chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni mngon du gyur par mdzad /

column1: mahA karuNAyAm pratizWApayati
column2: snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad /

column1: mahAmEtryAm niyojayati
column2: byams pa chen po la ni rab tu gzhog pa mdzad /

column1: boDisattva caryAyAm praveSayati
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad /

column1: samADi muKa Bavana tAyAm niveSayati
column2: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la ni 'dzud pa mdzad /

column1: anugama muKezu sTApayati
column2: rtogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo la ni gnas par mdzad / rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni gzhog par mdzad /

column1: svaBAva niDi aptO sParati
column2: stobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad /

column1: bala anugamena viBajati sarva jagat samatA anugamAya cittam
column2: 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ni sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad do zhes thos na /

column1: tat vadatu me AryaH  kaTam boDisattvena boDisattva caryAyAm Sikzitavyam
column2: 'phags pa / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi /

column1: kaTam aBiyoktavyam kaTam prayoktavyam
column2: ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi /

column1: kaTam prayuktasya kzipram viSuDyati boDisattva caryA maNxalam
column2: ji ltar brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol /

column1: aTa Kalu muktakaH SrezWI tasyAm velAyAm sarva budDa kzetra samavasaraNam nAma ananta Avarta DAraNI muKa pUrvaMgamam boDisattva samADi muKam samApadyata pUrva kuSala mUla bala ADAnena taTAgata aDizWAnena
column2: de nas tshong dpon btang brjod kyis de'i tshe byang @124b chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo klong mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang /

column1: maQju SriyaH ca kumAra BUtasya samanvAhareNa jQAna Aloka upasaMhAreNa ca
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing / ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par zhugs so //

column1: samanantara samApannasya ca muktakasya SrezWinaH taTArUpA kAya pariSudDiH saMsTitA
column2: tshong dpon btang brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bur gnas par gyur te /

column1: yayA kAya pariSudDayA daSasu dikzu daSa budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAH budDAH BagavantaH
column2: lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas /

column1: saha budDa kzetra pariSudDayA sa parzat maNxalAH saha praBA viSudDayA sa pUrva caryA saMvAsAH
column2: 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas / sngon spyod pa la zhugs pa dang bcas / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas /

column1: sa budDa vikurvitAH sa praNiDAna saMBArAH sahacaryA niryANa vyUha viSudDayA sa aBisaMboDi saMdarSanAH
column2: smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas / spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa dang bcas / chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas /

column1: sahaDarma cakra udda yotanAH sa sattva paripAkAH sa Darma nizWA paryantAH sarva kAye ntargatAH anupravizwAH saMdRSyante sma
column2: sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas / chos kyi mu'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khong du chud cing 'dus par snang ste /

column1: anyonya asaMBinnA anyonya anAvaraNAH anyonya su viBaktA anyonya su vyavasTita nAnA kalpa saMsTAnA
column2: de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun mchod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par @125a *//

column1: yaTAvat vijQaptAH nAnA budDa kzetra vyUhAH nAnA boDisattva parzad maNxala alaMkArAH nAnA budDa vikurvitam saMdarSayantaH saMdRSyante sma
column2: phye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su bzhugs pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs su yongs su ston par snang ngo //

column1: nAnA yAn anaya vyavasTAnAH nAnA praNiDAna muKa paridIpanAH kvacid lokaDAtO tuzita Bavana upapannAH saMdRSyante
column2: theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing /

column1: sarva budDa kAryam kurvantaH kvacid tuzita BavanAt cyavamAnAH
column2: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo //

column1: kvacid mAtuH kukzi gatAH viviDa vikurvitAni gv saMdarSayantaH kvacid jAyamAnAH bAla krIxAm upadarSayantaH
column2: la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba dang / la la na ni yum gyi sku na bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston pa dang /

column1: kvacid antaHpura maDya gatAH kvacid aBinizkrAmantaH kvacid boDimaNxa vara gatAH mahA vyUha vikurvita mAra sEnya parAjayam kurvantaH saMdRSyante kvacid deva nAga yakza ganDarva parivRtAH brahma indrEH Darma cakra pravartanAya aDyezyamANAH
column2: la la na ni skye ba dang / la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang / la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la la na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa dang / la la na ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zas yongs su bskor cing tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /

column1: kvacid Darma cakram pravartayantaH kvacid sarva sattva Bavana gatAH kvacid parinirvAyamANAH saMdRSyante
column2: la la na ni @125b chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang / la la na ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo //

column1: kvacid lokaDAtO taTAgatAnAm parinirvRtAnAm DAtu viBaFgAH saMdRSyante
column2: 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel rnam par 'god par snang ngo //

column1: kvacid budDa kzetra deva manuzyAH taTAgata cEtyAni alaMkurvantaH saMdRSyante yat ca te budDAH BagavantaH BAzante nAnA sattva nikAyezu nAnA sattva lokezu nAnA sattva gatizu nAnA sattva upapattizu nAnA sattva saMnipAtezu nAnA sattva kuSala mUla parivartezu nAnA sattva gati parivartezu nAnA sattva ASaya parivartezu nAnA sattva aDi mukti parivartezu nAnA sattva indriya parivartezu
column2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis klubs pa byed par snang ste /

column1: nAnA kAla parivartezu nAnA sattva karma saMBedezu nAnA sattva karma vimAtra tAsu nAnA sattva loka viBAvanAsu
column2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang / spyod pa rnam pa @126a *//

column1: nAnA gati caryA vicaritezu sattva nayezu nAnA ASaya prayogezu sattva samudrezu nAnA indriya vimAtra tA viSudDezu nAnA kleSa vAsanA anuSayitezu sattva prasarezu
column2: tha dad pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byams klas pa rnams la /

column1: viviDa budDi vikurvita saMdarSanEH nAnA niruktiBiH nAnA svara aFga ruta nirhArEH nAnA sUtra antanaya udAhArEH nAnA DAraNI muKa parivartEH nAnA pratisa nAnA budDa RzaBa siMha nAdanEH nAnA sattva kuSala mUla deSanA prAtihArya saMdarSanEH nAnA muKa smRti nidarSana vikurvitEH nAnA boDisattva vyAkaraNa siMhanAdEH nAnA taTA gata Darma cakra vijRmBitEH ananta maDyezu
column2: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang / yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrub pa dang / mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa dang / dran pa'i sgo sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang /

column1: parzad maNxalezu ananta saMBedezu anyonya ArambaNezu nAnA viSudDa parzad maNxalezu vipulezu
column2: dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang / rnam par @126b dag pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yangs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang / dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam nas /

column1: sUkzma parzad maNxala samavasaraNezu yojana pramANezu daSa yojana pramANezu yAvat anaBilApya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama loka DAtu pramAN
column2: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis /

column1: parzad maNxalezu yat te budDAH BagavantaH Darmam BAzante sarva svara aFga ruta Goza anugAminyA taTAgata vAcA
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas chos ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis thos so // blangs so //

column1: tam sarvam suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH SRNoti udgRhNAti saMDArayati pravartayati upaniDyAyati
column2: yang dag par bzung ngo // bsams so //

column1: tat ca vikurvitam paSyati
column2: sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //

column1: tAm ca acintyAm boDisattva samADi vRzaBitAm
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo //

column1: aTa Kalu muktakaH SrezWI smRtaH saMprajAnan= tasmAt samADeH vyUtTAya su Danam SrezWi dArakam etat avocat  aham kula putra asaFga vyUhamtaTAgata vimokzam AyUhAmi niryUhAmi
column2: de nas tshong dpon btang brjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so // rigs kyi bu / kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa / thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongs su blangs shing 'dzin pa ste /

column1: tasya me kula putra asaFga vyUham taTAgata vimokzam AyUhataH niryUhataH pUrvasyAm diSi
column2: rigs kyi bu / de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe /

column1: jAmbUnada praBAsavatyAm lokaDAtO tAreSvararAjaH nAma taTAgataH rhan samyaksaMbudDaH
column2: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten @127a *// gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba /

column2: chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod @135b pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / mtho 'tsham pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang / sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor pas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de /

column1: asaMKyeya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn= ca ganDarva indrAn asaMKyeya ganDarva indra kanyA Sata sahasra parivArAn niScaritvA asaMKyeya divya tUrya Sata sahasra saMgIti saMpraBaNita Darma svaBAva upasaMhitAni budDa stotrANi udIrayamANAn boDi cittam paridIpayamAnAn boDisattva caryAm saMvarNayamAnAn
column2: mi'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rjod pa byed cing /

column1: sarva aBisaMboDi muKAni aBizwavamAnAn sarva Darma cakra muKAni avagAhayamAnAn sarva vikurvita muKAni aBirocayamAnAn sarva parinirvANa muKAni paridIpayamAnAn sarva budDa SAsana muKAni gv saMparigRhyamANAn sarva sattva muKAni saMpraharzayamANAn sarva budDa kzetrANi pariSoDayamAnAn sarva Darma muKAni aBidyotayamAnAn sarva AvaraNa muKAni vinivartayamAnAn sarva kuSala mUla muKAni saMjayamAnAn DarmaDAtum sParayamANAn su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH paSyat
column2: byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / @137b yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su skyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo // kha'i sgo nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po / rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing /

column1: cakravartinaH niScaritvA mahA tyAga raSmi vyUhAn pramuQcamAnAn sarva ratna AkarAn utsRjyamAnAn sarva maNi ratna AkarAn viSrANayamAnAn daridrAn sa DanIkurvANAn prANi vaDAt lokam vinivartayamAnAn mEtrI citte sattvAn saMniyojayamAnAn adatta AdAnAt vivecayamAnAn su alaMkRta asaMKyeya kanyA kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANi pratipAdayamAnAn kAma miTyA AcArAt vicCandayamAnAn brahmacarye pratizWApayamAnAn mRzA vAdAt vinivartayamAnAn asaMvivAda parama tAyAm niyojayamAnAn piSuna vacanAt vinivartayamAnAn parama saMgraha prayuktam Gozam udIrayamAnAn paruza vacanAt lokam vinivartayamAnAn manojQa SlakzNAm vAcam udIrayamANAn
column2: sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad spyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dbral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtang ba dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / brdzun du smra @138a *//

column1: anarTa aDarma upasaMhitAt abadDa pralApAt sattvAn vinivartayamAnAn gamBIra arTa pada praBeda viniScaye saMniyojayamAnAn sarva vacana dozeByaH lokam vinivartayamAnAn karuNA badDa vAcam udIrayamANAn hRdaya malam loke paharaNamANAn alpet SatA saMtuzwi parama tAyAm sattvAt niyojayamAnAn vyApAdAt lokam vinivartayamAnAn para saMtati prasAdane saMniyojayamAnAn sarva dRzwi jAlam loke udDaramANAn sarva vimati prakArAn vikirayamANAn sarva saMdeha kUwAn prapAtayamAnAn
column2: ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / bslu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba las yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing /

column1: sarva saMSaya vicikitsA timiram apanayamAnAn Darma pravicayam loke praviBajamAnAn idaMpratyaya tA pratItya samutpAdam udIrayamANAn svaBAva satya naye sattvAt niyojayamAnAn sarva AvaraNAni vinivartayamAnAn anAvaraNa naye vatArayamANAn budDa arTa nayam udyotayamAnAn
column2: 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang / yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tshom gyi spo thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / nem nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su bsal ba dang / chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang / @138b rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing /

column1: SIta naraka apAya gatAnAm sattvAnAm SIta duHKam praSamayamAnAni mRNmayezu kzetrezu avadAta varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni suvarNa mayezu kzetrezu vExUrya varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni vEdUrya mayezu kzetrezu suvarNa varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni rUpya mayezu kzetrezu suvarNa varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni suvarNa mayezu kzetrezu sPawika varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni sPawika mayezu kzetrezu suvarNa varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni suvarNa mayezu kzetrezu musAra galva varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni musAra galva mayezu kzetrezu suvarNa varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni lohita mukta Amayezu kzetrezu suvarNa varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni suvarNaMmayezu kzetrezu lohita muktA varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni aSmagarBa mayezu kzetrezu suvarNa varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni suvarNa mayezu kzetrezu aSmagarBa varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni indranIla mayezu kzetrezu sUrya garBa maNi rAja varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni sUrya garBa maNi rAja SarIrezu kzetrezu indranIla maNi rAja varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni
column2: 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar bo can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od bee d'urya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bee d'urya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od dngul gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /

column1: candra aMSu jAla maNxala garBa maNi rAja SarIrezu gv kzetrezu lohita muktA varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni eka ratna mayezu kzetrezu nAnA ratna varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni nAnA ratna mayezu kzetrezu eka ratna varNAm praBAm pramuQcamAnAni evam sarva boDisattva parzad maNxalezu aparimANa sattva kArya prayuktAni sarva sattva Darma DAtum sParamANAni apaSyat su DanaH SrezWi dArak BrU vivara antarAt UrNA koSAt asaMKyeya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn SaSAFka kAyAt niScaritvA sarva deva indra anaBiBavamAnAn
column2: zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od aasma gar bha'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / aindra n'i la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i aindra n'i la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo // smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing @139b grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas / lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing /

column1: SirastaH saMKyeya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn boDisattvAt niScaritvA nAnA varNa saMsTAna viBUzita SarIra tAm

column1: saMdarSayamAnAn anuvyaQjana vicitra gAtra tAm praBAvayamAnAn ananta maDya praBA maNxala meGAn pramuQcamAnAn sarva budDAnAm pUrva boDisattva caryAm AraBya dAyaka pratigrAhaka vastu parityAga prakAra meGAn sarva roma vivareByaH niScArayamANAn nAnA pAramitA saMprayuktAn pUrva yoga samudrAn saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu bstan pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste /

column1: dAna caryAm lokasya saMvarNayamAnAn mAtsarya malam vinivartayamAnAn sarva grAha utsarge sattvAt niyojayamAnAn
column2: gtong ba dang / len pa dang / dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i rnam pa'i sprin @140a *// mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi spyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang /

column1: vicitra sarva ratna alaMkAra alaMkRtam lokam aDitizWamAnAn dAna pAramitAyAm sattvAn pratizWApya parizkAra vaSitAyAm pratizWApayamAnAn sarva lakzaNa guNAn saMvarNayamAnAn budDa lakzaNa saMBave hetum upadiSyamAnAn apaSyat
column2: sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang / ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo //

column1: asaMKyeya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn= ca boDisattvAt niScaritvA SIla pAramitAm saMvarNayamAnAn
column2: yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing /

column1: sarva budDAnAm SIla pAramitA saMprayuktAn pUrva yoga samudrAn sarva roma vivareByaH saMdarSayamAnAn sarva sattvAn sarva loka gati vizayeByaH vimuKIkRtya taTAgata vizaya aBimuKIkurvANAn
column2: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te /

column1: kAma lokam vijugupsamAnAn viparyAsa pawalam loke vikiramANAn vitaTa parikalpAn praSamayitvA boDisattva SIle saMniyojayamAnAn
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar @140b byas nas /

column1: mahA karuNA SIlam saMvarNayitvA taTAgata SIla pratilamBAya budDa mArga pratipatti SIle sattvAn pratizWApayamAnAn

column2: smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can @143b thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang; sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par dgrol ba dang /

column1: SudDa aDyASayAnAm boDisattvAnAm sarva Darma svaBAva Beda jQAna vajram nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn pUrva yoga saMpannAnAm boDisattvAnAm samantajagat saMgraha vyUham nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn janma jAnAm boDisattvAnAm tri aDva taTAgata parzat maNxala aBimuKa vijQapti meGam nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn yoga AcArANAm boDisattvAnAm sarva Darma svaBAva tala nirGozam nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn
column2: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char @144b mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam bdag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang / thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /

column2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis @145a *//

column1: brahmakAyikAnAm devAnAm apramANa naya sAgara nigarjita Gozam gv nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn vaSa vartinAm devAnAm bala saMBava Darma upakaraNa akzaya koSam nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn mArakAyikAnAm devAnAm citra Dvaja sarvajQa tA saMBAra saMmArjana Gozam nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn nirmANa ratInAm devAnAm jQAna ratna vicitra Duram nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn
column2: dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /

column1: tuzitAnAm devAnAm boDisattva praNiDi vicitra Dvajam nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn yAmAnAm devAnAm sarva taTAgata anusmRti koSam nAma Darma meGa varzam aBipravarzamANAn
column2: mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /

column2: byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul ba 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang / rgya mtsho yongs su skem pa dang / sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs can thams cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad spa bkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul ba mthong ngo // pa spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / @147b dkyil 'khor la la las ni /

column1: ye kula upapatti parigrahAya rUpakAya parinizpattaye ye kalyANa mitra anuSAsanI parigrahAH yAni kalyANa mitra upadeSa pratipatti sTAnAni yAni taTAgata DyAna aFga parinizpatti anurUpa vihAra Bavana vimAna janapada giri kandarANi yAni Rzi SarIrANi yEH tAni DyAna aFgAni nizpAditAni yAni nRpa ADipatyAni yAni nEzkramya muKAni ye vrata samAdAna Akalpa IH yApaTAH tat sarvam suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH paSyat
column2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang / lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigs su skye ba yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / gnas dang; gzhal med khang dang / yul dang / ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang / tshul dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis mthong ngo //

column1: kutaScid roma muKa raSmi jAla maNxalAt yA BagavataH pUrva sarva kalpa praNiDi aBinirhAra caryA sarva sattva paripAka praNiDi aBinirhAra caryA
column2: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo // ba @148b spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni / sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa thams cad du smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang / / zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa ji / / snyed pa dang /

column1: yAni ca sarva praNiDi aBinirhAra maNxalAni tezu tezu taTAgata pAda mUlezu aBinirhRtAni sarva saMsAra dozANAm tasya tasya saMsAra dozasy
column2: smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las 'khor ba'i skyon so so re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrubs pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang /

column1: tad DarmaDAtu vyUha viSudDi jQAna muKam avataran tad budDa aDizWAnam saMpratIcCan jQAnam nistIrayamANaH
column2: sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa / dang /

column2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i sgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa'i mtha' sgo dang; bsod nams kyi sgo dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang; spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang / las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi 'gal pa'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang / lam mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi mnyam pa'i las yongs su spang pa'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang / las la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang / sems rgya @189b mtsho'i sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thibs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo dang; sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang; mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang / chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i @190a *//

column2: sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang; 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / mig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang / phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor @190b gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas /
