column2: smras pa / 'phags pa / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis / de nas lha lha chen @310b pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang / dngul gyi phung po dang / beed'urya'i phung po dang / shel gyi phung po dang / mus ra gal pa'i phung po dang / aasmra gar bha'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che ngang gis snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do'i phung po dang / dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang / rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang / gdu bu'i phung po dang / ska rags kyi phung po dang / rkang gdub kyi phung po dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / gdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas /

column1: sarva roma vivareByaH ca sarva sattva samAn nAnAvarNa saMsTAna Aroha pariNAhAt nAnA upapattika sattva kAya nirmANa meGAt niScArya
column2: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kya [*kyi?] lus kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te; sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la /

column1: yaTA ASayAn sattvAn sParitvA sarvajQa tA mahA saMBAra vIrya parAkramatAm saMdarSayamAnAn sarva mAra kali vikiraNa vIrya tAm boDya AramBa akzoBya avivarti avIryatAm sarva sattva saMsAra sAgara uttAraNa vIryatAm sarva akzaNa apAya durgati vinipAta paTa vinivartana vIrya tAm ajQAna parvata vikiraNa vIrya tAm sarva taTAgata pUjA upasTAna apariKeda vIryatAm sarva budDa Darma cakra saMprati icCana saMDAraNa vIrya tAm
column2: brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba yang dag par ston pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam pa bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor @341a *//

column1: sarva AvaraNa parvata nirBedana vikiraNa vIrya tAm sarva sattva paripAka vinaya apariKeda vIryatAm
column2: ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing /

column1: sarva budDa kzetra pariSoDana vIryatAm anuttarAm taTAgata vIrya viSudDim saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing /

column1: sattvAn paripAcayamAnAn apaSyat
column2: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //

column1: sarva roma vivareByaH ca nAnA varNa saMsTAnAn viviDa Atma BAva nirmANa meGAn niScaritvA nAnA upAyEH sattvAnAm prItim saMjanayamAnAn dOrmanasyam vinivartayamAnAn sarva kAma ratim vijugupsamAnAn hrI Darma tAm loke praBAvayamAnAn gupta indriya tAyAm sattvAn pratizWApayamAnAn anuttara brahmacaryam gv saMvarNayamAnAn sa Bayam kAma loka mAra vizayam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas / lus sna tshogs kha dog dang / dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /

column1: vigata kAma ratInAm api sarva loka kAmarati vizayam saMdarSayamAnAn Darma ArAm a ratyAm sattvAn pratizWApayamAnAn anupUrva DyAna samADi samApatti suKAni aBinirharamANAn sarva sattva sarva kleSa niDi apti citta tAm saMvarNayamAnAn
column2: thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrog pa dang / dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams @341b cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su sten [*ston?] pa dang /

column1: sarva boDisattva samADi samudra vikurvaNa tAm saMdarSayamAnAn boDisattva aBijQA vikurvita vRzaBitAm saMdarSayamAnAn sattvAnAm prItim saMjanayamAnAn prAmodyam utpAdayamAnAn dOrmanasyam vyAvartayamAnAn citta kalya tAm AvahayamAnAn citta karmaNya tAm kurvANAn ASayam viSoDayamAnAn indriyANi uttApayamAnAn kAya suKam saMjanayamAnAn
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston par byed cing /

column1: Darma prIti vegam vivarDayamAnAn sattvAn paripAcayamAnAn apaSyat
column2: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang / lus kyi bde ba yongs su skyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //

column1: sarva roma vivareByaH ca sarva upapatti sadRSa SarIrAt nAnA kAya meGAt niScaritvA sarva kzetra gata sarva sattva aBimuKa aBirucita darSana tAyE sarva kalyANa mitra upasaMkramaNa apariKeda tAm saMdarSayamAnAn sarva AcArya guru kalyANa mitra upasTAna paricaryA pariKeda tAm saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te / zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir / / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / / / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su bzung @342a *//

column1: sarva taTAgata Darma cakra pravartana saMpratIcCana saMDAraNA pariKeda vIryatAm saMdarSayamAnAn sarva Darma muKa samudrAn pravicinvAnAn sarva budDa samudra avatAraNanayam saMvarNayamAnAn sarva Darma lakzaNa svaBAva nayam aBidyotayamAnAn sarva DarmAn samADi dvAram saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang / sangs rgyas mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang / the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'joms pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang /

column1: sarva sattva dRzwi parvata nirBedanam prajQA vajram saMdarSayamAnAn aneka cittakzaNa samAyogena sarva sattva avidyA anDakAra viDamana prajQA Aditya maNxala udAgamam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing /

column1: sarva sattva prIti saMjanana tayA sarvajQa tAyAm sattvAn paripAcayamAnAn apaSyat
column2: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //

column1: sarva roma vivareByaH ca sarva jagat samAn udAra acintya nAnA varNa vikalpa saMsTAn Atma BAva nirmANa meGAt niScaritvA
column2: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /

column1: yaTA ASaya aDimukta sarva sattva aBimuKa sTitAn nAnA ruta mantra saMskAra nirdeSEH sarva lOkika puNya aBijQa tAm saMdarSayamAnAn sarva lOkika kRtya pracArataH ca sarva trEDAtuka saMBava saMdarSanataH ca sarva tra eDAtuka niHsaraNa diS saMvarNa nataH ca
column2: bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas / 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang / @342b 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang / lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas /

column1: sarva dRzwi kAntAra gahana niHsaraNa diS saMdarSanataH ca sarvajQa tA mArga viSeza tAm saMvarNayamAnAn SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmi paTa samatikramam saMdarSayamAnAn saMskAra asaMskAra anunaya pratiGa anunaye pratiGa anunayatAm saMdarSayamAnAn saMsAra nirvANa suKa asaMniSrita tAm saMdarSayamAnAn tuzita Bavana vAsa Adi paraMpara AgamanA pratiprasrabDim saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / rim gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgol [?] mi gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang /

column1: boDimaNxa prasTAna aBisaMboDa apratiprasrabDim saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing /

column1: sarvajQa tAyAm sattvAn paridIpayamAnAn apaSyat sarva roma vivareByaH ca ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt sarva kzetra paramANu rajaH samAna Atma BAva nirmANa meGAt niScaritvA
column2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin pa byed pa mthong ngo; ;ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang /

column1: sarva sattva loka aBimuKa sTitAn samantaBadra boDisattva caryA praNiDAnam saMvarNayamAnAn
column2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te / sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su brjod / pa dang /

column1: sarva DarmaDAtu viSudDi nizWA praNiDAna vESezika tAm saMvarNayamAnAn
column2: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i @343a *//

column1: praticitta kzaNam sarva loka DAtu samudra pariSudDim saMvarNayamAnAn sarva taTAgata pUjA upasTAna apratiprasrabDim saMvarNayamAnAn praticitta kzaNam sarva Darma naya sAgara avatAra apratiprasrabDim saMvarNayamAnAn
column2: smon lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su brjod pa dang /

column1: praticitta kzaNam taTAgata bala praveSa apratiprasrabDa tAm gv saMvarNayamAnAn praticitta kzaNam sarva loka DAtu samudra paramANu rajaH sama sarva Darma DAtu naya sAgara avataraNa apratiprasrabDIH saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing /

column1: sarva kzetrezu aparAnta aDizWAna kalpa saMvAsa sarvajQa tA mArga viSudDi saMprakASanA pratiprasrabDa tAm saMvarNayamAnAn
column2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya bar yongs su brjod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la /

column1: praticitta kzaNam taTAgata bala praveSa apratiprasrabDa tAm saMdarSayamAnAn sarvatri aDvanaya sAgara avatArA pratiprasrabDa tAm saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa byed cing /

column1: boDisattva sarva kzetra RdDi vikurvita saMdarSana apratiprasrabDa tAm saMdarSayamAnAn boDisattva praNiDAna caryA saMdarSanena sarva sattvAn sarvajQa tAyAm pratizWApayamAnAn apaSyat
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo //

column1: sarva roma vivareByaH ca ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt sarva jagat citta samAn kAya nirmANa meGAt niScaritvA sarva sattva aBimuKa sTitAn aparyantam sa aBedya aparyAdattA vinASa Darma sarvajQa tA citta balam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: @343b ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po 'thon te /

column1: avivartya apratyudAvartya aDizWAna apratiprasrabDam anuttara sarva boDisattva caryA samudAgama balam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing; thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongs su ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs mi zad pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chud mi za ba'i chos can yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i stobs phyir mi ldog cing phyir mi ldog la /

column1: sarva saMsAra dozAn anulepa bala tAm boDisattvAnAm saMvarNayamAnAn
column2: thug pa med pa dang / rgyun med pa dang / bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa yongs su ston pa dang /

column1: sarva mAra maNxala vikiraNa balam boDisattvAnAm saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba pa dang / dang /

column1: sarva kleSa malAn anulepa kleSa bala tAm boDisattvAnAm saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang /

column1: sarva karma AvaraNa parvata vikiraNa balam boDisattvAnAm saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: dang / pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba yongs su ston pa dang /

column1: sarva kalpa saMvAsa boDisattva caryA pariKeda mahA karuNA balam boDisattvAnAm saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: dang / pa dang / pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs bskal ba thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas @344a *//

column1: sarva budDa kzetra saMprakampana saMkzoBaNa sarva sattva saMpraharzaNa balam boDisattvAnAm saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: kyi zhing thams cad yongs su bskyod cing bskul bas /

column1: sarva mAra para pravAdi gaNa pramardana balam boDisattvAnAm saMdarSayamAnAn mahA Darma cakra pravartana jQAna balam loke praBAvayamAnAn
column2: sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing /

column1: sarva sattvAn sarvajQa tAyAm paridIpayamAnAn apaSyat
column2: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo cing /

column1: sarva roma vivareByaH ca ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt sarva jagat citta samAdAna ananta varNa kAya nirmANa samudremeGAt niScaritvA daSa diS ananta sattva DAtu sParaNAn yaTA ASaya aDimuktAnAm sattvAnAm boDisattva caryA jQAna vikramam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho kha dog mtha' yas pa /

column1: sarva sattva DAtu samudra avataraNa jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams su rgyas par 'gengs pa 'thon te /

column1: sarva sattva citta samudra avataraNa jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn sarva sattva indriya sAgara parijQA jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn sarva sattva caryA samudra avataraNa jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn sarva sattva paripAka vinaya kAlAn atikramaNa jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn sarva Darma DAtva anuravaNa jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa @344b dang; sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya / ba dang /

column1: praticitta kzaNam sarva Darma DAtu jQAna naya sAgara sParaNa jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn sarva loka DAtu samudra saMvarta vivarta jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn sarva loka DAtu pratizWAna saMsTAna vyUha vikalpa jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang / dbyibs dang / rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te /

column1: sarva taTAgata pUjA vikurvita upasaMkramaNa pUjA upasTAna Darma cakra meGa saMprati icCana jQAnam saMdarSayamAnAn
column2: spyan sngar phyin nas mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa byed cing /

column1: evam jQAna pAramitA caryA saMdarSanena sattvAnAm prItim saMjanayamAnAn apaSyat cittam prasAdayamAnAn prAmodyam utpAdayamAnAn harzam saMjanayamAnAn dOrmanasyam vinivartayamAnAn cittam viSoDayamAnAn citta kalya indriyANi uttApayamAnAn aDimukti balam saMjanayamAnAn sarvajQa tA AyAm a vEvartyAn kurvANAn apaSyat
column2: de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' ba skyed pa dang / sems rab tu dang bar byed pa dang / rab tu dga' ba skyed pa dang / mos pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / sems rnam par sbyong ba dang / sems skyon med pa skye bar byed pa dang / dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang / mos pa'i stobs yongs su skyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed pa mthong ngo //

column1: yaTA ca pAramitA caryA saMdarSanena loke sattvAn paripAkam vrajataH paSyat
column2: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas 'jig rten du ji ltar sems @345a *// can yongs su smin par gyur pa mthong ba de bzhin du /

column1: taTA sarva boDisattva Darma nigarjanena ye ca pramudita nayana jagat virocanAyAH rAtri devatAyAH praTama citta utpAda saMBArAH gv kalyANa mitra arA gaNa prayogAH taTAgata pAda mUla upasaMkramaNa pUjA upasTAna prayogAH kuSala Darma caryA aBiyoga prayogAH ye ca dAna pAramitA caryA duzkara parityAgAH
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i thog ma sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i thabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing mchod pa dang rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtang bar dka' ba yongs su btang ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i thabs dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'khor mang po dang longs spyod kyi dbang chen po yongs su btang ste /

column1: SIla pAramitA pariSoDana prayogAH mahA rAjya ESvarya parivAra Boga ADipatya parityAga aBinizkramaNa prayogAH ye loke duzkara caryA mahA vrata tapaH maNxala kzAnti nirhArAH
column2: mngon par byung ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyod pa brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa'i sbyor ba la mi g-yo bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyes byas dang /

column1: yA boDisattva vrata samAdAna prayoga akampya tA ye boDisattva dRXa samAdAna Darma samudrAH sarva sattva DAtu duzkRta durBAzita duScintita aDivAsana prayogAH kAyika cEtasika pIxA aDivAasana prayogAH
column2: ngan du smra ba dang / nyes par spyod pa thams cad bag la zha bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang / lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su @345b bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /

column1: yA sarva karma avipraNASa Darma tAkzAntiH sarva Darma aDimukti kzAntiH sarva Darma svaBAva niDyAna kzAntiH yat sarvajQa tA AramBa prayoga vIryam yat sarva budDa Darma parinizpAdana vIryam
column2: chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i chos nyid la bzod pa dang / chos thams cad la yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /

column1: yAH sarva vIrya pAramitA caryAH ye DyAna pAramitA saMBArAH DyAna pAramitA aBiyogAH DyAna pAramitA parinizpatti viSudDi caryAH yAni boDisattva samADi pratilABa vikurvitAni ye samADi muKa samudra avatArAH yAni DyAna pAramitA AcaritAni ye prajQApAramitA saMBArAH ye boDisattva mahA prajQA Aditya maNxala viSoDana nayAH
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par spyad pa'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang /

column1: ye mahA prajQA meGa saMBavAH ye prajQA niDAna saMBArAH ye mahA prajQA mahA sAgara vyavacAraNa naya prayogAH
column2: shes rab chen po'i sprin yongs su 'du ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang yod pa dang /

column1: ye mahA upAya kOSalya naya prayogAH ye mahA upAya kOSalya pariSudDi saMprayuktAH pUrva yogAH yAni boDisattva mahA praNiDi pAramitA SarIrANi yAH mahA praNiDi pAramitA parinizpattayaH
column2: / shes rab kyi gter chen po'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang / @346a *// sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol phyin pa yongs su grub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang /

column1: yAni mahA praNiDAna pAramitA AcaritAni ye mahA praNiDAna pAramitA saMprayuktAH pUrva yogAH ye bala pAramitA pratilABa mahA saMBArAH
column2: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs chen po ji snyed cig cad dang / yod pa dang /

column2: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen du gyur pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang; stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji snyed cig yod cad dang / yod pa dang /

column1: ye jQAna pAramitA prayogAH ye jQAna pAramitA viSudDi nayAH yAH jQAna pAramitA AdiSaH
column2: pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi @346b pha rol tu phyin pa 'byams klas pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang /

column1: ye ca pramudita nayana jagat virocanAyAH rAtri devatAyAH praTama citta utpAda saMBAra muKAH pUrva janma samudAgata kuSala citta paraMpara avyava yAni ca boDi citta utpAda praSaMsA paraMpara AnantaryANi gv cyuti upapatti parigraha paraMpara AnantaryANi Atma BAva parigraha paraMpara AnantaryANi nAma cakra paraMpara AnantaryANi

column1: kalyANa mitra upasaMkramaNa paraMpara AnantaryANi budDa utpAda ArAH gaNa paraMpara AnantaryANi Darma pada vyaQjana udgraha paraMpara AnantaryANi boDisattva mArga pratipatti citta paraMpara AnantaryANi samADi pratilABa paraMpara AnantaryANi samADi pratilABAt budDa darSana paraMpara AnantaryANi kzetra darSana cakzu sParaNa paraMpara AnantaryANi kalpa paraMparA jQAna cakra AnantaryANi DarmaDAtu prativeDa jQAna paraMpara AnantaryANi sattva DAtu vyavalokana jQAna paraMpara AnantaryANi DarmaDAtu naya sAgara avataraNa paraMpara acyuti upapatti jQAna paraMpara AnantaryANi divya Srotra pariSudDi pratyavekzaNa jQAna paraMpara anantar
column2: sngon gyi tshe rabs la yongs su bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / shi 'pho dang / skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab @349b chags pa dang / lus yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang; yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang; ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / ting 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / zhing mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par bkang ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can pha rol gyi shi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / lha'i rna ba @350a *//

column1: sarva sattva DAtu citta vyavalokana sarasvatI avakrAnti muKa paraMpara AnantaryANi praTama divya cakzuH avakrAnti muKa paraMpara AnantaryANi praTama divya Srotra vijQapti paraMpara AnantaryANi praTama para sattva citta jQAna paraMpara AnantaryANi praTama Atma para sattva pUrva nivAsa anusmRti jQAna paraMpara AnantaryANi praTama aBAva pratizWAna aBisaMskAra RdDi pratilABa pratyaya paraMpara Anan
column2: yongs su dag pa rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta zhing dbyings la 'jugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam par dmigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / thog ma dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas te /

column1: mahA RdDi vikrama diS sParaNa paraMpara AnantaryANi boDisattva vimokza pratilABa paraMpara AnantaryANi
column2: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang /

column1: boDisattva vimokza sAgara acintyanayA avatAra paraMpara AnantaryANi boDisattva vikurvita paraMpara AnantaryANi boDisattva vikrama paraMpara AnantaryANi boDisattva akrama paraMpara AnantaryANi boDisattva saMjQA gata paraMpara AnantaryANi boDisattva mArga avatAra paraMpara AnantaryANi
column2: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par gnon pas phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin @350b gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa nas /

column1: yAvat yAni pramudita nayana jagat virocanAyAH rAtri devatAyAH boDisattva su sUkzma jQAna praveSa paraMpara AnantaryANi tAni asyAH sarva roma vivareByaH nirmANa kAya meGAt niScaritvA sattveByaH Darmam deSayamAnAn apaSyat
column2: mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon te /

column2: de phra ba la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang / mi g-yo ba'i sems dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang / dbugs phyin pa'i sems dang / dpag tu med pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu zab pa la dmigs pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i tshul rgya mtsho la zhugs pa'i sems dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i sems dang / 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / kha dog rgya mtshos snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang / 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang / g-yo ba med pa'i sems dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / mthon dman med pa'i sems dang / mi skyo ba'i sems dang / mi zlog pa'i sems dang / zhum pa med pa'i sems dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang / chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang / sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas rgya @382b mtsho mang po'i snang ba yongs su skyes pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spobs pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la snang ba thob pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'i sems dang / phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sems dang ldan pas /

column1: budDaH para arTa sa vihAra SirI prakRtI SarIra Siri BadrajinaH ete jinA pramuKa tatra aBUt upapadyi ye jina pradIpa karAH kalpEH sumeru paramANu samEH ye pUjitAH jina samudra naye tEH budDa kzetra paramANu samEH kalpEH upapadyizu ye keci jinAH te sarvi pUjita mayA sugatA etam vimokza nayam otariyA kalpAn ananta ahu cIrNa purA etam vimokza nayu BAvayatI tvam api SruNitva pratipadya laGu pratilapsyase nayam imam nacirAt etam aham kula putra sarva loka aBimuKa jagat vinaya nidarSanam boDisattva vimokzam jAnAmi kim mayA Sakyam ananta maDya boDisattva caryA sAgara nAna aDimukti saMvAsAnAm boDisattvAnAm nAnA ASaya SarIrANAm viviDa indriya sAgara parinizpannAnAm vicitra boDisattva praNiDAna su pratividDAnAm caryAm jQAtum guNAn vA vaktum gacCa kula putra iyam iha eva boDimaNxe praSAnta rutasAgaravatI nAma rAtri devatA yA mama anantaram jyotiH Dvaja maNi rAja pratimaNxita garBe padmAsane nizaNNA daSa rAtri devatA saMKyeya Sata sahasra parivArA tAm upasaMkramya paripRcCa  kaTam boDisattvena boDisattva caryAyAm Sikzitavyam kaTam pratipattavyam aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH samantasattva trANojaH SriyaH rAtri devatAyAH pAdO SirasA aBivandya samantasattva trANojaH Sriyam rAtri devatAm aneka Sata sahasra kRtvas pradakziNIkRtya punar punar avalokyam samantasattva trANojaH SriyaH rAtri devatAyAH antikAt prakrAntaH gv praSAnta ruta sAgaravatI aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH samantasattva trANojaH SriyaH rAtri devatAyAH tam sarva loka aBimuKa jagat vinaya nidarSanam boDisattva vimokzam BAvayan avataran aDimucyamAnaH vagAhayamAnaH vipulIkurvANaH sParan prasaran vaSIkurvan avaBAsayamAnaH samavasaran yena praSAnta ruta sAgaravatI rAtri devatA tena upasaMkramya praSAnta ruta sAgaravatyA rAtri devatAyAH pAdO SirasA aBivandya praSAnta ruta sAgaravatIm rAtri devatAm aneka Sata sahasra kRtvas pradakziNIkRtya praSAnta ruta sAgaravatyA rAtri devatAyAH puratas prAQjaliH sTitvA evam Aha  aham Arye devate anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO saMprasTitaH saH ham kalyANa mitra saMniSrayeNa boDisattva caryAyAm SikzamANaH boDisattva caryAm avataran boDisattva caryAyAm pratipadyamAnaH boDisattva caryAyAm pratizWitaH sarvajQa tAyAm niryAtum icCAmi tat vadasva me Arye devate kaTam boDisattvena boDisattva caryAyAm Sikzitavyam kaTam pratipattavyam aTa Kalu praSAnta ruta sAgaravatI rAtri devatA su Danam SrezWi dArakam etat avocat  sADu sADu kula putra yaH tvam kalyANa mitra saMniSrayeNa boDisattva caryA sAgaram parimArgasi aham kula putra vipula prIti vega saMBava cid ta kzaNa vyUhasya boDisattva vimokzasya lABinI suDanaH Aha  kiMkarmA asi devate kiMvizayA asi kiMprayogA kiMvyavacArA kaH etasya vipula prIti vega saMBava citta kzaNa vyUhasya boDisattva vimokzasya vizayaH sA avocat  aham kula putra citta ASaya sAgara pariSudDi samatA pratipannA sarva loka rajaH mala vimalA Bedya vyUha saMpratipannA avEvartya apratyudAvartyAramBa cittA ratna parvata guNa alaMkAra akampya cittA apratizWita anAlaya cittA sarva jagat paritrANa aBimuKa cittA sarva budDa samudra darSanA vitRpta cittA sarva boDisattva bala ASaya viSudDa cittA mahA jQAna avaBAsa vyUha smRti sAgara saMvAsa cittA sarva sattva Soka kAntA rasamatikramaNAya pratipannA sarva sattva duHKa dOrma nasya vinivartanAya aBiyuktA sarva sattvAnAm nAma rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sparSa samudAcAra vinivartanAya pratipannA sarva sattvAnAm priya apriya viprayoga saMprayoga duHKa vyupaSamAya pratipannA sarva sattvAnAm vizaya pratyaya saMBava saMmoha duHKa vinivartana prayuktA vinipatita sarva sattva pratiSaraNa BUtA sarva sattva saMsAra saMvAsa duHKa niHsaraNa saMdarSana aBiyuktA sarva sattvAnAm jAti jarA maraNa Soka parideva duHKa dOrmanasya upAyAsa vinivartanAya pratipannA sarva sattvAnAm anuttara taTAgata suKa parinizpattaye pratipannA sarva grAma nagara nigama janapada rAzwra rAja DAnI gatAnAm sattvAnAm suKa upasTAnena tuzwim vindAmi tezAm ca DArmikIm rakzA AvaraNa guptim saMvid aDAmi anupUrveNa ca tAn sarvajQa tAyAm paripAcayAmi yat uta mahA Bavana vimAna gatAnAm sattvAnAm anaBiratim saMjanayAmi tAni tAni ca dOrmanasyAni vyapanayAmi sarva aBiniveSa vyavacCedAya sarva Darma svaBAva parijQAyE ca Darmam deSayAmi mAtA pitR BrAtR BaginI jQAti sa Alohita samavaDAna gatAnAm sattvAnAm cira kAla saMjAta snehAnAm budDa boDisattva samavaDAna pratilABAya Darmam BAryA putra samavaDAna gatAnAm gv sattvAnAm sarva saMsAra rati tRzNA prahANAya sarva sattva sama citta tAyE mahA karuNA pratilABAya Darmam deSayAmi antarApaNa maDya gatAnAm sattvAnAm Arya saMGa taTA gata darSana samavaDAna samavasaraNa tAyE Darmam deSayAmi Boga mada mattAnAm sattvAnAm kzAnti pAramitA paripUraNAya Darmam deSayAmi nRtta gIta vAdya aBiratAnAm sattvAnAm Darma ArAm a ratyE Darmam deSayAmi vizaya rati gRdDAnAm sattvAnAm taTAgata vizaya samavasaraNa tAyE Darmam deSayAmi kroDa AvizwAnAm sattvAnAm kzAnti pAramitA pratizWApanatAyE Darmam deSayAmi kusIdAnAm sattvAnAm vIrya pAramitA pariSudDaye Darmam deSayAmi viBrAnta cittAnAm sattvAnAm taTAgata DyAna pAramitA pratilABAya Darmam deSayAmi dRzwi kRta gahana praskannAnAm sattvAnAm avidyA anDakAra patitAnAm dRzwi kRta gahana avidyA anDakAra vinivartana tAyE Darmam deSayAmi duzprajQAnAm sattvAnAm prajQApAramitA pratilABAya Darmam deSayAmi trEDAtuka aBinivizwAnAm sattvAnAm saMsAra duHKa niHsaraNAya Darmam deSayAmi hIna aDimuktAnAm sattvAnAm taTAgata boDi praNiDAna paripUraye Darmam deSayAmi Atma hita prayuktAnAm sattvAnAm sarva sattva hita Avahana praNiDAna paripUraye Darmam deSayAmi durbala aDyASayAnAm sattvAnAm boDisattva bala pAramitA viSudDaye Darmam deSayAmi avidyA tamonDakAra cetasAm sattvAnAm boDisattva jQAna pAramitA viSudDaye Darmam deSayAmi virUpa kAyAnAm sattvAnAm taTAgata rUpa kAya viSudDaye Darmam deSayAmi visaMsTita SarIrANAm sattvAnAm anuttara Darma kAya viSudDaye Darmam deSayAmi durvarNAnAm sattvAnAm sUkzma taTAgata suvarNa varNa= CavitAyE kAcilindika suKa saMsparSa SarIra tA viSudDaye Darmam deSayAmi duHKitAnAm sattvAnAm atyanta taTA gata suKa pratilABAya Darmam deSayAmi suKitAnAm sattvAnAm sarvajQa tA suKa pratilABAya Darmam deSayAmi glAnAnAm AturANAm sattvAnAm pratiBAsA upama boDisattva kAya parinizpattaye Darmam deSayAmi vicitra rati prasaktAnAm sattvAnAm boDisattva caryA arati pratilABAya Darmam deSayAmi daridrANAm sattvAnAm boDisattva Darma niDAna koSa pratilABAya Darmam deSayAmi udyAna gatAnAm sattvAnAm budDa Darma paryezwI aBiyoga AhetutAyE Darmam deSayAmi mArga gatAnAm sattvAnAm sarvajQa tA mArga pratipattaye Darmam deSayAmi grAma gatAnAm sattvAnAm sarva tra eDAtuka niHsaraNa tAyE Darmam deSayAmi janapada pradeSa gatAnAm sattvAnAm SrAvaka pratyeka boDi mArga samatikramAya taTAgata BUmi pratizWApanatAyE Darmam deSayAmi nagara gatAnAm sattvAnAm DarmarAja nagara avaBAsana tAyE Darmam deSayAmi vidiggatAnAm sattvAnAm tri aDva samatA jQAna pratilABAya Darmam deSayAmi diggatAnAm sattvAnAm sarva Darma jQAna aBijQa tAyE Darmam deSayAmi ekAnta rAga caritAnAm sattvAnAm aSuBa muKena sarva saMsAra rati tRzNA vinivartana tAyE Darmam deSayAmi doza caritAnAm sattvAnAm mahA mEtrI naya sAgara avataraNa tAyE Darmam deSayAti moha caritAnAm sattvAnAm sarva Darma muKa samudra pravicaya jQAna aBijQa tAyE Darmam deSayAmi sama BAga caritAnAm sattvAnAm sarva yAna praNiDAna naya sAgara vESezika tAyE Darmam deSayAmi saMsAra vizaya rati ASayAnAm sattvAnAm saMsAra vizaya rati vinivartana tAyE Darmam deSayAmi sarva saMsAra duHKa spRzwAnAm sattvAnAm sarva saMsAra duHKa anupaklizwa tAyE Darmam deSayAmi gv  taTAgata vEnayikAnAm sattvAnAm anutpAda pada saMprakASa na tAyE Darmam deSayAmi skanDa niketa ASayAnAm sattva anAm anAlaya Darma gocara vihAra tAyE Darmam deSayAmi saMlIna ASayAnAm sattvAnAm mArga vyUha viSeza saMprakASa na tAyE Darmam deSayAmi aDimAna prAptAnAm sattvAnAm sarva Darma sama tA kzAntim saMprakASayAmi mAyA SAWya vizaya ASayAnAm sattvAnAm boDisattva ASaya pariSudDim saMprakASayAmi evam aham kula putra sarva sattvAn Darma dAnena saMgRhya sarva duHKa durgati paTeByaH vinivartayamAnAH deva manuzya saMpatti suKAni saMdarSayamAnA trEDAtukAt uccAlayamAnA sarvajQa tAyAm pratizWApayamAnAH viviDEH upAya muKEH paripAcayamAnAH mahA prIti vega samudra avaBAsa pratilabDA modAmi pramodAmi Atta manaskA BavAmi api tu Kalu punar aham kula putra sarva diS vidikzu boDisattva parzad maNxala samudrAn avalokayamAnA nAnA praNiDAna caritAnAm boDisattvAnAm nAnA kAya viSudDAnAm nAnA praBA maNxala vyUhAnAm ananta varNa raSmi praBA maNxalam pramuQcamAnAnAm nAnA sarvajQa tA naya sAgara prasRta jQAna AlokAnAm nAnA samADi samudra avatIrNAnAm nAnA vikurvita vizayANAm nAnA svara aFga ruta sAgara nirGozANAm nAnA ABaraNa viBUzita SarIrANAm nAnA taTA gatanaya avatIrNAnAm nAnA kzetra samudra prasara prasRta SarIrANAm nAnA budDa sAgara avatIrNAnAm nAnA pratisaMvinnaya sAgara avatIrNAnAm nAnA taTA gata vimokza jQAna vizaya avaBAsitAnAm nAnA jQAna sAgara avaBAsa pratilabDAnAm nAnA samADi samudra naya vihAriNAm nAnA Darma vimokza vinaya vikrIxita vizayANAm nAnA sarvajQa tA dvAra aBimuKAnAm nAnA Darma DAtu gagana vyUhAnAm nAnA vyUha meGa gagana sParaNAnAm nAnA parzad maNxala samudra vyavalokayitLNAm nAnA prIti vega loka DAtu saMnipatitAnAm nAnA budDa kzetra prasara anusRtAnAm nAnA AdiS sAgara saMnipatitAnAm taTAgata saMprezitAnAm nAnA taTA gata pAda mUla uccalitAnAm nAnA boDisattva gaNa parivArANAm nAnA vyUha meGa pravarzaNAnAm nAnA taTA gatanaya avatIrNAnAm nAnA taTA gata Darma sAgara vicArANAm nAnA jQAna samudra avatIrNAnAm nAnA vyUha garBa avaBAsana nizaNNAnAm nAnA prIti vega samudrAn saMjanayAmi te nAnA prIti vega samudra saMjAtAH taTAgata parzat maNxala samudrAn avataranti paSyanti vicArayanti tezAm taTAgata bala apramANa tAm anuvicintayatAm mahA prIti vega samudrAH saMBavanti api tu Kalu punar aham kula putra BagavataH vErocanasya lakzaNa pratimaNxitAm acintyAm rUpa kAya pariSudDim avataramANA laBAmi udAra prI praticitta kzaNam ananta maDya varNa samudra saMdarSana Darma DAtu vipulam praBAsa maNxalam avalokayamAnA cit takzaNe cit takzaNe mahA prIti vpratilaBe punar aparam kula putra BagavataH vErocanasya kAyAt eka ekasmAt roma vivarAt ananta maDya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn mahA raSmi samudrAn ekEkAm ca raSmim ananta budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama raSmi samudra parivArAm sarva budDa Darma DAtu sParaNAm sarva sattva duHKAni praSama yamAnAm dRzwvA cit takzaNe cit takzaNe mahA prIti vega samudrAn pratilaBe punar aparam kula putra BagavataH vErocanasya uttamAFgAt aMsa kUwAByAm ca praticid ta kzaNam sarva budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn sarva ratna arciH parvata meGAn niScaramANAn sarva Darma DAtu sParaNAn dRzwvA udArAn mahA prIti vega samudrAn pratilaBe gv punar aparam kula putra BagavataH vErocanasya kAyAt eka ekasmAt roma vivarAt praticitta kzaNam sarva budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama varNAn nAnA ganDa raSmi meGAn niScaramANAn sarva budDa kzetra sParaNAn dRzwvA udArAn prIti column1: tasya anantaram Darma ratna kusuma SrI meGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram SAntipraBagamBIrakUwaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram raSminetrapratiBAsapraBacandraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram jQAnArciSrIsAgaraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantajQAnaBadramaNxalaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram aDaUrDvadigjQAna avaBAsaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram raSmisaMkusumita pradIpaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram jQAnasiMhaketuDvaja rAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantasUrya avaBAsa praBarAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram ratna lakzaNa viBUzitameruH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram sUryavikrama samantapratiBAsaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmajAlavibudDaSrIcandraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma padma praPullita SrImeGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram lakzaNa sUrya cakra samantapraBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantAvaBAsaDarmaSrI GozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram vESAradyavajranArAyaNa siMhaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantajQAnaDvajaSUraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmapadmaPulla gAtraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram guNakusumaSrI sAgaraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmaDanaSiKara ABaskanDaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram jQAna SiKara arci meGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samanta Darma dvAra vahana SiKara ABaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram boDimaNxavibudDaSrIcandraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmolkAjvalana SrIcandraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantapratiBAsacUxaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma meGaDvajapradIpaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram vajrasAgaraDvaja meGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram yaSaH parvata SrImeGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram candanaSrIcandraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantaSrIkusuma tejABaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram sarva sattva avaBAsa tejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram guNapadmaSrIgarBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram ganDArciH avaBAsa rAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram hetupadmaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram lakzaNaparvatavErocanaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantaviGuzwakIrtiDvajaH nAma taTAgataH gu  ArAgitaH tasya anantaram sama jQAna praBAmeruH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma nagara praBaSrIH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram drumaparvata tejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samanta SrIvErocanaketuH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmasAgaranirnAda nirGozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram sarva Darma BAvanA AramBasaMBavatejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantajQAnABa pravaraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram varalakzaNa SrIH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmabalaSUlaDvajaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma cakra praBa nirGozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH
column2: mngon par 'phags 'od dpal gyi bcom ldan 'das //

column1: tasya anantaram raSmi guNam akuwa jQAna prajQA praBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma cakracandra udgata SrIH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma padma vErocana vibudDaketuH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram ratnapadma avaBAsa garBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram ratnaSrI SiKarameDa pradIpaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantasUcisuviSudDa jQAnakusumaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram nAnAraSmiSrImeru garBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram raSmimaNxalaSiKararAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram puNyameGacUxaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmaSiKaraDvaja meGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram guNaparvata tejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma sUryameGapradIpaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma meGa viGuzwakIrti rAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma maNxala pawala meGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram vibudDa jQAnaboDiDvaja tejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmamaNxalavibudDaSrIcandraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram kanakamaNiparvatatejoBadraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram BadraSrImerutejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samanta prajQapti nirGoza meGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmamalaSrI kUwaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram ganDArci meGaSrI rAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram kanakamaNiparvataGozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram uzNIza koSa sarva Darma praBA maNxalameGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma cakrajvalana tejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram SEla SiKara aByudgata tejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantavIrya ulkA avaBAsa meGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samADi mudrA vipulam akuwa prajQA praBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram ratnaruciraSrI rAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma ulkA ratnavitAna GozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darma gagana kAnta siMha praBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram lakzaNaviBUzitaDvajacandraH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram raSmiparvata vidyA utita meGaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram anAvaraNa DarmagaganapraBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH gv  tasya anantaram lakzaNarucirasupuzpita aFgaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram loka indrapravarapraBa GozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram sarva Darma samADipraBaGozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram dvArasvarapraBUtakoSaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram Darmajvalana arciHsAgaraGozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tryaDva lakzaNa pratiBAsa tejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmamaNxalaSrI SiKara ABa praBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram DarmaDAtu siMhapraBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram sarva samADi sAgara avaBAsa siMhaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantajQAnapraBAsaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram samantaprajQABaDamarnagarapradIpaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH iti hi kula putraH etat budDa Satam pramuKam kRtvA tasmin vimala ABe kalpe sumeru paramANu rajaH samAH taTAgatAH utpannAH aBUvan tezAm punar kula putra sumeru paramANu rajaH samAnAm taTAgatAnAm sarva paScimaH DarmaDAtu nagarABa jQAnapradIpa rAjaH nAma taTAgataH BUt te Kalu mayA kula putra sumeru paramANu rajaH samAH taTAgatAH sarva Darma sAgara nirGoza praBa rAja pUrvaMgamA DarmaDAtu nagara ABa jQAna pradIsarve pUjitAH sarvezAm ca me taTAgatAnAm upasTAnam kRtam sarvezAm ca Darma deSanA SrutA sarvezAm ca tezAm aham taTAgatAnAm SAsane pravrajitA sarvezAm ca me tezAm taTAgatAnAm SAsanam saMDAritam sarvezAm ca mayA tezAm taTAgatAnAm antikAt eza manojQa ruta gamBIra vikurvita praveSaH boDisattva vimokzaH viviDEH pratilABa nayEH pratil sarvezAm ca mayA tezAm taTAgatAnAm antikAt ananta maDyAH sattva sAgarAH paripAcitAH tatas rvAc budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samezu yAvantaH taTAgatAH utpannAH sarve te mayA taTAgatAH Darma pratipattyA pUjitAH sA Kalu punar aham kula putra tatas upAdAya saMsAra rAtri gatezu sattvezu ajQAna nidrA prasuptezu jAgarmi citta nagaram ca ezAm paripAlayAmi trEDAtuka nagarAt ca enAnuccAlya sarvajQa tA Darma nagare pratizWApayAmi etam aham kula putra manojQa ruta gamBIra vikurvita praveSam boDisattva vimokzam loka saMBinna pralApa vinivartanam advaya BaNitA viniyojanajAnAmi kim mayA Sakyam boDisattvAnAm avipratibadDa sarva vAkpaTa svaBAva jQAnAnAm praticitta kzaNam sarva Darma aBisaMboDi vaSa vartinAm sarva sattva vacana ruta Goza sAgara avatIrNAnAm sarva mantra samudra saMskAra kuSalAnAm sarva Darma saMKyAnAmasamudra naya viDi jQAnAm sarva Darma samavasaraNa DAraNI samudra vaSa vartinAm sarva sattva yaTA ASaya Darma meGa aBinirhAra kuSalAnAm sarva sattva paripAka vinaya caryA paryavasAnAnAm caryAm jQAtum guNAn vA vaktum sarva sattva saMgraha pratipattiH vA jQAtum anuttaraH boDisattva karma samAramBa prayogaH vA boDisattva sUkzma jQAna anugamaH vA boDisattva Darma niDAna koSa viBakta vRzaBitA boDisattva kvA jQAtum tat kasya hetoH taTA hi te sat puruzAH sarva Darma BUmi maNxala DA araNI avakrAntAH gacCa kula putra iyam iha eva BagavataH vErocanasya pAda mUle sarvavRkzapraPullanasuKasaMvAsA nAma rAtri devatA saMnipatitA yA mama anantaram saMnizaNNA tAm upasaMkramya paripRcCa  kaTam boDisattvAH sarvajQa tAyAm Sikzante kaTam ca pratipadyamAnAH sarva sattvAn sarvajQa tAyAm pratizWApayanti gv aTa Kalu sarvanagara rakzA saMBava tejaH SrI rAtridevatA tasyAm velAyAm etam eva manojQa ruta gamBIra vikurvita praveSam boDisattva vimokzam BUyasyA mAtrayA saMdarSayamAnA su Danam SrezWi dArakam gATABiH aDi aBAzata
column2: rdo rje 'od dang sa yi gzi brjid dpal //

column1: gamBIra durdRSu vimokza jina AtmajAnAm AkASa lakzaNa samanta tala praveSaH tri aDva sTitAn avataranti jinAn aSezAn yEH DarmaDAtu prasarAm ca ananta maDyAn saMBAra saMBava vimokza nayAn anantAn pratilABa DarmataH acintiya aprameyAn saMvarDanAm api samanta asaFga vegam avagAha mEtrizu tri yaDvana yazpaTezu iti budDa kzetra parivarta rajaH samAnAm kalpAnam Adi gatam Asa purA hi kzetram
column2: rgyal ba zab chos 'od kyi rgyal po dpal //

column1: Darma arci meGa nagaraH Siri lokaDAtu kalpaH baBUva vimala ABa mahA praBaH ca tatra eva kalpi jina vaMSi anUpa Cinne budDAH sumeru paramANu samAH upannAH
column2: chos kyi rgya mtsho dbyangs kyi blo gros dang // ri rab rgyal mtshan dpal dang blo gros snang //

column1: Darma samudra praBa garjita rAja budDaH purvaMgamaH praTama kalpikaH Asi tezAm jinu Darma meGa nagara ABa pradIpa rAjaH yaH sarva paScimu aBUt sugatAna tezAm te sarvi pUjita mayA upasaMkramitvA DarmaH ca teza mi SrutaH janayitva prItim
column2: rgyal ba bcu pa rin chen rgyal po dpal //

column1: dRzwaH mayA praTamu kAQcana varNa raSmiH DarmaH samudra praBa garjita Goza rAjaH dvAtriMSat lakzaNa vicitritu meru kalpaH dRzwvA ca me matiH aBUt sugataH Baveyam saha darSanena mama tasya taTAgatasya prAdurbaBUva balavat jina cittam Adyam sarvajQa tA prasara saMBava pratyayeBiH AkASa DAtu vimalam taTatA svaBAvam yena triyaDva gata sarvi sPuwAH samantAt budDAH ca tad suta samudra vRtAH aSezAH gv kzetra arNavAH api samudra sarve Asan kRpA amRta mahA udaDi saMBaveta kAyena sarvi sParaNa arTam aSeza kzetrA kAyam yaTASaya jagat vinidarSanAya kzetrANi aSezam avaBAsana kampanAya pAkAya ca eva jagatAm janitam manaH me dvitIye yat jinasya upasaMkramaNe pi dRzwAH kzetra arNavezu daSasu sTitaH ye jinendrAH kzetrAH samudra paramANu rajaH samezu kzetra arNavezu jina paScimake mi dRzwAH sarva anta kzetra parivarta rajaH samezu kalpezu ye jinaH upan na jagat pradIpAH te sarvi pUjita mayA upasaMkramitvA evam vimokza naya sAgaru SoDayeyam aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH manojQa ruta gamBIra vikurvita praveSam boDisattva vimokzam pratilabDaH ananta maDya samADi muKa samudra avatIrNaH vipula DAraNI muKa samudra saMBUta cetA boDisattva mahA aBijQA avaBAsa pratilabDaH mahA prIti saMvid sAgara avatIrNaH vipula prIti vega sAgara vivarDita cetAH sarvanagara rakzA saMBava tejaH Sriyam rAtri deva tAm ABiH sArUpyABiH gATABiH aByazwAvIt prajQA hi te vipula Darma samudra cArI cIrNA ca me Bava samudra ananta maDyAn dIrGa Ayu nirjvara su jQAna SarIra garBe tvam devi rocasi imAm parizAm upetya buDyitva Darma prakRtim gagana prakASAm sarvatriya Dvanayamotarase asaFgam ArambaNAni tulayasi api ca avikalpA cittakzaNena api tAni acintiyAni niHsattva Darmata nirIkzasi jQAnacakzuH sattva udaDIn karuNa yAvatarasi anantAn budDyA vimokza sugaBIra vigAhamAnA sarvAn vinesi paripAcayase prameyAn
column2: tshangs pa'i 'od dang rgyal ba nam mkha'i dbyings //

column1: tvam Darma maNxala vicAra naye viDi jQA Darma svaBAva prativeDa naye vibudDA gv sarva Arya mArgam amalam pariBAvayantI niryAtyase jagat aSeza viSoDayantI tvam sattva sAraTi varAn aBiBUta devi sarvajQa jQAnam amalam pratigrAhamAnA tvam DarmaDAtu gata sarvi sParitva sattvAn Darmam prakASya Baya sarvi Samesi loke vErocana praNiDi mArga nayena devi yAsyasya saFga vipula amala budDi yuktA sarvatra jina balam pratipadyamAnA saMpaSyase jina vikurvita sarva kzetrEH cittam durAsadu tavA gagana prakASam sarve kila ISam ali nirmalam Adi SudDam yasmin samosari tri yaDvaga sarva kzetrAH budDAH ca sa Atmaja gaNAH saha sarva sattvEH rAtriMdivam kzaNa lavAn Rtu pakza mAsAn saMvatsarAn= ca sa vinASa vitarka kalpAn kalpa arNavAn api sanAma samudra saMKyAn saMjQA udaDIn jagatAm vidarSayasi kzaNena diSatAsu yAvata tu sattva cyuta upapAdAH ye rUpiNAm api ca saMjQia saMjQinAm ca vyavahAra satya nayaH otaramANA tezAm mArgam vidarSya vara boDi paTe praNesi vErocana praNiDi jAla kulAt prasRtA praBUta sarva sugata eka samucCrayAt ca tvam DarmakAya pariSudDa asaFga cittAH rUpam vidarSayami loki yaTASayAnAm aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH sarvanagara rakzA saMBava tejaH Sriyam rAtri deva tAmABiH sArUpyABiH gATABiH aBizwutya sarvanagara rakzA saMBava tejaH SriyaH rAtri devatAyAH pAdO SirasA aBivandya sarvanagara rakzA saMBava tejaH Sriyam rAtri devatAm aneka Sata sahasra kRtvas pradakziNIkRtya punar punar avalokya sarvanagara rakzA saMBava tejaH SriyaH rAtri devatAyAH antikAt prakrAntaH gv sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsA aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH manojQa ruta gamBIra vikurvita praveSam boDisattva vimokzam BUyasyA mAtrayA praBAvayamAnaH saMBAvayamAnaH vipulIkurvan yena sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsA rAtri devatA tena upasaMkrAntaH saH paSyat sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAm rAtri devatAm ratnadruma aFkura garBe siMhAsane sarva ganDa ratna druma SAKe kUwAgAre saMniz aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAyAH rAtri devatAyAH pAdO SirasA aBivandya puratas prAQjaliH sTitvA evam Aha  mayA Arye devate anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAditam na ca jAnAmi  kaTam boDisattvena boDisattva caryAyAm caritavyam kaTam Sikzitavyam tat vadasva me devate kaTam boDisattvAH boDisattva caryAyAm caranti kaTam Sikzante kaTam caritvA kaTam SikzitvA niryAnti sarvajQa tAyAm evam ukte sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAH rAtri devatA su Danam SrezWi dArakam etat avocat mama kula putra anuBAvena sahe lokaDAtO Aditya astaMgamana kAle padmAni praPullAni suganDIBavanti sarve nagara nArI gaNAH ca udyAna gatAH rati krIxA prayuktAH gRha gamanAya matim utpAdayanti paTA utpaTa gatAH sattvAH rAtri sTAne cetanA bahulAH sarva jagat pAlana aBimuKAH Bavanti darI gahana guhA ASrayAH sattvAH darI gahana guhAsu praviSanti vRkza Alaya ASrayAH sattvAH vRkza Alaya ASraya aBimuKAH Bavanti vilASrayAH sattvAH bilAni anupraviSanti grAma nagara nigama janapada ASrayAH sattvAH grAma nagara nigama janapadAn anupraviSanti udaka ASrayAH sattvAH jalam avataranti anya diS janapada gatAH sattvAH sva jana pada diS cetanAm utpAdayanti rAtrO suKa sparSa vihArAya api tu Kalu punar aham kula putra nara nArI gaNAnAm daharANAm taruNAnAm yOvana mada mattAnAm nRtya gIta vAdya rati pramattAnAm sattvAnAm kAma guNa pramuktAnAm jAti jarA maraNa mahA anDakAra Baya pratipakzAya kuSala mUla saMjAna aBiyogam saMvarNayAmi matsariNaH sattvAn dAne saMniyojayAmi duHSIlAn sattvAn SIle pratizWApayAmi vyApanna cittAnAm sattvAnAm mEtrIm saMvarNayAmi kzuBita cittAn sattvAn kzAntO pratizWApayAmi kusIdAn sattvAn boDisattva vIrya AramBe pratizWApayAmi viBrAnta cittAn sattvAn DyAnezu pratizWApayAmi duHprajQAn sattvAn prajQApAramitAyAm niyojayAmi hIna yAna aDimuktAn sattvAt mahAyAn pratizWApayAmi trEDAtuka aBinivizwAn sattvAn Bava gati nizWA maNxala cAriNaH boDisattva praNiDAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApayAmi AvaraNa vaSa gatAn sattvAn karma kleSa prapIxitAn puNya jQAna bala parihINAn boDisattva bala pAramitAyAm pratizWApayAmi ajQAna tamaH vanadDAn sattvAn ahaMkAra mamakAra vidyA anDakAra prAptAn boDisattva jQAna pAramitAyAm pratizWApayAmi api tu Kalu punar aham kula putra vipula prIti saMBava saMtuzwi avaBAsasya boDisattva vimokzasya lABinI suDanaH Aha  kaH etasya devate vipula prIti saMBava tuzwi avaBAsasya boDisattva vimokzasya gv vizayaH Aha  taTAgata puNya sattvaMsaMgraha jQAna upAya avaBAsaH eza kula putra vimokzaH tat kasya hetoH yat kiMcid kula putra sattvAH suKam anuBavanti sarvam tat taTAgata puNya praBAvena taTAgata anuSAsanI paTena taTAgata vacana pratipattyA taTAgata anuSikzaNena taTAgata aDizWAnena taTAgata jQAna mArga pratipattyA taTAgata BAga kuSala mUla avaropaNena taTAgata Darma deSanA nizyandena taTAgata jQAna sUrya avaBAsena taTAgata gotra Sukla karma maNxala praBayA hi kula putra sattvAnAm suKAni saMBavanti tat kasya hetoH taTA hi kula putra aham etam vipula prIti saMBava saMtuzwi avaBAsam boDisattva vimokzam avatarantI BagavataH vErocanasya taTAgatasya arhataH samyaksaMbudDasya pUrva boDisattva caryA samudram samanusmarantI avatarantI avagAhayamAnAH evam jAnAmi evam anugacCAmi  yaTA BagavataH pUrva boDisattva BUmi maDyAlambamAnasya sattvAn ahaMkAra mamakAra aBinivizwAn avidyA anDakAra prAptAn dRzwi gahana kAntAra pravizwAn= tRzNA vaSaMgatAn rAga banDana badDAn doza pratiGa cetasaH moha Akula saMtAnAnIrzyA mAtsarya paryavanadDAn kleSa samAkula cittAn mahat saMsAra duHKam pratyanuBavataH saMsAra dAridrya duHKa prapIxitAn budDa darSana vimuKAn sattvAn dRzwvA mahA karuNA cittam prAduraBavat sarva sattvAnAm arTam sarva jagat upakaraNa ratna saMgraha parigraha cittam sarva sattva saMsAra upakaraNa saMBava cittam sarva vastu Agraha vigata cittam sarva vizaya AlubDa cittam sarva ratizu anaDya vasita cittam sarva pariBogezu agRdDa cittam sarva dAnezu vipAka apratikAFkzaNa cittam sarva loka saMpattizu aspRhaNa acittam hetu pratyaya saMmUXa cittam su paryezita yaTAvat Darma niDi apti cittam sarva sattva arTa pratiSaraNa tA aBinirharaNa cittam prAduraBavat saH evam yaTA BUta sarva Darma svaBAva avatIrNa cetAH sarva sattva DAtO mahA mEtrI samatA pratipannaH sarva jagat mahA karuNA meGa sParaNa prayogaH sarva sattva loka saMCAdana mahA Darma= Catra maNxalaH sarva sattva kleSa parvata vinirBedana mahA jQAna vajra praharaNaH sarva jagat suKa saMBava tuzwi vega saMvarDita cetAH sarva sattva atyanta suKa aBinirhAra praNiDAna cetAH yaTA ASaya aBiprAya sarva sattva vastu aBipravarzaNa cetAH sarva sattva aparityAga sama prayoga cetAH Arya Dana sarva sattva saMtarpaNa cetAH parama daSa bala jQAna ratna pratilamBa cetA boDisattva mahA aBijQA bala ADAna prAptaH viviDa boDisattva mahA vikurvita meGena DarmaDAtu parama AkASa DAtu paryavasAnam sarva sattva DAtum sParitvA sarva sattva aBimuKa sTitaH sarva AkAra sarva ArambaNa mahA meGam pravartayan sarva ratna ABaraNa mahA meGa varzam ca aBipravarzan yat uta sarva sattvAnAm yaTA anukUla pariBogAya ananta vastu vimAtra tA pariti Agama prameya upakaraNa vEmAtra cAritram nAnAviDa sarva dAna saMgraha prayogam aneka viDa vastu parityAga samudAcAram anaBilApya upakaraNa jAta vyUha aBisaMskAram nAnA lakzaNa dAna saMBAra vicitram yaTASaya sattva saMtozaNam ananta tyAga viDim anugacCan yaTASaya sattva saMtarpaNa aBinirhAram sarva vastu tyAga visarjanam avicCinna sarva jagat saMskAra duHKa paritrANa prayogam sarva sattva pratikAra apratikAFkzI sarva jagat samatA samudAgata cetAH sarva jagat citta ratnam pariSoDayamAnaH sarva budDa eka Gana kuSala mUla samudra saMBUtam sarva jagat yaTA ASaya upakaraNa varzaMsaMgraha prayogam sarva jagat sarvajQa tA puNya samudrA ivagam vivarDayan praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sarva sattva paripAka vinaya paraMpara aviSudDaye gv BiniH harati sma praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sarva kzetra paraMpara anupaklizwa anuttara budDa kzetra alaMkAra viSudDa vyUha pratimaNxala paripUraye praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sarva Darma naya sAgara karaNa viSudDaye praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza AkASa DAtu tala sParaNa jQAna naya paripUraye praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sattva aDyavataraNa jQAna naya viSudDaye praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sarva jagat vinaya jQAna nayA avaBAsa pratilamBA praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sarva kAla Darma cakra pravartana aBivartyatAyE praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sarvajQa jQAna aDizWAna kOSala saMdarSan praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sarva loka DAtu saMKyA pracArezu sarva loka DAtu samudra aByudgatezu sarva loka DAtu samudra samavasaraNezu nAnA loka DAtu prasara nirdeSezu nAnA loka DAtu vaMSa vyavasTAna saMDi vyUhezu nAnA pratizWAna aneka SarIra nirdeSezu nAnA vyUha kalpa vimAtra tA nirdeSezu saMklizwa viSudDa saMklizwa ekAnta pariSudDa vipula mahat gata apramANa saMkzipta sUkzma udAra sama tala vyatyasta UrDva mUrDa diS vidiS muKa nAnAdiS sa nAnA muKa nirdeSa anta dvAra saMsTAna vimAtra tA vyUhezu sarva loka DAtu prasarezu boDisattva caryAm caran boDisattvan yAmam avakramya nAnA boDisattva caryA vikurvita sParaNa tAyE praticitta kzaNam anavaSeza sarvatri aDva budDa kAya para sattva citta ASaya vijQaptaye sarva jagat sarvajQa tA puNya samudra vegam vivarDayan naminirharanti sma evam hi kula putra BagavAn vErocanaH taTAgataH pUrva boDisattva caryAm caran puNya jQAna saMBAra virahite loka saMniveSe akRtajQa sattva paripUrNe ajQAna tamaH vanadDe ahaMkAra mamakAra aBinivizwe avidyA anDakAra timira AvRte ayoni Sas vitarka prasRte dRzwi gahana kAntAra praskanDe hetu Pala saMmUXe karma kleSa vaSa gate mahA saMsAra kAntAra duHKa pAtAla maDya prapatite viviDa dAridrya duHKam pratyanuBavati mahA karuNAm saMjanayya vipulAn pAramitA caryA meGAn aBinirhRtya kuSala mUla dRXa pratizWAnam saMvarNayan sarva sattvAnAm saMsAra dAridrya duHKam vinivartayan mahA puNya jQAna saMBAram aBirocayan hetu maNxala diSam aBidyotayan karma Darma aviroDa diSam praBAvayan budDa Darma maNxala samudAgama diSam avaBAsayan sarva sattva aDimukti diSam praBAsayan sarva sattva kzetra saMBava diSam saMdarSayan sarva taTAgata vaMSAn upacCeda diSam anubaDnan sarva budDa SAsana diSam saMDArayan sarva akuSala Darma diSam vinivartayan sarvajQa tA saMBAra diSam saMvarNayan sarva sattva DAtum sParitvA mahAntam pAramitA meGam aBinirhRtya yaTASaya sattva saMtozaNam atyanta Darma saMgrahe sattvAn pratizWApayAmAsa sarvajQa tA saMBAre samAdApayati sma mahAboDisattva pAramitAsu avatArayAmAsa sarva Arya Dana pratilamBEH upastamBayAmAsa sarvajQa tA prIti vegEH kuSala mUla samudrAn sattvAnAm vivarDayAmAsa sarva taTAgata vikurvita muKezu ca enAn avatArya atyantam upaDi Seza suKa saMgraheNa saMgRhya taTAgata mAhAtmya aBimuKAn kRtvA boDisattva saMpratizWApayAmAsa suDanaH Aha  kiyat ciram saMprasTitA asi devate anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO Aha  duraBisaMBavam kula putraH etat sTAnam durvijQeya duraDimocam duravataram duHpravyAhAram duraDigamam na Sakyam sa devakena lokena avataritum sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDEH ca anyatra taTAgata aDizWAnena gv kalyANa mitra parigraheNa vipula puNya jQAna saMBAra upastabDa citta tayA ASaya viSudDyA adIna aklizwa avakra an upahata asaMkucita ananDakAra citta tayA samantA avaBAsa jQAna Aloka avaBAsa citta tayA sarva sattva hita suKa ADAna pariNata citta tayA sarva mAra maNxala kleSa durDarza citta tayA sarvajQa tA jQAna pratilamBa avakASa citta tayA sarva saMsAra suKa anaBilAziBiH taTAgata suKa aDyAlambanEH sarva sattva duHKa dOrmanasya praSamana pratipannEH taTAgata guNa samudra avatAra pratipatti aBimuKEH sarva Darma svaBAva niDi apti gagana gocarEH udAra aDi mukti paTa viSudDEH saMsAra srotaH vimuKEH sarva taTAgata jQAna samudra aBimuKEH sarvanagara gamana niScitEH taTAgata vizaya AkramaNa vIryEH budDa BUmi gati vikrAntEH sarvajQa tA bala parinizpatti aBimuKEH daSa bala pratilamBa paryavasAnEH sattvEH Sakyam etat sTAnam avataritum aDima uktum udga hItum anusartum vijQAtum tat kasya hetoH tat taTAgata jQAna vizayam hi kula putraH etat sTAnam anAkrAntam sarva boDisattvEH prAk eva anyEH sarva sattvEH aTa ca punar taTAgata aDizWAnena nirdekzyAmi AjAneyAnAm sattvAnAm ASaya samyak viSudDaye kuSala mUla caritAnAm sattvAnAm aDyASaya vaSi tAyE tava ca aDyASaya paripRcCA vyAkaraNa DarmatA pravartana apratilamBAya aTa Kalu sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAH rAtridevatA tasyAm velAyAm etam eva arTam BUyasyA mAtrayA saMdarSayamAnA tri aDva prApta taTAvyavalokya imAH gATAH aBAzata gamBIru bOdDaH vizayaH anantAH yam pRcCasi tvam Kalu budDa putra acintiya kzetra raja upamAnEH kalpEH na Sakyam sa hi sarva vaktum na lubDa sattvEH na ca duzwa cittEH Sakyam na moha anDatamaH vRtEH ca na mrakzamAna upahata ASayEH ca vijAnitum SAnta jinAna Darma tA na ErzyANa mAtsarya vaSa anugAmiBiH na SAWya mAyA kaluza ASayeBiH na kleSa karma AvaraNa AvRtEH ca SakyaH hi ayam jAnitu budDa gocara na skanDa DAtu Ayatana pratizWitEH na ca api sat kAya samASriteBiH na dRzwi saMjQA viparIta cittEH SakyAH iyam jAnitu budDa BUmiH durjQeya SAntaH vizayaH jinAnAm svaBAvataH nirmala nirvikalpaH gv saMsAra sakta ena Bava ASritEH ca Sakyam samAjQAtu m ayam hi DarmaH ye budDa gotrEH hi kule BijAtA su aDizWitAH sarva taTAgatEH ca ye DarmarAjQAm kula vaMSa DAriNaH tezAm RzINAm Kalu gocaraH yam ye Sukla Darma arNava tRpta cittAH kalyANa mitrEH su parigRhItAH muneH bala ArambaNa citta meGAH kzAntim laBante te idam niSAmya ye nirmala aDyASaya nirvikalpAH yaTA antarikze Kalu diS vidikzu hata anDakArAH mati dIpa meGaH tezAm ayam go caru nirmalAnAm kRpA ASayena iha jagat samudrAn ye sarvatri aDva gatAn sParanti aSeza sattva anugatA ca mEtrI naye jinAnAm te iha avatIrNAH anAgrahAH ye Kalu hRzwa cittAH sarvAH tidAna aBiratAH sadA eva sarvezu sattvezu sama pravRttAH tezAm iyam BUmiranAgrahANAm ye klizwa cittAH niravadya caryAH ye tyanta kOkRtya vinIta cittAH budDa anuSAsti pratipatti yuktAH tezAm ayam go caru nirmalAnAm ye kzoBya cittAH hi avikampya cittAH Darma svaBAva pratibadDa cittAH karma udaDizu api avirudDa cittAH tezAm vimokzaH yam iha akzayANAm ye Kinna cittAH vinivarta cittA pOruzya vIrya ADipateya yuktAH gv sarvajQa saMBAri ananta vIryAH tezAm ayam go caru suvratAnAm praSAnta cittAH ca samAhitAH ca ye tyanta SAntim gata nirjvarAH ca sarvajQa DyAna aFga samudra cAriNaH tezAm nayaH yam praSamam gatAnAm ye sarva saFgEH parimukta cittAH Darma svaBAva pratividDa cittAH gatim gatAH ye jina Darma DAtO prajQA pradIpAna nayeza tezAm sattva svaBAva pratividDa cittAH Bava arNave ye parigRdDa cetasaH ye sattva citta pratiBAsa candrAH tezAm ayam mArga vidAm vimokzaH tri aDva sTitAnAm jina sAgarANAm praNiDAna gotra arNava saMBavAnAm ye sarva kzetrezu aparAnta caryAH samantaBadrAn nayeza tezAm ye DarmaDAtoH naya sAgarEH ca jagat samudrAn avatIrNa sarvAn sarvAn sa saMvarta vivarta kalpAn= tezAm vimokzaH yama kalpakAnAm ye sarva diS kzetra rajaH su asaMKyAn paSyanti budDAn druma rAja mUle vibudDya boDim vinayanta sarvAn asaFga netrAna nayeza tezAm tvam AgataH kalpa mahA samudrAt kalyANa mitrANi upasevamAnaH Darma arTikaH Darma gavezya KinnaH SrutvA ca tam DArayitum samarTaH gv tvad ASayasya praviSoDanAya muneH aDizWAna balAt acintyAn vErocanIyaH vizayaH prameyaH pravartate mad vacanAt asaFgaH BUta pUrvam kula putra atIte Dvani loka DAtu samudra paramANu rajaH samAnAm kalpAnAm pareNa parataram maNi kanaka parvata SiKara vErocanaHBUt

column1: pUrvam boDisattva caryAm caratA sa maNi kanaka parvata SiKara vErocanaH loka DAtu samudraH pariSoDitaH tasmin loka DAtu samudre pRTivI parvata paramANu rajaH sama loka DAtu prasara nirdeSaH ekEkasmin= ca lokaDAtu prasare lokaDAtu vaMSa paramANu rajaH samAH lokaDAtu nirdeSAH ekEkasmin= ca loka vaMSe lokaDAtu paramANu rajaH samAH kalpa saMKyA nirdeSAH ekEkasmin= ca kalpe neke nantara kalpa nirdeSAH ekEkasmin= ca anantara kalpe neka loka DAtu nAnA karaNa nirdeSAH taTAgata utpAdAH viviDa vikurvita nirdeSAH ekEkasmin= ca taTAgata utpAde lokaDAtu paramANu rajaH samAH sUtrAnta saMprakASa nirdeSAH ekEkasmin= ca sUtrAnte lokaDAtu paramANu rajaH samAH boDisattva vyAkaraNa nirdeSAH ananta maDya sattva vinaya nirdeSAH nAnA yAnanayEH pravar

column1: tasmin Kalu punar maNi kanaka parvata SiKara vErocane loka DAtu samudre samantadigaBimuKadvAraDvaja vyUhaH nAma maDyamaH lokaDAtu vaMSaH BU tasmin Kalu punar kula putra samantadigaBi muKa dvAra Dvaja vyUhe maDyame lokaDAtu vaMSe sarvaratnavarNa samantapraBAsaSrIH nAma lokaDA sarva taTAgata boDimaNxa pratiBAsa maNi rAjaH loka DAtu saMDi vyUhaH sarva ratna kusuma sAgara pratizWitaH sarva taTAgata nirmANa nirBAsa nidarSana maNi rAja SarIraH deva nagara saMsTAnaH viSudDa saMklizwaH tasmin punar lokaDAtO sumeru paramANu rajaH samAH cAturdvIpakAH lokaDAtavaH BUvan tezAm ca sumeru paramANu rajaH samAnAm cAturdvIpakAnAm sarvaratnaSiKaraDvajaH nAma maDyamaH cAturdvIpakaH BUt tasmin Kalu punar sarva ratna SiKara Dvaje cAturdvIpake lokaDAtO aprameya yojana Sata sahasra AyAma vistArAH catvAraH dvIpAH aBUvan ekEkasmin= ca dvIpake daSa mahA nagara sahasrANi aBUvan tasmin= ca Kalu punar cAturdvIpake jambudvIpakasya maDye ratnasAlavyUha meGapradIpA nAma rAjaDAnI a BUt daSa nagara sahasra parivArA tasmin Kalu punar jambudvIpe daSa varza sahasrANi manuzyANAm AyuzpramANam aBUt tasyAm Kalu punA ratna sAla vyUha meGa pradIpAyAm rAjaDAnyAm sarvaDarmanirnAdacCatramaNxalanirGozaH nAma rAjA aBUt cakravartI rAjQaH Kalu punar sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya paQcAmAtya SatAni aBUvan zazwiH strI sahasrANi antaHpuram aBUt sapta putra SatAni aBUvan sarvezAm SUrANAm vIrANAm vara aFga rUpiNAm sudarSanAnAm mahA tejasAm mahA balAnAm tasya Kalu punar sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya rAjQaH sarvaH jambudvIpaH eka= CatraH BUt nihata para cakra pratyarTikaH gv tena ca samayena lokaDAtO= antara kalpa kzaye pratyupasTite paQcasu kazAyezu loke prAdurBUtezu daSasu kuSalezu karma paTezu antarhitezu daSa akuSala karma paTa vartinaH sattvAH yat BUyasA durgati gAminaH BUvan te daSa akuSala karma paTa samAdAna hetoH parItta AyuzaH BUvan alpa BogA virUpA vivarNA duHsaMsTita SarIrA alpa suKa samudAcArA duHKa vedanA samudAcAra bahulA anyonya visaMvAda vacana SIlA anyonya Beda pratipannAH paruza vacana samudAcArAH prakIrNa vacasaH vizaya loBa aBiBUtAH praduzwa manaH saMkalpAH viviDa dRzwi gahana kAntAra pravizwAH tezAm aDarma rAga raktAnAm vizama loBa aBiBUtAnAm miTyA Darma parigatAnAm na devaH kAle vAri DArAH udasRjat yena pRTivyAm bIja grAmAH sasyviroheyuH tena Kalu punar sattvAH Suzkezu tRNa gulma ozaDi vana udyAna drumezu nAnA vyADi spRzwAH diS vidiSaH viDAvanti sma aparAyaNAH te samAgamya sarve eva yena ratna sAla vyUha meGa pradIpa rAjaDAnI tena upasaMkramya tAm samantAt anuparivArya kecid UrDvabAhavaH kecid kRta aQjali puwAH kecid saMkampita SarIrAH kecid aByudgata aFgAH kecid aDomuKam prapatitAH kecid sarva SarIreNa praNipatitAH kecid haraNi tala jAnu pratizWitAH kecid gagana tala aBinata bAhavaH kecid nagnAH nirvasanAH kecid vikRta vadana nayanAH sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya rAjQaH BimuKam mahAntam Arta svaram utkroSam akArzuH  upadrutAH sm deva apasRzwAH sma kzuD pipAsA duHKa prapIxitAH sma viviDa Baya upataptAH sma trANa virahitAH sma deva aSaraNAH aparAyaNAH sma duHKa paQjara gatAH sma jIvita uparoDa prAptAH maraNa aBimuKAH iti nAnAviDAn pralApAn pralapantaH nAnA svara aFgEH nAnA vacanEH nAnA vikRta vaktra nayanAH viviDa saMjQA vacana vyAhAra nimantra padEH nAnA arTa s ye ca tasyAm rAjaDAnyAm strI puruza dAraka dArikAH kzuD pipAsA prapIxitA nirABaraNa gAtrA nagna nirvasanAH duzwa vivarNA rUkza paruza gAtrdurmanasaH na Atta manaskAH te ca api sattvAH duHKa anaBilAziNaH duHKa Baya nirviNNAH te sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozam rAjAnam mahA jQAna puruzam pratiSaraNa BUtam SaraNam upAgatAH sarva suKa pratilamBa saMjQayA sarva priya samavaDAna pratilamBa saMjQayA jIvita ASA parigata niDAna pratilamBa saMjQayA tIrTa saMdarSana saMjQayA mahApaTa pratipatti saMjQayA mahAyAna pAtra saMjQayA mahA jQAna ratna dvIpa saMjQayA mahA arTa pratilamBa saMjQayA svarga sarva rati suKa pratilamBa saMjQayA

column1: aSrOzIt rAjA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH tasya mahataH samantAt yAcanaka samUhasya tam mahAntam Arta svaram utkroSana Sabda SrutvA ca asya daSa mahA karuNA muKa asaMKyeya Sata sahasrANi avakrAman sa mahA karuNA naya cetanA niDyapti cittaH muhUrtam ekAgra tAm anuBUya daSa mahA karuNa upasaMhitAni vacana padAni udIrayAmAsa katamAni daSa aho bata anAlambanAH sattvAH mahA saMsAra prapAta prapatitAH kadA tat Bavizyati yat vayam saMsAra mahA prapAta prapatitAnAm sattvAnAm layana BUtAH BavizyAmaH taTAgata layana BUmi pratizWApana tayA aho bata atrANAH sattvAH nAnA kleSa upadrava upadrutAH kadA tat Bavizyati yat vayam viviDa kleSa Baya upadrutAnAm sattva anAm atrANAnAm gv trANa BUtAH BavizyAmaH navadya karmAnta pratizWApana tayA aho bata aSaraNAH sattvAH loke jarA maraNa Baya AvizwAH katA tat Bavizyati yat vayam aSaraNAnAm sattvAnAm SaraNa BUtAH BavizyAmaH sarva saMsAra Baya vinivartana tayA aho bata aparAyaNAH sattvAH viviDa loka Baya upadrutAH katA tat Bavizyati yat vayam viviDa loka Baya upadrutAnAm aparAyaNAnAm sattvAnAm parAyaNam BavizyAmaH tyanta yogakzeme sarvajQa tA mArge p aho bata avidyA anDakAra prAptaH sarva lokaH vimati saMSaya timira AvRtaH kadA tat Bavizyati yat vayam ulkA BUtAH BavizyAmaH sarva sattvAnAm avidyA anDakAra viDamana tayA aho bata Aloka virahitAH sattvAH kadA tat Bavizyati yat vayam mahA jQAna Aloka karAH BavizyAmaH sarva sattvAnAm vitimira jQAna muKa saMdarSana tayA aho bata jQAna jyotiH virahitaH sarva sattva DAtuH IrzyA mAtsarya mAyA SAWya kAluza ASayaH kadA tat Bavizyati yat vayam anuttara jQAna pradyota karAH BavizyAmaH sarva sattvAnAm atyanta pariSudDi pratipratizWApana tayA aho bata nAyaka virahitaH sarva lokaH mahA saMsAra sAgara vizama srotaH prapannaH kadA tat Bavizyati yat vayam nAyaka BUtAH BavizyAmaH sarva sattvAnAm karma samudra nayA avataraNa tayA aho bata vinAyaka virahitaH sarva lokaH durvinItaH kadA tat Bavizyati yat vayam vinAyaka BUtAH BavizyAmaH sarva sattvAnAm sarva AkAra paripAka vinaya taTA gata aDizWAna kAla anatikramaNena aho bata apariNAyakaH sarva lokaH jAti anDa BUtaH kadA tat Bavizyati yat vayam pariNAyaka BUtAH BavizyAmaH sarvaMsattvAnAm anAvaraNa sarvajQa jQAna nayOvataraNa tayA saH imAni daSa mahA karuNa upasaMhitAni vacana padAni udIrya tasyAm rAjaDAnyAm GaNwA avaGozaNam akArzIt mahA tyAga dunduBi nirGozam ca akArayat  sarva jagat saMtarpayizyAmaH yasya yena arTaH tasmE tad anupradAsyAmaH iti tena sarva jambudvIpe sarva rAja DAnIzu sarva grAma nagara nigama janapada pattanezu sarva upakaraNa koSAH vivRtAH sarva SRFgAwaka raTyA catvarezu viviDa upakaraNa viDayaH sTApitAH sarva jagat upajIvyAH su prativihitAH sarva koSa kozWAgArANi vivRtAni mahA ratna niDAna nicayAH nidarSitAH aneka nAnAviDa ratna rASayaH sTApitAH anna pAna vastra yAna puzpa mAlya ganDa vilepana cUrNa nAnA ganDa varNa cIvara ratna koSAH vivRtAH Sayana Asana vasana Bavana vimAna gRhANi alaMkRtAni sarva Dana kanaka samRdDAni jyotiH DvajamANi rAja vinyAsa viDUta anDakArANi sa tezAm sattvAnAm yaTA aBilazita sarva aBiprAya paripUraNa arTam tezu gRhezu pratyekam Atma BAva sadRSam upAdAya kAyam aBinirmAya sTApayAmA sarva sattva sarva vyADi praSamanAya ca vEdya BEzajya upasTAyaka viviDa jIvita upakaraNa pratyaya saMpadam upasTApayAmAsa yaTArha viviDa upakaraNa pUrNAni ca nAnA ratna vicitra BAjanAni upasTApayAmAsa  yat uta vajra maNi BAjanAni nAnA ganDa maNi ratna paripUrNAni nAnA ganDa ratna BAjanAni viviDa udAra vicitra varNa raFga vastra paripUrNAni yAna yugyAni su bahUni nAnA AkAra saMsTAnAni vicitra ratna pratimaNxitAni AjAneya aSva gaja go yuktAni viviDAn= ca raTAn rAja arhAn sarva ratna ABaraNa pariBogAn= ca sarva Asana viDIn= ca nAnA ratna vicitrAn viviDa vitAna vitatAn gv ratna kiFkiNI jAla avanadDAn ucCrita= Catra Dvaja patAkA upaSoBitAn sarva janapada pradeSezu sTApayA apAsa grAma nagara nigama janapada pradAnAni ca udDozayAmAsa nAnAviDa udyAna ramya ArAma tapaH vana pariBogAn api sarva gRha kalatra putra dAraka parityAgAn api anarDya sarva ratna parityAgAn api sva hRdaya majja antra guNa vRkka meda mAMsa ruDira= Cavi carma kara caraNa bAhu karNa nAsA nayana jihvA dantozWaSI yAvat sarva bAhya aDyAtmika sarva AkAra parityAgAn api udDozayAmAsa sa tam evaMrUpam upakaraNa parityAga viDim pratyupasTApya mahA yajQa vAwam kArayAmAsa yaH tasyAH ratna sAla vyUha meGa pradIpAyAH rAjaDAnyAH pUrveNa maNi SiKara tejaH nAmnaH nagara dvArasya puratas sama vipula AyAmaH parama vistIrNa DaraNI tala praveSaH nimna unnata viSudDa samatalo pagata SvaBra prapAtaH sarva sTANu kaNwaka apagataH utsanna SarkarA kaWallaH sarva ratna DAtu saMcayaH sarva ratna maya maNi ratna rAja saMstIrNa talaH aneka maNi ratna vyuha upaSoBitaH nAnA ratna kusuma aBikIrNaH sarva cUrNa suganDa rAja samAkulaH sarva ganDa DUpa pariDUpitaH ratna
