nAnA ratna pawwa pralamba vidyotitaH viviDa ratna kusuma jAla saMCannaH sarva ganDa rAja ratna jAla= Catra maNxalaH suvarNa jAla ratna GaNwA nirGozaH nAnA ratna virAjita vitAna vitataH sarva ganDa rAja cUrNa vikIrNaH sarva ratna kusuma prakIrNa aBirAmaH tUrya kowI niyuta Sata sahasra manojQa ruta Goza nirnAditaH sarva ratna vicitra alaMkAra vyUha su pariSudDaH boDisattva karma vipAka column1: apratihata vacana maNxalaH akopya jQAna samanvitaH gv su pratizWApita DarmaMsamyak prayogaH nanta guNa varNa nirdeSaH tasya Kalu punar sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya rAjQaH mahA siMhAsana nizaNNasya upari mUrDa saMDO= antarikze mahAcCatra maNxalam prAdurbaBUva vicitra udvidDa maNi ratna daNxam mahA mahA maNi koSa garBaMsarva ratna SalAkA Sata sahasra samyak vitatam aneka saMCAditam ratna kiFkiNI jAla suvarNa maNi GaNwA ratna sUtra dAma upanibadDa aBipralambit mahA maNi ratna hAra samantA aBipralambita vyUham divya maDura manojQa pramukta Sabda upacAram sarva sattva kuSala karma paTa saMcodana GaNwA visRta nirGozam sa Kalu rAjA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH ratna vAla vyajanEH saMvIjyamAnaH Sakradeva indra atirekeNa tejasA jvAlayan= upaSoB tasya samanantara nizaNNasya tasmin siMhAsane sarvaH jana kAyaH BimuKaH prAQjaliH sTitaH BUt tam eva rAjAnam namasyan aTa Kalu sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya rAjQaH saMKyeyezu prANi kowI niyuta Sata sahasrezu saMnipatitezu nAnA yAcanakezu nAnA vastu parigrAhakezu nAnA upakaraNa aDimuktezu nAnA jAtizu nAnA gati paryApannezu nAnA aBilAza cittezu nAnA ASaya aBiprAyezu nAnA diS saMnipatitezu nAnA vizaya pariBoga upacArezu nAnA pariBoga aBilAzita cetanezu nAnA aBiprAya kalpezu nAnA manuzya nikAyezu nAnA kula upapati upapannezu nAnA janapada samAgatezu nAna nirukti vacana mantra saMskArezu nAnA svara maNxala pramocakezu nAna vastu vyaQjanezu nAnA vacana padAni udIrayatsu tam ekam mahA puNya sumerum ullokayamAnezu ayam eva ekaH mahA jQAna puruzaH iti niScita cetanezu mahA puNya upastabDaH mahApuruza candraH mahA tyAga ASaya pratilabDaH iti unmuKezu boDisattva praNiDi cetanA nipatitezu boDisattva praNiDi cetanA nirmitezu tam mahAntam yAcanaka saMnipAtam dRzwvA tezAm yAcanakAnAm anticitta prItiH citta prasAdaH kalyANa mitra darSana saMjQA su vipulAH mahA karuNa vegAH saMbaBUvuH apara anta kalpa sarva yAcanaka saMtarpaNa avivarti a vIrya vegAH prAduraBavan sarva jagat sama prayoga parityAga citta sParaNa meGAH samaBavan sa Kalu punar sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH rAjA tezAm yAcanakAnAm saha darSanena Atta manaskataraH BUt na tri sAhasra cakravarti rAjya pratilamBena asImA prApta kalpa paryavasAnena na Sakra tva aDipati Asana pratilamBena bahu kalpa kowI niyuta Sata sahasra paryavasAnena na suyAma deva rAja aDipatya Asana pratilamBena bahu kalpa kowI niyuta Sata sahasra paryavasAnena na saMtuzita deva rAja aDipatya Asana pratilamBena bahu kalpa kowI niyuta Sata sahasra paryavasAnena na su nirmita deva rAja ESvarya ADipati Asana pratilamBena aprameya kalpa avasAnena na vaSa varti deva rAja aDipatya Asana pratilamBena sumuKa apsara manohara deva kanyA upasTAnena acintya kalpa paryavasAnena na brahmAsanena anaBilApya kalpa brahma vihAra suKa avasAnena na ABAsvara deva suKena ananta kalpa avasAnena na SuBa kRtsna deva suKena atulya kalpa akzINena na SudDAvAsa deva SAnta vimokza suKa vihAreNa aparyanta kalpa avasAnena tat yaTA kula putra puruzasya ekAnta tRzNA Acaritasya matA pitR BrAtR BaginI mitra mAtya jQAti sa Alohita putra duhitR BAryA cira kAla viprayuktasya awavI kAntAra vipranazwasya tad darSana kAmasya tezAm samavaDAnena mahatI prItiH aDyavasAnam utpadyate tad darSana avitRpta tayA evam eva kula putra rAjQaH sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya tezAm yAcanakAnAm saha darSanena mahA prIti vegAH saMjAtAH citta tuzwi suKam avakrAntam mahAn= citta uda gra tA vegaH prAdurBUtaH mahA prABodya harza vegaH saMBUtaH budDa boDAt udAra SradDA aDimukti vega balam saMvarDitam mUla jAtA SradDA sarvajQa tAyAm vivarDitA sarva budDa Darma aDyASaya viSudDi balam aBivivarDitam boDisattva indriya karmaNyatA saMBUtA citta harza paripUrNa mahA prasAda vegaH udapadyata vipula citta Odbilya vegena kalyANa mitra indriya ASaya tA mRdu BUtA tat kasya hetoH taTA hi tasya sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya rAjQaH sarvajQa tA ArambaNa prayuktakasya sarvajQa tA DarmatA pratiSaraNasya sarvajQa tA mArga dvAra aBimuKasya sarva jagat saMtarpaNa manasikAra prayuktasya sarva budDa guNa samudra an avatAra pratipatti aBimuKasya sarva mAra karma kleSa AvaraNa parvata vikiraNa prayuktasya sarva taTAgata anuSAsanI pradakziNa grAhita avasTitasya sarva kuSala mUla samudra samanta muKa samArjana aBiyoga garBasya sarva aBiniveSa uccalita saMtAnasya sarva loka vizayAnaBinivizwasya sarva Darma svaBAva gagana gocarasya tezu sarva yAcanakezu eka putraka saMjQAH udapadyata mAtA pitR saMjQA dakziNIya saMjQA kalyANa mitra saMjQA durlaBa saMjQA duzkara kAraka saMjQA bahu kara saMjQA parama upakAraka saMjQAH boDi mArga upastamBa saMjQAH AcArya saMjQA SAstR saMjQA udapadyata sa tAn sarva yAcanakAn yaTAgatAn yaTA saMprAptAn yaTAkAla saMnipatitAn yaTA diS deSa sTitAn yaTAvastuyAcanakAn yaTArucIn yaTA aBiprAyAn yaTA aBikAFkziNaH yaTA aBilAziNaH yaTAvastu paryezakAn saMtarpayAmAsa apratihatena mahA mEtrI maNxalena yAcanaka jana aparAFBuKa tayA mahA tyAga raSminA sarva sattva sama prayogena tyAga muKena saH nnamanna arTikeByaH prAdAt pAnam pAna arTikeByaH vastram vastra arTikeByaH puzpANi puzpa arTikeByaH prAdAt evam ganDa DUpa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja patAkA ratna ABaraNa Asana Sayana Bavana vimAna vihAra ArAma udyAna tapaH vanAni haya gaja raTa patti vAhana yugyayAnAni api hiraNya suvarNa maNi muktA vExUrya SaFKa SilA pravAla jAtarUpa rajatAni api prAdAt sva gRha vimAna antaHpura parivArAn api sarva koSAn api vivRtya viBajya arTikeByaH prAdAt yasya yena arTaH sa tam gRhNAtu iti janapadAn api janapadArTikeByaH prAdAt grAmAn api grAma arTiByaH nagarANi api nagara arTiByaH prAdAt sa tAn sarva yAcanakAn sarvAsti parityAgatayA sarva sattvezu sama pratipannaH sarva vastu parityAgEH aBicCAdayAmAsa tena Kalu punar samayena ratnapraBA nAma SrezWi dArikA zazwi kanyA parivArA tasmin= eva mahA yajQa vAwe saMnipatitA aBUt aBirUpA prAsAdikA darSanIyA parama SuBa varNa puzkala tayA samanvAgatA suvarNa varNa= CaviH aBinIla keSI aBinIla netrA manojQaganDA brahma svarA su vastrA su alaMkRtA smRtimati gati hrI DRtya patrApyeryAcaryA saM guruzu sa gOravA parama saMprajanya cAriNI gamBIra cezwAH meGa asaMpannAH DarmANAm grahaNa cAraNa pratiboDizu pUrva su kRta kuSala mUlAH Darma aBizyandita prasangv viSudDa kalyANa ASayAH udAra aDi mukti gagana gocapa rahita pariNata cittA budDa darSana diS aBimuKA sarvajQa jQAna aBilAziNI sA Kalu ratnapraBA SrezWi dArikA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya rAjQaH mahA siMhAsanasya pradakziNena na ati dUre sTitA aBUtrAjAnam namasyantI na ca kiMcid gRhNAti ekAnta sTitA ca evam cittam utpAdayAmAsa  su labDA me lABA yat aham evaMrUpasya kalyANa mitrasya darSana samavaDAna pratilABinIti sA tasya sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozasya rAjQaH nti kekalyANa mitra saMjQAm anukampaka saMjQAm anugrAhaka saMjQAm budDa saMjQAm utpAdya mAyA SAWyA apagatena cittena parama udAra prIti prasAda prAmodya vega pratilabDA svAni a ABaraNAni kAyAt avamucya yena rAjA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH tena aBimuKam akza epsIt tAni tasya siMhAsana vedikA maDye aDas pRTivI maNxale pratizWitAni aBUvan sA tAni ABaraNAni pravikIrya evam praNiDim utpAdayAmAsa  yaTA eza rAjA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH nATAnAm sattvAnAm anDak taTA aham api anAgate Dvani Baveyam yAm eza Darma tAm jAnAti tAm aham ati jAnIyAm yena yAnena eza niryAsyati tena aham api niryAyAm yasmin= eva mArga pratipannaH tatra aham api pratipadyeyam yaTA ayamasecanakaH rUpeNa akzaya BogaH nanta paricAraH durGarzaH parAjitaH navamRdyaH taTA aham api Baveyam yatra yatra ca asya upapattiH Bavet aham api tatra tatra upapadyeyam iti tAm evaMcitta manasikAra prayuktAm AjQAya rAjA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH valokyaH evam Aha  gRhANa dArike yena te rTaH aham Kalu dArike sarvAsti parityAgI sarva sattva saMtarpaNAya pratipannaH sA Kalu samanvAhRtA tena rAjQA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozeNa iti BUyasyA mAtrayA prasAdam pratyalaBata sA prasanna cittAH udAra vipula kuSala mUla vega saMjAtAH rAjAnam sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozam tasyAm velA AyAmABiH gATABiH aDi aB

column1: Sveta asTi pUrNA pRTivI baBUva tava anutpAde su viSudDa netrA yadA hi te yAcaka saMDi saMBute saMtarpitAH yAcanakAH tu sarve utpadya meGena tadA caturdiSam saMtarpitA nimna sTalA ca sarve BUyas na corA na BawAH na DUrtA na hanyate kaScana ca api vaDyate na ca api anATAH maraNam vrajanti nATaH BavAn sarva jagati anATe prANa atipAta aBiratAH manuzyAH hatvA parAn= tat ruDiram pibanti KAdanti mAMsAni parasparam ye te tvad pradAnEH Buta mEtra cittAH ekaH Sata antaH hi sahasra saMKyA aFganA tadA cIvara saMvRtA aBUt saMCAdya kAyam tRNa parNa cIvarEH pretAH kzuDA ArtAH iva te viSan= tadA prAdurbaBO SAliH anupta kRzwaH kalpadrumAH ca eva vimukta koSAH dRSyanti nAryaH tu narAH ca paNxitA jAtaH yadA tvam jagataH sya nATaH gv mAsa arDa mAsasya kRtena pUrvam akArizuH saMniDim utpaTa sTAH su alaMkRtAH tu adya mahArha vastrAH krIxanti devAH iva nandana sTAH kAmezu miTyA vizam a pravRttAH aDarma rAgeNa narAH hi raktAH nAryaH kumAryaH sva para aBiguptAH vizam Sayanti sma purA prasajya vara apsaraH varNa samAna rUpAH dRzwvA su vastrAH samalaMkRtAH ca para striyaH candana lipta gAtryaH tuzwAH sva dArEH tuzitAH iva adya mRzAm ca rUkzAm piSunAm abadDAm purA giram SAWya vaSAt avocan caturviDAm vAcam imAm prahAya Darmam caranti adya kudRzwi muktAH na tUrya nirnAda rutam manojQam na divya saMgIti rutAni amUni sa brahma GozAH kalaviFka GozAH rutasya tuByam padavIm spRSanti Catram hi te tizWati mUrDa saMDO ratnEH citam kAQcana jAla Catram vExUrya daNxam Siri garBa koSam samantataH sat maNi kaNWa jAlam GaNwA samutTa aBirutAni a SezAn sarva svara aFgAni aBiBUya loke budDa svara aFgEH sadRSam carantaH sadDarma nirnAda rutam praSAntam ye Srutva sattvAH Samayanti kleSAn aSeza diS kzetra paraMparAsu kalpa arNavAnAm sugata udaDInAm DImat samudrasya ca nAma cakram gv pUrva antataH kzetra paraMparABiH anantaram yasya ca nAmaDeyam tava anuBAvena ca dikzu aSezam sat Darma cakrANi ravanti GaNwAH GaNwA svaram stemam asajjamAnA jambuDvajam vyApya raNati aSezam brahma indra column1: sahasra sUrya dyuti meGa jAla sOmeru mUrDa praBayA sParitvA tat vajra daNxam SuBa sattva garBam maNi indra patram vipulam viSudDam mahArha jAmbUnada karNikam ca suganDarAja ujjvala kesara AXyam tad karNikAyAm asi nATa jAtaH paryaFka badDena samucCrayeNa virocase lakzaNa citrita aFgaH SatEH surANAm aBipUjyamAnaH prAsAda pRzWAt avatIrya rAjA tvAm saMpragRhya At ta manAH karAByAm devyE dadO vAcam uvAca ca evam sutaH tava ayam Bava tuzwa cittA prAdurbaBUva eva niDAna kowyaH pramukta koSAH taravaH baBUvuH tUryEH ca nirnAditam antarikzam aBUt prasUte tvayi lokanATe jambuDvaje ye Kalu sarva sattvAH tvad unmuKAH te pyaBavan pratItAH aho syanATasya janasya nATaH iti abruvan prAQjalayaH ca BUtvA gv praBA SarIrAt tava niScaritvA praBAsayAmAsa mahIm samantAt tamonDakAram jagatAm ca hatvA vyADIn aSezAn SamayAMbaBUva ye yakza kumBANxa pi SAca saMGAH viheWakAH te ca sadA apajagmuH ASIvizAH na api acaran= tadAnI mahA vizAH sattva vaDa pravRttAH alABa ninde ayaSaH Ta duHKam yAH ItayaH vyADiH upadravAH ca Samam samAsAdya hitam jagAma loke pramodaH tu samudbaBUva parasparam mAtR samAna saMjQI mEtra Atmakam sarva jagat tadA AsIt avEra cittam vinihiMsakaH ca sarvajQa mArga pratipattimat ca vivartitA durgati DarmarAjQA apAvRtaH svarga mahApaTaH ca sarvajQa tA vartma nidarSanam ca kRtaH tvayA arTaH jagataH viSAlaH lABaH paraH naH tava darSanena dAtuH mahA amBoniDi saMniBasya anATa nATaH jagati prasUtaH cira pranazwe dButa nAyakaH tvam aTa Kalu ratnapraBA SrezWi dArikA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozam rAja Anam ABiH gATABiH aBizwutya saMvarNya saMpraSasya aneka Sata sahasra kRtvas pradakziNIkRtya praNipatya ekAnte prAQjaliH sTitA aBUt namasyantI aTa Kalu rAjA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH ratna praBAm SrezWi dArikAm avalokya evam Aha  sADu sADu dArike yA tvam para sattva guNa viSeza jQAna aBijQAm avatIrNA durlaBAH te dArike sattvAH sarva loke ye para sattva guNAn aDimucyante na Sakyam dArike tamaH vRtEH akRtajQa sattvEH budDi vipannEH kzuBita cittEH lulita saMtAnEH tamaH cetoBiH prakRti vinazwa ASayEH pratipatti cyutEH para sattva guNa viSeza anaBijQEH boDisattva guNA avatAritum taTAgata guNAH vA kalpayitum sarva guNa jQAna viSeza aBijQA vA anuprAptum asaMSayam tvam dArike boDO gv saMprasTitA yA tvam evaMrUpAn boDisattva guNAnavatarasi udAra sattva aBijQa tayA jambudvIpe moGaH smAkam sattva saMgraha vikramaH yezAm naH vijite tvam evaMrUpa jQAna samanvAgatAH utpannA aTa Kalu rAjA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH narDam mahA maNi ratnam jyotiH praBa maNi ratna vicitram ca anarGam vastra ratnam svena pANinA AdAya ratna praBAyAH SrezWi dArikAyAH prAdAt tad parivArasya ca sarvAsAm dArikANAm pratyekam nAnA vastra ratnAni prAdAt evam ca avocat  pratigRhANa dArike tvam ida vastra ratnam parigRhya AtmanA pariBuFkzva aTa Kalu ratnapraBA SrezWi dArikA sa parivArAH uBAByAm jAnuByAm DaraNi tale praNipatya tat vastra ratnam pANiByAm parigRhya mUrDni kRtvA pratyavasRtya tat vastra ratnam prAvRtavatI tad parivArAH ca sarvAH dArikAH pratyekam svAni vastra ratnAni prAvRtavatyaH sA tat vastra ratnam prAvRtya rAjAnam sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozam pradakziNam akarot sArDam svena dArikA parivAreNa tAsAm sarvAsAm tezu vastra ratnezu sarva nakzatra jyotiH bimbAni vidyotamAnAni adarSan tAm jana kAyaH dRzwvA evam Aha  SoBanaH tava ayam dArike kanyA parivAraH rAtri devatA iva jyotiH gaNa pratimaNxitA tvam ABiH parivRtAH atIva BrAjase aTa Kalu sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAH rAtri devatA su Danam SrezWi dArakam etat avocat tat kim manyase kula putra  anyaH sa tena kAlena tena samayena rAjA aBUt sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH nAma na Kalu evam drazwavyam ayam sa BagavAn vErocanaH taTAgataH rhan samyaksaMbudDaH tena kAlena tena samayena rAjA aBUt sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozaH syAt Kalu punar te kula putra  anyA sA tena kAlena tena samayena padmapraBA nAma devI aBUt rAjQaH jyotizpraBasya BAryA sarva Darma nirnrAjQaH mAtA na Kalu evam drazwavyam iyam sA mAyAdevI tena kAlena padmapraBA nAma rAja BAryA aBUt yayA saH upapAdukaH kumAraH utsaFge pratigRhItaH syAt Kalu punar te kula putraH evam  anyaH sa tena kAlena tena samayena jyotizpraBaH nAma rAjA aBUt sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirrAjQaH pitA na Kalu evam drazwavyam SudDodanaH sa rAjA tena kAlena jyotizpraBaH nAma rAjA aBUt syAt Kalu punar te kula putraH evam  anyA sA tena kAlena tena samayena ratnapraBA nAma SrezWi dArikA aBUt na Kalu evam drazwavyam aham sA tena kAlena tena samayena ratnapraBA nAma SrezWi dArikA aBUvam syAt Kalu punar te kula putraH evam  anye tena kAlena tena samayena sattvAH aBUvan ye tatra jambudvIpe upapannAH rAjQA sarva Darma nirnAda= Catra maNxala nirGozeNa caturBiH saMgraha vastuBiH saMgRhItAH na Kalu evam drazwavyam ime te boDisattvAH sarve iha eva BagavataH parzad maNxala samavasRtAH ye nuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO avEvartyAyAm boDisattva BUmO pratiz kecid praTamAyAm BUmO kecid dvitIyAyAm kecitRtIyAyAm kecid caturTyAm BUmO kecid paQcamyAm kecid zaWyAm kecid saptamyAm kecid azwaByAm kecid navamyAm kecid dboDisattva BUmO pratizWApitAH ye nAnA praNiDAna vimAtra tABiH nAnA sarvajQa tA prasTAnEH nAnA saMBArEH nAnA samudra AgamEH nAnA niryANEH nAnA mArga vyUha SudDiBiH nAnA vikurvita vgv samudAgatAH nAnA vimokza vihArEH iha parzad maNxale nAnA Darma vimAna vihArAn AvasantaH viharanti aTa Kalu sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAH rAtri devatA tasyAm velAyAm etam eva vipula prIti saMBava niDAna saMtuzwi avaBAsam boDisattva vimokzam BUyasyA mAtrayA saMdarSayamAnA su Danam SrezWi dArakam gATABiH aDi aBAzata cakzuH mamA jinasutAH vipulam yenaH vilokayami sarva diSaH kzetra udaDIn bahuviDAn vipulAn sattva arNavAn api ca saMsarataH sarvezu kzetra prasarezu jinAn boDi druma Asana gatAn virajAn vyApya RdDiBiH daSa diSaH satatam Darma uktiBiH vinayataH janatAm Srotra arNavaH su pariSudDu mamA yena SRNomi apariSeza rutam DarmAn aSeza su gata aBihitAn sarvAn SRNomi BRSa m Atta manAH jQAnam mama advayam asaFgatam para sattva citta vizaya prasRtam citta udaDiH su vipulA jagataH citta kzaNAt avatarAmi aKilAm pUrva anta me smRti samADi balAt kalpa udaDIn aham avEzyami tAn jAti antara arNava SatAni bahUni aham AtmanaH ca jagatAm api ca kzeta arNava eka paramANu samAn kalpAn kzaNena ca vidAmi aKilAn sattvAn gatizu api ca saMsarataH budDAn vikurvita gaNEH ca saha tat ca smarAmi Kalu loka vidAm tezAm yaTA praTamakaH praNiDiH gv prasTAna saMBavanayEH vipulEH samudAgatAH carim upetya ca yAH aBizeka BUmi gamanAni ca yA ani asamADita uttama guNa oGavatAm boDEH ca buDyananayAn vipulAn= cit ta kzaNAt avatarAmi aKilAn yEH yEH upAya vizayEH sugatAH prAvartayan jagati cakravaram yA nirvRtI parimANa guNAH Darma sTiteH api ca yaH niyamaH ye yAna sAgara nayAH vimalAH ye ca eva sattva vinayAH vipulAH saMdarSitA jagati tAn amitEH nAnA nayEH avatarAmi pRTak prIteH niDAna praBu tuzwi Dana aDyAloke eza hi vimokza nayaH mama BAvitaH vipula kalpa SatAni etam tvam api avatara ASu nayam etam aham kula putra vipula prIti saMBava niDAna saMtuzwi avaBAsam boDisattva vimokzam jAnAmi kim mayA Sakyam sarva taTAgata pAda mUlezu sarvajQa tA prasTAna praNiDi samudra avatIrNAnAm sarva taTAgata pUrva praNiDAna sAgara aBinirhAra praNiDi paripUrNAnAm eka boDisattva BUmi AkramaNa sarva boDisattva BUmi sAgara AkramaNa vikrAnta j sarva boDisattva caryA samudra eka eka caryA samavasaraNa praNiDAna caryA pariSudDAnAm ekEkasmin boDisattva vimokze sarva boDisattva vimokza sAgara samavasaraNa vihAra vaSavartinAm boDisattvAnAm caryAm jQAtum guNAn vA vaktum gacCa kula putra iyam iha eva boDimaNxe sarvajagadrakzApraNiDAna vIrya praBA nAma rAtri devatA BagavataH sakASam upasaMkrAntA tAm upasaMkramya paripRcCa  kaTam boDisattvena anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO sattvAH paripAcayitavyAH kaTam sarva budDa kzetrANi pariSoDitavyAni kaTam sarva taTAgatAH ArADayitavyAH atyanta tArA Dana tayA kaTam boDisattvena sarva budDa Darmezu prayoktavyAH aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAyAH rAtri devatAyAH pAdO SirasA aBivandya sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAm rAtri devatAm aneka Sata sahasra kRtvas pradakziNIkRtya punar punar avalokya sarva vRkza praPullana suKa saMvAsAyAH rAtri devatAyAH antikAt prakrAntaH gv sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBA aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH yena sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBA rAtri devatA tena upasaMkrAntaH saH drAkzIt sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBAm rAtri devatAm tasmin= evam parzad maNxale sarva jagat Bavana pratiBAsa maNi rAja garBAsana nizaNNAm DarmaDAtu naya pratiBAsa maNi jAla saMCAdita SarIrAm sarva candra sUrya jyotiH graha tArA nakzatra pratiBAsa saMdarSana kAyAm yaTASaya sattva cakzuH vijQapti saMdarSana kAyAm sarva sattva kAya saMsTAna sadRSa sva SarIra vijQapanakAyAm ananta maDya varNa samudra udAra vijQapti saMdarSana kAyAm sarva IH yApaTa vihAra naya saMdarSana kAyAm samantamuKa aBimuKa vijQapanakAyAm sarva diS aBimuKa sattva paripAcana aBimuKa kAyAm samanta Darma meGa nigarjita viviDa vikurvita sarva diS sParaNa sarva jagat aBimuKa kAyAm sarva kAla jagat arTa aBimuKa gagana pralambakAyAm sarva taTAgata krama tala praNipatita kAyAm sarva sattva kuSala mUla upacaya suKa pUrvaMgamakAyAm sarva taTAgata aBimuKa Darma meGa saMprati icCana saMDAraNa praNiDi sidDi paripUrNa cetA uparAF ananta maDya avaBAsa sarva diS sParaNa SarIrAm sarva jagat tamaH vikiraNa Darma pradIpa Aloka samanta pramukta avaBAsa saMdarSana kAyAm mAyA gata Darma nirmala jQAna SarIra nidarSana kAyAm vigata tamaH rajaH Darma SarIra nidarSana kAyAm mAyA gata Darma tA nirjAtakAyAm DarmatA prativibudDa anDakAra cittAm sama muKa jQAna Aloka avaBAsa pratilabDAn atyanta nirjvara niHsaMtApa manaH SarIrAm Darma kAya aBedya sAravatI DAtu niryAtAm apratizWita taTA gata aDizWAna prakRtyasaMklizwa svaBAva nirm sa tAm dRzwvA mUrDnA praNamya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn darSana nayAn anusmaramANaH ntara DaraNi tale praNipatya su ciram ati nAmay aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH tasmAt haraNi talAt utTAya prAQjalIBUtaH sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBAyAH rAtri devatAyAH kAyam nirIkzamANaH daSa saMjQA viSudDIH pratilaBate sma yAsAm pratilABAt sarva kalyANa mitra saBA gatAm pratyalaBata katamA daSa yat uta  kalyANa mitrezu sva citta saMjQAm pratyalaBata sarvajQa tA samAramBa vIrya sarva Alambana saMvAsAya sva karma vipAka viSudDi svaBAva saMjQAm pratyalaBata kalyANa mitra arA gaNa vipula kuSala mUla samudAga mArA gaNa tAyE boDisattva caryA alaMkAra saMjQAm pratyalaBata sarva praNiDAna alaMkAra caryA saMvasana tAyE sarva budDa Darma aBinizpAdana saMjQAm pratyalaBata sarva kalyANa mitra anuSAsanI paTa pratipattaye sparSa upapatti saMjQAm pratyalaBata sarva budDa vizaya anuttara Darma vihAra avaBAsa saMdarSana tAyE eka niryANa saMjQAm pratyalaBata samantaBadra yAna niryANa praNiDAna caryA viSudDaye sarvajQa puNya sAgara Akara saMjQAm pratyalaBata sarva Sukla Darma samArjana vivarDana tAyE su paripUrNa kuSala Darma paripUraNa saMvarDana paripAlana saMjQAm pratyalaBata budDa boDO sarvajQa jQAna vIrya vega saMvarDana tAyE sarva kuSala mUla paripUri saMjQAm pratyalaBata sarva sattva sarva aBiprAya paripUraNa tAyE sarva arTa saMsADaka saMjQAm pratyalaBata kalyANa mitrezu sarva boDisattva karma vaSa vartita apratizWApanAya imAH daSa saMjQA viSudDIH pratilaBate sma yAsAm pratilABAt sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBAyAH rAtri devatAyAH budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAH boDisattva saBA gatAH pratyalaBa gv  yat uta smRti saBA gatAm daSa diS sarva taTAgata tri aDva anu smRti nayezu mati saBA gatAm sarva Darma sAgara nayA saMBeda viniScitezu gati saBA gatAm sarva taTAgata Darma cakra maNxala gati anugata asaMBeda viBAga naya kOSalyezu boDi saBA gatAm AkASa sama budDyA sarvatri aDvanaya sAgara avaBAsa pratilABAya indriya viSudDi saBA gatAm sarva boDisattva indriya sAgara jQAna avaBAsa pratilABAya citta viSudDi saBA gatAm sarva AkAra sattva saMgraha vyUha boDisattva mArga guNa pratipati alaMkAra mArga pratipattaye gocarasa BA gatAm taTAgata jQAna gocara avaBAsa pratilABAya naya anugama saBA gatAm sarva AkAra sarvajQa tA naya samudra avatAra paTa avaBAsa pratilABAya arTa prativeDa saBA gatAm sarva Darma svaBAva jQAna prativeDa pratilABAya Darma vihAra saBA gatAm sarva AvaraNa parvata vikiraNa tAyE rUpa kAya viSudDi saBA gatAm yaTASaya jagat vimAtra tA saMdarSana lakzaNa anuvyaQjana vicitra SarIra viSudDi pratilABAya bala saBA gatAm boDisattva bala parinizpatti sarvajQa tA ArambaNa vivarDana tAyE sarva Darma naya samudrezu vESAradya saBA gatAm citta ASaya gagana pariSudDaye vIrya saBA gatAm sarva kalpa boDisattva caryA saMvAsA pariKeda pratilABAya pratiBAna saBA gatAm sarva Darma anAvaraNa jQAna Aloka pratilABAya anaBiBUta saBA gatAm sarva jagat aByudgata Atma BAva pariSudDaye adIna AlIna vacana saBA gatAm sarva parzad maNxala aBirADana pariSudDaye Goza saBA gatAm sarva Darma naya samudra ruta garjana tAyE svara aFga viSudDi saBA gatAm sarva jagat vacana vijQapti vyavahAra naya samudrezu guNa viSudDi saBA gatAm taTAgata anuSAsanI guNa pratipatti viSudDizu budDa Darma karma vaMSa aviroDana saBAga tAm anavadya karma vipAka viSudDaye Darma yajQa BUmi pratizWApana saBA gatAm sarva budDa utpAda Darma cakra pravartana tAyE brahmacarya viSudDi saBA gatAm sarva taTAgata vizaya jQAna saMvasana tAyE mahA mEtrI saBA gatAm nAnA mEtrI naya pratikzaNa sarva sattva sAgara sParaNa tAyE mahA karuNa Anaya samudra avatAra saBA gatAm sarva sattva DAtu paritrANa Darma meGa aBipravarzaNa tAyE kAya karma saBA gatAm sarva sattva paripAcana upAya upacAra sa BA gatAyE vAc karma viSudDi saBA gatAm sarva Darma vyavahAra aBilAzezu manaskarma saBA gatAm sarva sattva cittezu sarvajQa tA ArambaNa upasaMharaNa tAyE viviDa sarva vyUha pratimaNxana saBA ga tAm sarva budDa kzetrezu sarva taTAgata upasaMkramaNa tAyE upasaMkramaNa saBA gatAm sarva budDa utpAda samudrezu Darma cakra aDyezaNa saBA gatAm sarva taTAgatezu pUjA upasTAna saBA gatAm sarva taTAgata aSeza kAla sarva pUjA upasTAna tAyE sarva sattva paripAka vinaya saBA gatAm sarva sattva DAtO Aloka pratilABa saBA gatAm sarva sattva Darma nayezu samADi pratilABa saBA gatAm sarva samADi naya samudrezu samanta sParaNa saBA gatAm sarva budDa kzetra samudra boDisattva caryA vikurvita sParaNa tAyE boDisattva vihAra saBA gatAm sarva boDisattva vikuH vitanaya samudrezu parivAra saBA gatAm sarva boDisattva caryA saMvAsezu praveSa saBA gatAm sarva loka DAtu su sUkzma praveSezu citta viBakti saBA gatAm sarva budDa kzetra vEpulyezu anugama vEmAtra tA saBA gatAm sarva budDa kzetra samudra avatAra vimAtra tA anugamezu samantanaya prasara sParaNa saBA gatAm sarva budDa kzetra viBakti ananta jQAna vijQaptizu aByudgata saBA gatAm sarva budDa kzetrezu avEvartya saBA gatAm sarva diS sParaNa samavasaraNa aDizWAna avivarti atAyE anDakAra viDa mana saBA ga tAm sarva budDa boDimaNxa vibuDi anajQAna maNxala avaBAsa pratilABAya gv anuprApti saBA gatAm sarva budDa parzat maNxala samudrezu sarva budDa kzetra kAya jAla sParaNa saBA gatAm anaBilApya budDa kzetra taTA gata pUjA upasTAna prayogezu jQAna pratyakza saBA gatAm tatra Darma naya samudra anuprabanDezu pratipatti saBA gatAm anuloma sarva Darma nayana saMmuKa prayogezu ezaNa saBA gatAm tIvra Darma= Canda AramBa viSudDaye viSudDi saBA gatAm kAya vAFBanaskarma budDa guNa alaMkAra samAdAnezu sumanaH saBA gatAmavizama kalpa citta maNxala sarva Darma jQAna maNxala pariSudDaye vIrya AramBa saBA gatAm sarva kuSala mUla saMBAra samAramBa nistIraNa prayogezu caryA vyUha saBA gatAm sarva boDisattva caryA parinizpattizu asaFga vihAra saBA gatAm sarva Darma nimitta prativeDezu upAya kOSalya naya saBA ga tAm tatra tatra Darma vihAra jQAna vikurvaNa tAsu Ayatana viSudDi saBA gatAm yaTASaya sattva avizama darSana samAdAnezu boDisattva samADi muKa pratilABa saBA gatAm sarva Darma viBAvanA pratilABezu aDizWAna saBA gatAm sarva taTAgata veSezu BUmi AkramaNa saBA gatAm sarva budDa boDisattva BUmi pratilABezu pratizWAna saBA gatAm sarva boDisattva vyavasTAnezu AdeSana saBA gatAm sarva budDa vyAkaraNezu samADi saBA gatAm eka kzaNe sarva samADi sAgara nayezu samADi vyavasTAna saBA gatAm nAnA lakzaNa budDa kAryezu anusmRti saBA gatAm sarva anusmRtyArambaNa naya samudrezu boDisattva caraNa saBA gatAm boDisattva kArya apara anta kowI gata kalpa vyavasAyezu prasAda saBAga tAm aprameya budDa jQAna aDimukti prIti vega samudra vivarDana tAyE vivarDana saBA gatAm sarva AvaraNa parvatAnAm avivarti a jQAna saBA gatAm budDa jQAna ananta saMBAra saMBavAya upapatti saBA gatAm sarva sattva paripAka vinaya kAlezu vihAra saBA gatAm sarvajQa tA naya muKezu vizaya saBA gatAm DarmaDAtu naya vRzaBitA vizaya praveSezu anAlaya saBA ga tAm sarva Alaya samudDAtita citta tAyE sarva Darma nirdeSa saBA gatAm Darma samatA jQAna avatArezu aBiyoga saBA gatAm sarva budDa aDizWAna sva SarIra saMprati icCana tAyE aBijQA saBA gatAm sarva loka jQApana pratipatti nayezu anaBisaMskAra RdDi pratilABa saBA gatAm sarva diS kzetra sAgara avatArezu DAraNi BUmi saBA gatAm sarva DAraNI samudra avaBAsa pratilABAya sarva budDa Darma cakra saMDi avatArasaBA gatAm sarva sUtra anta Darma paryAyezu gamBIra Darma praveSa saBA gatAm gagana tala upama sarva Darmanaya avatArezu avaBAsa saBA gatAm sarva loka DAtu prasarezu aBirocana saBA gatAm yaTASaya jagat vijQaptiMsaMdarSanezu prakampana saBA ga tAm kzetra aDizWAna vikurvita sattva darSanezu amoGa caraNa saBA gatAm darSana SravaNa anusmRti sattva vinayezu niryANa saBA gatAm pratyalaBata sarva praNiDAna samudra naya parinizpatti daSa bala jQAna anuboDAya iti hi su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH prasanna cittaH sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBAm rAtri devatAm avalokayan AsAm daSAnAm saMjQA viSudDInAm pratilABAt etat pramuKAn budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBAyAH rAtri devatAyAH saBAga tanayAn pratilaBate sma aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBAyAH rAtri devatAyAH budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama darSana tayA avatIrNaH nanta maDya kalyANa mitra saMjQA viSudDi pratilabDaH budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama saBA gata anaya avatIrNaH gv eka aMsam cIvaram prAvRtya yena sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBA rAtri devatA tena aQjalim praNamya tasyAm velAyAm imAH gATAH aBAzata yaTA sva citte vaSitA mama asti CandaH ca boDO su dRXaH nivartyaH tvadIya citte pi hi me taTA eva sva tA eva devI adya dRXa upajAtA pApAni aSezANi viSoDitAni SuBaH vipAkaH dyutimAn avAptaH sudarSanAyAH tava darSanAt me samArjitAH ca akzaya Sukla DarmAH cittam guNa oGEH samalaMkRtam me pRTagviDEH sattva hita pravRttEH samalaMkRtaH yEH caritA asmi caryAm kzetrezu sarvezu aparAnta kalpAn nidarSitA te Kalu sarva DarmAt nizpattiH Arye mad anugrahAya hitAya me nugraha saMjQayA eva Darma anuSAstim paramAm prayacCa vivartitaH durgati pAta mArgaH saMdarSitaH svarga paTaH viSudDaH sarvajQa mArgaH ca nidarSitaH te yAna anuyAnaH sugatEH aSezEH tvad antike me nupamA adButA adya niryANa saMjQA parama upajAtA AkASa vat cAm alam apramANam sarvajQa tA Darma muKam viSudDam sarvajQa tA Seza SuBa Akara tva saMjQA adya me tu ayi udita aprameyA puNya arNavAH me gagana pramANAH pratikzaNam cetasi ca udBavanti unnehi me pAramitABiH Arye puNyEH acintyEH ca vivarDayasva gv saMvarDitaH sarva guNEH SuBEH ca sarvajQa pawwam nacireNa lapsye kalyANa mitrezu hi me sadA eva sarvajQa tA mArga pratipUri saMjQA atonimittA mama sarva Suklam saMpUjita ASu praBavizyati iti sarve yatas rTAH praBavanti ca asmAt sidDaH ca kalyANa guNEH upetaH ArADya ca eva inam ananta varNam sarvajQa mArgam jagatAm pravakzye AcArya BUtA mi guNa aprameye sarvajQa cittAn duHKa paQjara prakziptAn mAra vaSa gatAn jAti jarA ramaNa Soka parideva duHKa dOrmanasya upAyAsa prapIxitAn parimocayi aTa Kalu vijitAvI rAja kumAraH tAn sarvAn banDana gatAn sattvAn= tasmAt banDana AgArAt parimocayati smaH Atma parityAgena sarva parivAreNa sa tAn parimocya yat tezAm sattvAnAm duHKa upaDAnam tat utsRjya na vinivartayate sma aTa tAni paQca amAtya SatAni UrDva bAhUni utkroSamAnAni jaya praBam rAjAnam upasaMkramya evam AhuH  yat Kalu devaH jAnIyAt  vijitAvinaH kcCandena ayam rAja koSaH vilupyate asmAkam api sarvezAm jIvite saMSayaH yadi devaH vijitAvinaH rAja kumArasya nigrahaNam ca karizyati devasya nacireNa jIvitam na Bavizyati aTa Kalu jaya praBaH rAjA kupitaH vijita Avinam rAja kumAram saha tEH aparADiBiH puruzEH vaDAya utsRzwavAn tasya mAtA janetrI tat SrutvA udvignA strI sahasra parivRtA pramukta keSI nirABaraNa gAtrI sva muKam vyAlupya uraH tAxayantI pAMSu avakIrNa SiraskA krandamAnA Arta svaram rudantI rAjAnam upasaMkramya sa parivArA caraNayoH nipatyaH evam vijQApayAmAsa  pramuQca deva vijita Avinam rAja kumAram dehi deva kumArasya jIvitam aTa rAjA vijita Avinam kumAram saMmuKam sTApayitvA evam Aham  utsRja kumAraH etAn aparADinaH manuzyAn yadi na utsrakzyasi tat ezAm arTAya vaDam upagamizyasi iti sa vaDam aByupagata vAn asaMlInena cittena asaMkucitena sarvajQa tA ArambaNa prayuktena para hita pariNatena mahA karuNA pUrvaMgamena tasya janetryAH rAjA jaya praBaH rDa mAsam yAcitaH darSanAya arDa mAsam kumAraH dAnam dadAtu yasya yena arTaH tatas yaTAkAmam karaNIyaH Bavatu tat taTA iti rAjQA anujQatAm aTa tasyAH rati vyUhAyAH rAjaDAnyAH uttareNa pUrva yajQa vAwa prakRtam sUryapraBam nAma mahA udyAnam tatra kumAraH Binizkramya yasya yena arTaH tasya tad prAdAt tena nirargalam yajQam yajatAH arDa mAsam viviDAH dAna viDayaH dattAH annam anna arTiByaH pAna vastra puzpa mAlya vilepana cUrNa cIvara= Catra Dvaja patAkA ratna ABaraNa viviDa viBUzaNa sarva upakaraNa vizayaH tad arTiBy tatas paScime divase sarva jana kAyaH saMnipatitaH rAjA amAtya strI gaNa SrezWi gRhapati nEgama janapadAH gv sarva pAzaNxAH ca saMnipatitAH sa ca BagavAn Darma cakra nirGoza gagana meGa pradIpa rAjaH taTAgataH sattva paripAka vinaya kAlam Agamayya tam yajQa vAwam upasaMkrAntaH deva indra gaNa parivRtaH nAga indra gaNa parivRtaH nAga indra saMpUjitaH yakzendra kAya aBinataH ganDarva indra aBizwutaH sura indra praNata SarIraH cUxAmaNi viBUzita prasanna cittaH garuxa indra pUjA viDiBiH aBiprakIrNaH prIti manoBiH kinnara indEH paripUjitaH stuti saMgIti saMcoditaH mahA uraga indra saMprekzita avalokita vadanaH adrAkzIt sa mahA jana kAyaH vijitAvI ca rAja kumAraH tam Bagavantam Darma cakra nirGoza gagana meGa pradIpa rAjam taTAgatam arhantam samyaksaMbudDam dUratas eva AgacCantam prAsAdikam darSanIyam SAnta indriyam SAnta mAnasam guptam jita indriyam nAgam iva su dAntam hradam iva acCam viprasannam anAvilam mahatA budDa vikurvita prAtihAryeNa mahatyA budDa vRzaBi tayA virocayamAnam budDa aDipateyena aBiBavantam budDa mAhAtmya tayA praBAsayamAnam mahAbudDa lakzaNa anuvyaQjana viBUzaNa upaSoBita kAyam sarva lokam budDa praBA maNxala avaBAsena sParamANam budDa raSmiBiH avaBAsayamAnam sarva roma vivareByaH ganDa ratna arciH cakrANi pramuQcamAnam budDa kzetra prakampanena sarva lokam saMkampayamAnam sarva vyUha meGa pravarzaNena budDa vikrameNa sarva sattva kleSa prajahanena budDeH yA paTena sarva sattva prIti vega vivarDanena budDa darSana praBAvena upasaMkramamANam dRzwvA ca BagavataH ntike cittam aBiprasAdayAmAsuH aTa Kalu vijitAvI rAja kumAraH sa ca mahAn jana kAyaH tam Bagavantam Darma cakra nirGoza gagana meGa pradIpa rAjam taTAgatam dUrAt eva pratyudgamya prasanna cittaH sarva SarIreNa praNipatya pAdO SirasA aBivandya anekaviDayA pUjayA saMpUjyaH evam vAcam aBAzata  ehi Bagavan ehi sugata samanvAhRtAH smaH taTAgatena anuparigRhItAH smaH sugatena aTa Kalu vijitAvI rAja kumAraH tasya BagavataH grAsanam upadarSayan evam Aha  nizIdatu BagavAn idam Asanam prajQaptam tatas BagavataH upasaMkrAmataH tad Asanam Suci garBa SarIra kAyikABiH devatABiH budDa anuBAvena ganDa maNi rAja padma garBam aDizWitam nyazIdat BagavAn Darma cakra nirGoza gagana meGa pradIpa rAjaH taTAgataH tatra Asane Asana parivArezu ca boDisattvAH tasya saha darSanena tasyAm parzadi sarvezAm sattvAnAm sarva vyADayaH praSAntAH sarva AvaraNa nivaraNa vigatAH ca Arya DarmANAm BAjanIBUtAH saMsTitAH aTa Kalu BagavAn Darma cakra nirGoza gagana meGa pradIpa rAjaH taTAgataH tAn sattvAn BAjana BUtAn viditvA anupUrveNa kaTAm akArzIt yat uta hetumaNxala praBAsam nAma sUtrAntam saMprakASayAmAsa svara aFga sahasra saMprayuktam ca vadana antarAt sarva Darma aFga saMprayuktam sarva jagat mantra sAgara nirukti nirnAda nirGozam niScArayAmAs aTa tAvat eva tatas parzadaH SItInAm prANi niyutAnAm virajaH vigata malam Darmezu Darma cakzuH utpannam bahuBiH ca prANi niyutEH aSEkza BUmiH anuprAptA daSa ca prANi sahasrANi mahAyAne vinItAni yat uta samantaBadra boDisattva caryA mahA praNiDAna paripUri naye vatAritAni evam tasya BagavataH mahAbudDa vikurvitena Darma cakram pravartayamAnasya daSasu dikzu budDa kzetra Sata sahasra paramANu rajaH samAH savinayam agaman ananta maDyAH ca sattvAH daSa diSi loke nAnA budDa kzetra prasara samavasaraNezu apAya BUmim vinivartayAmAsuH gv  gaNanA samatikrAntAH ca sattvAH svarga upapatti paTe pratizWApitAH aBUvan vijitAvI ca rAja kumAraH imam sarva sattva paripAka yaTA ASaya saMcodana kuSala mUla saMBavam boDisattva vimokzam pratyalaBata syAt Kalu punar te kula putra  anyaH sa tena kAlena tena samayena vijitAvI rAja kumAraH BUt yena tad sva kAya jIvitam parityajya sarva Dana skanDa parivAram parityajya sarva mAnuzyakam ca jIva loka suKam parityajya te banDana gat tasmAt banDanAt parimokzitAH sa ca nirargalaH mahA yajQaH yazwaH

column1: sa ca BagavAn Darma cakra nirGoza gagana meGa pradIpa rAjaH taTAgataH rhan samyaksaMbudDaH ArAgitaH tasya ca taTAgatasya saha darSanena anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAditam eza ca sarva sattva paripAka yaTA ASaya saMcodana kuSala mUla saMBavaH boDisattva vimokzaH pratilabDaH na Kalu punar te kula putraH evam drazwavyam aham sa tena kAlena tena samayena vijitAvI nAma rAja kumAraH BUvam mayA tad vijita avIrAja kumAra BUtena mahA karuNA prapIxitena sarva jagat hita pratipannena trEDAtukA niSritena vipAka apratikAFkziNA yaSaskIrti nAmA anaBinandinA AtmAnam anutkarzayatA parama paMsayatA sarva vastu anaBinivizwena Bava saMjQA uccalitena trEDAtuka anaBinandinA loka vizaya suKa vimuKena taTAgata vizaya avimuKena boDya ASaya viSudDena aDyASaya vajra parinizpannena sarva jagat mahA mEtrI prayogena sarva jagat mahA karuNA duHKa vyupaSama saMprayuktena taTAgata bala aDyASayam aDyAlamba tA boDisattva mArgam pariSoDayatA mahAyAna vyUha niryANa paTam alaMkurvatA sarvajQa tA mArgam aBivilokayatA imAni evam duzkarANi kRtAni evam cira pratilabDaH kula putra mayA eza sarva sattva paripAka yaTA ASaya saMcodana kuSala mUla saMBavaH boDisattva vimokzaH tat kim manyase kula putra  anyAni tAni tena samayena paQcAmAtya SatAni aBUvan yEH sa rAjA jaya praBaH vitaTam vijQApya mama vaDAya udyojitaH na Kalu evam drazwavyam imAni tAni paQca puruza SatAni yAni devadattena BagavataH vaDAya udyojitAni tAni ca BagavatA vinIya anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO vyAkRtAni  Bavizyati anAgate Dvani sumeru paramANu rajaH samEH kalpEH ekasmin su praBa nAmaDeye kalpe paQca budDa SatAni nAnA budDa kzetra guNa vyUhAni nAnA janma kula gotra saMBavAni nAnA mAtA pitR vyapadeSAni nAnA janma vikurvita saMdarSanAni nAnA aBinizkramaNa vikurvitAni nAnA boDi vRkza praBA saMdarSanAni nAnA boDi maNxa upasaMkramaNa muKAni nAnA mAra BaFga saMdarSanAni nAnA aBisaMboDi vikurvita saMdarSanAni nAnA Darma cakra pravartana naya nAma niruktIni nAnA sUtra an tanaya nirdeSAni nAnA vAc paTa ruta uda AhArANi nAnA parzad maNxala vyUhAni nAnA praBA maNxala praBA vyUha pramuQcanAni nAnA AyuH pramANAni nAnA SAsana aDizWAnAni nAnA SAsana vijQaptIni nAnA nAmaDeyAni mahA karuNA SarIrANi yezAm prATamakalpikaH mahAkAruNikaH nAma taTAgataH ratna praBAyAm loka DAtO= anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyate tasyAm eva lokaDAtO dvitIyaH sarva jagat hita praNiDAna candraH nAma taTAgataH utpatsyate
column2: smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu snang dpal dang // gnyis pa dgongs pa rdo rje ri bo dpal //

column1: tRtIyaH mahA karuNA siMhaH gv nAma taTAgataH utpatsyate caturTaH sarva loka hita ezI nAma taTAgataH utpatsyate yAvat sarva paScimaH vEdyarAjaH nAma taTAgataH utpatsyate tat kim manyase kula putra  anye te tena kAlena tena samayena aparADinaH puruzAH rAja kilbiza kAriNaH BUvan ye te mayA vaDya GAta vaSa gatAH sva kAya jIvitam parityajya tatas banDanAt parimokzitAH na Kalu evam drazwavyam ime te krakucCanda pUrva gamAH Badra kalpikAH taTAgatAH tad anyAni ca daSaH boDisattva asaMKyeya Sata sahasrANi yEH BagavataH nanta bala viGuzwa nirnAdita SrI saMBava mateH taTAgatasya darSanena ansamyaksaMboDO cittam utpAditam yAni etarhi daSasu dikzu boDi caryAm caranti ime ca sarva sattva paripAka yaTA ASaya saMcodana kuSala mUla saMBavam boDisattva vimokzam BAvayanti vipulIkurvanti tat kim manyase kula putra  anyaH sa tena kAlena tena samayena jayapraBaH nAma rAjA aBUt na Kalu evam drazwavyam satyakaH sa mahA vAdI tena kAlena tena samayena jayapraBaH nAma rAjA aBUt tat kim manyase kula putra  anyaH sa tena kAlena tena samayena rAja parivAraH BUt antaHpurastrI AgAra dOvArika pArzadyAH vA anuyAtrikA v na Kalu evam drazwavyam imAni tAni zazwiH nigranTa sahasrANi yAni satyakena mahA vAdinA BagavataH sakASam upanItAni vAdiDvaja DAraNa tayA BagavataH vAdAya upasaMkrAntAni tAni ca sarvANi BagavatA vyAkRtAni anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO nAnA budDa kzetra vyUhEH nAnA kalpEH nAnA nAmaDeyEH taTAgatAm loke utpatsyante sa Kalu punar kula putra vijitAvI rAja kumAraH mAtA pitRByAm anujQAtaH tAn banDana gatAn sattvAn parimocya sPItAm vasumatIm Dana kanaka ratna samRdDAm apahAya putra dAram ca utsRjya tasya BagavataH Darma cakra nirGoza gagana meGa pradIpa rAjasya taTAgatasya antike prAvrajat pravrajitvA paQca varza sahasrANi brahmacaryam acarat etasmin= antare daSa samADi muKa sahasrANi saMnizpAdayAmAsa daSa ca DAraNI muKa sahasrANi pratyalaBata daSa ca aBijQAnaya sahasrANi avakra antAni daSa boDisattva mahA niDAna sahasrANi pratilaBate sma daSa ca asya sarvajQa tA vega sahasrANi AjAtAni daSa ca anena kzAnti muKa sahasrANi pariSoDitAni daSa citta niDi apti sahasrANi aBinirhRtAni daSa ca boDisattva bala SarIrANi saMvarDitAni daSa ca boDisattva jQAna muKa sahasrANi avakra antAni daSa ca asya prajQApAramitA Anaya sahasrANi AjAtAni daSa ca budDa sahasra darSana diFBuKa sahasrANi AmuKIBUtAni daSa ca anena boDisattva praNiDAna sahasrANi aBinirhRtAni saH evam Darma samanvAgataH praticitta kzaNe daSasu dikzu daSa budDa kzetra sahasrANi AkrAmati sma ekEkasyAm ca lokaDAtO cit takzaNe cit takzaNe daSa budDa sahasrANi pUrva anta apara antataH nusmarati sma tezAm ca taTAgatAnAm daSa budDa nirmANa samudra sahasrANi daSa diS prasRtAni avataranti sma cit takzaNe cit takzaNe daSa budDa kzetra sahasra paryApannAn sarva sattvAn adrAkzIt nAnAgati upapannAn= cyavataH gv upapadyamAnAn hInAn praNItAn sugatAn durgatAn suvarNAn durvarNAn yaTAkAma upagatAn tezAm ca sattvAnAm cyuti upapattIH avata rati sma citta parivartAn citta caritAni cintA nantarya tAm ASaya nAnAtvam indriya sAgarAn api prayoga prasarAn api karma avasAnam api paripAka vinaya ksma sa Kalu punar kula putra vijitAvI rAja kumAraH tatas cyutvA tatra eva jambudvIpe rati vyUhAyAm rAjaDAnyAm tasmin= eva rAja kule upapadyapratyalaBata tena cakravarti rAja BUtena tasya BagavataH Darma cakra nirGoza gagana meGa pradIpa rAjasya taTAgatasya parinirvRtasya anantaram Darma gaganAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tatra eva boDimaNxe Sakra BUtena devendragarBaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tatra eva lokaDAtO suyAma deva rAja BUtena DaraNI SrIparvata tejaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva lokaDAtO saMtuzita deva rAja BUtena DarmacakrapraBa nirGoza rAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva lokaDAtO su nirmita deva rAja BUtena gaganakAnta rAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva lokaDAtO vaSa varti deva rAja BUtena anavamarda balaketuH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva lokaDAtA avasura indra BUtena sarvaDarmanigarjita rAjaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva lokaDAtO brahma indra BUtena Darma cakra nirmANa samantapratiBAsa nirGozaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH iti hi kula putraH etAn= taTAgatAn pramuKAn kRtvA tasyAm eva ratna praBAyAm lokaDAtO tasmin= eva su praBe kalpe daSa budDa sahasrANi uda sarve ca te taTAgatAH vijita AvinA rAja kumAreNa ArAgitAH tasya Kalu punar kula putra supraBasya mahA kalpasya anantaram suraSmiH nAma kalpaH BUt tasmin= ca suraSmi kalpe daSa budDa sahasrANi upapadyanta aham ca tasmin kalpe mahAmatiH nAma rAjA aBUvam tena me rAja BUtena lakzaNa SrIparvataH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe gRhapati BUtena saMvRtaskanDaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe amAtya BUtena vimala vat saH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe sura indra BUtena veSaDArI nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe vRkza devatA BUtena lakzaNasumeruH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe sArTavAha BUtena vimala bAhuH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe nagara devatA BUten siMha vikrAnta gAmI nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe vESravaNa BUtena devendracUxaH nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe ganDarva rAja BUtena Darma udgata kIrti nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH tasya anantaram tasmin= eva kalpe kumBANxa indra BUtena avaBAsamakuwI nAma taTAgataH ArAgitaH iti hi kula putra mayA etAn daSa taTAgatAn pramuKAn kRtvA tatra suraSmi kalpe zazwiH budDa kowyaH ArAgitAH nAnA upapatti kAyikayA sarve ca me taTAgatAH pUjitAH ekEkam gv  ca taTAgatam upasaMkrAmantyAH ananta maDyaH sattva DAtuH anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO paripAcitaH ekEkam ca taTAgatam upasaMkrAmantyAH nAnA samADi muKAni pratilabDAni nAnA DAraNI muKAni nAnA aBinirhAra nayA nAnA pratisaMvinnayA aBinirhArAH nAnA sarvajQa tA naya anugamA nAnA Darma Aloka muKa pratilABanayA nAnA jQAna nayA anugama vicArAH nAnA diS samudra praveSa avaBAsA nAnA kzetra samudra avatAra praveSa avaBAsAH nAnA taTA gata darSana samudra vijQapti avaBAsAH pratilabDAH avakrAntAH viSudDAH saMvarDitAH prasRtAH pratisRtAH yaTA ca tatra suraSmi kalpe taTAgatAH ArAgitAH taTA sarvatra loka DAtu samudra paramANu rajaH samezu kalpezu ye kecid taTAgatAH upapadyante ye pi tad anyeByaH lokaDAtuByaH Agatya taTAgatAH Darmam deSayamAsuH tezAm mayA sarvezAm taTAgatAnAm antikAt Darma deSanA SrutA SrutvA ca saMDAritA sarve ca mayA te taTAgatAH ArAgitAH aBirADitAH tezAm ca me budDAnAm BagavatAm SAsanam saMDAritam sarvezAm ca me tezAm taTAgatAnAm antikAt eza sarva sattva paripAka yaTA ASaya saMcodana kuSala mUla saMBavaH boDisattva vimokzaH pratilabDaH aTa Kalu sarva jagat rakzA praNiDAna vIrya praBA rAtri devatA tasyAm velAyAm etam vimokza nayam paridIpayantI saMdarSayamAnA su Danam SrgATABiH aDyaBAzata acintyam etam paramam vimokzam mAm pRcCasi tvam Kalu yat prapItaH vinirdiSatyAH sugata anuBavAt SRNuzva tat me niKilam yaTAvat kalpAn anantAn vipulAn acintyAn kzetra arNavAn= ca apratimAn asaMKyAn sarvAn atikramya baBUva ramyA ratna praBA yA Kalu lokaDAtuH tasyAm aBUt su praBa nAmaDeyaH kalpaH mitAnAm praBavaH jinAnAm ArAgitAH te Kalu me muni indrAH vimokzam etam pariBAvayantyA yasyAm rati vyUha sa nAmikA aBUt vistIrNa citrA vara rAjaDAnI su viSudDa cittAH vizama prayogAH sattvAH hi yasyAm aBavan= tadAnIm jaya praBo syAm nRpatiH baBUva DarmeNa yaH tAn anuSAsti sattvAn gv putraH sya nAmnA vijita AvirA AsIt prAsAdikaH lakzaNa citrita aFgaH vaDAya sRzwAni nRpeNa tena tadA sahasrANi aparADinAm hi dRzwvA kumAraH kRpayA parItaH tAn vipramokzAya nRpam yayAce SrutvA nRpaH mAtya gaNam tadAnIm AhUya tezAm niKilam tat Aha te procuH enam praNipatya sarve tvad DAtanAya eza nRpa prayogaH vigrAhitaH tEH nRpatiH tadA evam vaDAya tam putram aTa utsasarja adIna vaktraH sva vaDa anapekzaH vaDyAn atyajan na sa rAja sUnuH SrutvA vaDa utsRzwam aTa asya mAtA sa antaHpura ArtA nRpatim yayAce muQca arDa mAsam nRpate kumAram dAtum pradAnAni aKilAni loke datta aByanujQaH ca nRpeNa tena prAdAt sa dAnAni yaTocitAni rAtriMdivam dAnam aTa arDa mAsam datvA diSAByaH samupAgatAnAm pAzaNxinAm yasya yat Ipsitam tat tasmE dadAti sma vaDAya sajjaH mukta Arta nAdA aTa vinirjagAma sA rAjaDAnyA janatA samagrA

column1: sat Darma Goza ambara dIpa rAjaH boDi druma sTaH sugataH tadAnIm pakvAni jQAtvA jagat indriyANi tam yajQa vAwam kRpayA jagAma gv upetya tasyAm parizad i aTA asO taTAgata vyUha vikurvitena
column2: dran pa'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po chos dpal blo //

column1: Darma pradIpa ambuda Darma Goza sUtra anta rAjam sugataH baBAze ananta maDyAm janatAm vinIya sa vyAkaroti sma tadA agra boDO saMprasTitaH sO vijita avyudagraH rAja AtmajaH ca eva vara agra boDO ArAgya budDam vipulam ca tasmE viDAya pUjAm muditaH baBAze dvIpaH Baveyam jagatAm vinetA trANam SaraNyaH ca parAyaNam ca sa prAvrajat tasya muneH samIpe saMboDi mArgam parimArgamANaH Darma svaBAvam su parIkzamANaH yatra sTitaH kalpa SatAni cIrNaH duHKa arNava tve patitAm anATAm kRpAyamANaH janatAm aSezAm saMboDi mArgam pariBAvayitvA laBate tadAnIm sa vimokzam etam ye tatra kalpe sugatAH baBUvuH ArAgya tAn api aKilAn prasannaH pUjAm ca tezAm akarot udArAm saMDArayAmAsa ca Darma cakram tad uttare kalpa mahA arNavezu kzetra arNava aNu pratimezu aSezAH ye codaya atyanta jinAH tadAnIm ArAgayAmAsa sa tAn prapUjya aham saH Asam vijita avinAmAH dRzwvA narAn= cAraka banDana sTAn tad vipra mokzAya visRjya deham labDaH mama ayam hi tadA vimokzaH gv yaH BAvitaH kalpa mahA samudrAn kzetra udaDInAm paramANu saMKyAn pratikzaNam ca eva vivarDitaH BUt ananta maDyEH asamEH nayeBiH dRzwAH ca me kecana ye muni indrAH prAptaH ca yam me niKilezu avAptaH muKEH nayAnAm apara aparam ca saMdarSitaH yam mama tad vimokzaH tezAm acintye hi vimokza tattve saMSikzitA aham bahu kalpa kowIH pratizWitAH yatra jinEH vimuktAn sadDarmameGAn yugapad pibantI kzetrANi sarvANi api sarva dikzu sParanti kAyena asajjamAnAH pratikzaNam kzetra paTezu acintyAn= tri aDva aBiDAnAn praviSanti vaMSAn aSezatas traya Dvajina arNavAnAm ekEkaSas ca aBimuKAH Bavanti vidarSayanti eva ca te jinezu sva kAya meGAn pratibimba BUtAH sarvAsu dikzu api upasaMkramantaH viBAnti te sarva taTAgatAnAm vyUhAn aSeza an aBivarzamANAH pUjAm prakurvanti ca te jinAnAm pRcCanti aTo budDa samudra saMKyAn praSna udaDIn= te ananta varNEH api ca Atma BAvEH sahasraSas sarva diSaH sParanti ananta maDyAni vidarSayanti rUpANi ca api eka samucCrayam te ekEkataH roma muKAt asaMKyAn muQcanti te raSmi mahA samudrAn kleSa agni praBAgarBam nAma paQcamam boDisattva janma tatra kula putra katamat boDisattvAnAm sarva taTAgata kula gotrasaMBava garBam nAma zazWam boDisattva janma iha kula putra boDisattvaH jAtaH Bavati taTAgata kule nujAtaH Bavati taTAgata vaMSe nizpannaH Bavati sarva budDa Darma naya muKezu viSudDaH Bavati atIta anAgata pratyutpanna taTAgata mahA praNiDAnezu eka Dana kuSala mUlaH Bavati sarva taTAgata na paritrasyati sarva Darma mAyA gata yaTA BUta jQAnena svapna upamam sarva lokam prativiDyati pratiBAsa upamam sarva rUpa vijQapti aDizWAnam aBinirharati nirmita upama aBijQA vikurvita vaSitA prAptaH Bavati CAyA upamam sarva Bava gati upapattizu muKam saMdarSayati pratiSrutka upamAni sarva taTAgata Darma cakrANi prajAnAti DarmaDAtu naya nirdeSa parama pAramitA prAptaH Bavati nAnA arTa upAyanaya nirdeSa prayuktaH idam kula putra boDisattvAnAm taTAgatabalAvaBAsA lokA alaMkAra garBam nAma saptamam boDisattva janma tatra kula putra katamat boDisattvAnAm samantajQAnamuKavyavacAraparinizpattisaMBava garBam nAma azwamam boDisattva janma iha kula putra boDisattvaH kumAra BUtaH eva boDisattva vyavasTAna vyavasTitaH Bavati yatra pratizWAya sarvajQa jQAn anayam vyavacArayati ekEkatra jQAna naya muKe prameyAH kalpAH kzayam vrajeyuH aprameyam boDisattva gocaram nirdiSataH sarva boDisattva samADizu ca vaSI Bavati parama pAramitA prAptaH praticitta kzaNam sarva cit takzaNezu daSa diS ana BilApya budDa kzetra gatAnAm taTAgatAnAm pAda mUlezu upapadyate asaMBinnEH ca ArambaNEH asaMBinnAn samADIn samApadyate asaMBinnezu ca Darmezu asaMBinna jQAna vaSitAm saMdarSayati aparyantAni ca ArambaNAni anArambaNe DAtO= avakrAmati parIttEH ca ArambaNEH ananta nirdeSa BUmim avatarati aprameyAm ca Darma tAm parIttAm mahat gatAm vA prativiDyati vijQapti samam ca sarva lokam avatarati sarva Darma ArambaNAni gv sarva vijQapti paTAn= ca BAvanayA anugacCati idam kula putra boDisattvAnAm samantajQAnamuKavyavacAraNaparinizpattisaMBava garBam nAma azwamam boDisattva janma tatra kula putra katamat boDisattvAnAm DarmaDAtunirmANavyUha garBam nAma boDisattva janma iha kula putra boDisattvaH sarvatra cit takzaNe nAnA vyUhAni budDa kzetrANi aDitizWati sattva nirmANe vESAradya parama pAramitA prAptaH ca Bavati budDa nirmANa kOSalya prAptaH ca Bavati Darma nirmANa vESAradya viSudDaH ca Bavati asaFga vara Darma DAtu gocaraH ca Bavati yaTASaya sarva kAya vijQapti aDizWAna kuSalaH ca Bavati acintya sattva vinaya kOSalya gataH ca Bavati nAnA caryA aBisaMboDi saMdarSakaH ca Bavati anAvaraNa sarvajQa tA mArga aBinirhAra kuSalaH ca Bavati tad anantaram Darma cakra pravartana kOSalyam saMdarSayati ananta maDya sattva vinaya upAya aBinirhAra kuSalaH ca Bavati kAla prApte sattva vinaye sadA samAhitaH ca Bavati vErocana jQAna garBa koSaH idam kula putra boDisattvAnAm DarmaDAtunirmANavyUha garBam nAma navamam boDisattva janma tatra kula putra katamat boDisattvAnAm taTAgata BUmyAkramaNa vega garBam nAma daSamam boDisattva janma iha kula putra boDisattvaH viviktaH Bavati sarvatri aDva taTA gata ekIBAva vizaye sarva loka DAtu Anantarya vizayam ca avatarati sarva sattvAnAm pUrva anta aparAnta cyuti upapattizu citta anantarya utpAdam jAnAti sarva boDisattvAnAm caryA jQAna Anantarya vizayam prajAnAti atIta anAgata pratyutpannAnAm ca sarva budDAnAm aBisaMboDa Anantaryam prajAnAti sarva DarmANAm ca upakAra kOSalya Anantaryam prajAnAti sarva kalpa saMvarta vivarta kalpAnAm ca pUrva anta apara anta pratyuatpannAnAm sa nAmnAm sa upadeSAnAm Anantaryam prajAnAti yaTA paripAcitezu ca sattvezu yaTAkAla prAptezu aBisaMboDi vyUha vibudDi ana vizaya saMdarSana aDizWAna jQAnam aBinirharati sarva budDa utpAdezu ca aBisaMboDi upanayana Darma cakra pravartana kOSalyanayA anantaryatAm saMdarSayati ananta sattva DAtu vinaya upAya aBinirhA idam kula putra boDisattvAnAm taTAgata BUmyAkramaNa vega garBam nAma daSamam boDisattva janma imAni kula putra boDisattvAnAm daSa boDisattva janmAni yezu boDisattvAH jAyante upapadyante samarjayanti saMvarDayanti pratipUrayaparisaMBavanti parinizpadyante sarva kzetra niravaSeza anuboDAya eka vyUha alaMkAra samudAcArAn aDitizWanti sattva DAtu nayA pratiprasramBaNAya apara anta kowI gata kalpa aDizWAnAn aDitizWante sarva Darma samudra nAnA ArambaNa aneka vicitra nAnA paraMpara anirdeSa ananta Darma paraMpara asrotaH BisaMbuDyante acintyAm budDa vRzaBitAm DarmaDAtu parama AkASa DAtu paryavasAnAm saMdarSayanti aprameya sattva caryA nAnAtu a samudrezu paripAka vinaya saMgRhItezu Darma cakra pravartanam saMdarSayanti sarva loka DAtUn budDa utpAda avirahitAn aDitizWanti sarva Darma meGAnanaBilApya svara aFga samudra viSudDim sarva ArambaNezu pravartamAnAm vijQapayanti aprameya vihAritAyAm anAvaraNa gatim gatAH sarva Darma ruciravyUhAni boDisattva maNxalAni praBAvayanti yaTA Saya aDimuktizu gv sattvezu aprameya budDa BUmi anugata sarva loka parinizpAdana arTam ananta maDyam Darmakozam saMprakASayanti aTa Kalu su tejaH maNxala rati SrIH lumbinI vana devatA tasyAm velAyAm etam punar kula putra aham aprameya kalpa sarva ArambaNa boDisattva janma vikurvita saMdarSanasya boDisattva vimokzasya lABinI Aha  kaH etasya devate aprameya kalpa sarva ArambaNa boDisattva janma vikurvita saMdarSanasya boDisattva vimokzasya vizayaH Aha  aham kula putra sarva boDisattva janma saMdarSana upasaMkramaNa praNiDAna parinizpannA sA Kalu aham kula putra BagavataH vErocanasya vipulam janma samudram avatarAmi yat uta asyAm tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrAyAm lokaDAtO boDisattva janma avataramANA BAgavatyAm cAturdvIpikAyAm iha jambudvIpe lumbinI vane boDisattva janma saMdarSane pUrva praNiDAna upapannA sA aham iha boDisattva janma anusmRtim BAvayamAnAH viharAmi tasyAH mama iha viharantyA varza Satena BagavAn= tuzita BavanAt cyavizyati iti aTa asmin lumbinI vane daSa pUrva nimittAni prAdurbaBUvuH katamAni daSa yat uta  sarvam idam lumbinI vana samam saMsTitam apagata nimna unnata vizamam apagata SvaBra prapAtam idam praTamam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt punar sarvam idam lumbinI vanam utpasanna Sarkara kaWallam apagata sTANu kaNwakam vajra pRTivI tala saMsTAnam aneka ratna aBikIrNam samavasTit idam dvitIyam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt punar sarvam idam lumbinI vanam sarva ratna druma SAla tAla paFkti su viBakta alaMkAram samavAsTizata idam tRtIyam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt punar sarvam idam lumbinI vanam divya samatikrAnta ganDa aFkura prarUXam sarva cUrNa koSa saMBUtam sarva Dvaja meGa pawala maNxala jAtam ganDa maNi vigraha vRkza mUla parisaMsTApita alaMkAram samavAsTizata idam caturTam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt punar sarvam idam lumbinI vanam viviDa divya puzpa mAlya ABaraNa koSa nirvRtta sarva alaMkAra paripUrNam samavAsTizata idam paQcamam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt gv  punar sarvasmin= iha lumbinI vane sarva vRkzezu mahA maNi ratna koSAH aBinirvRttAH idam zazWam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt punar sarvasmin= iha lumbinI vane sarva nalinIzu sarvANi jalaja ratna puzpANi SuFgIBUtAni DaraNi talAt aByudgamya vAri samudgatAni sama idam saptamam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt punar yAvantaH iha lokaDAtO kAmAvacarAH rUpAvacarAH ca deva putrAH nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahA uragAH loka indra jagat indrA vA te pyasmin lumbinI vane sarve kRta aQjali puwAH sTitAH aBUvan idam azwamam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt punar yAvantaH iha cAturdvIpikAyAm lokaDAtO deva kanyAH vA nAga kanyA vA yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahA uraga kanyA vA tAH sarvAH pramudita mAnasAH sarva pUjA viDi parigRhIta hastAH plakza SAKA aBimuKAH praNata kAyAH sTitAH aBUvan idam navamam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt punar daSaByaH digByaH sarva taTAgatAnAm nABi maNxaleByaH niScaramANA boDisattva janma vikurvita pradIpA nAma raSmayaH niScaritvA sarvam idam lumbinI vanam avaBAsya tizWanti sma tezu ca sarva raSmi muKa maNxalezu tezAm sarva taTAgatAnAm janma vikurvitAni pratiBAsa prAptAni saMdRSyante sma saMprasava vikurvitAH sarva boDisattva guNAH ca budDa svara saMprayuktAH teByaH raSmi muKa maNxaleByaH niScaramANAH SrUyante sma idam daSamam pUrva nimittam prAduraBUt imAni daSa pUrva nimittAni prAdurBUtAni boDisattva janma kAla samaye pratyupasTite yezAm prAdurBAvAt vitarkam aBavat sarva loka indrANAm boDisattvaH janizyate iti sA Kalu punar aham kula putraH ezAm daSAnAm pUrva nimittAnAm darSanAt acintyam prIti vegam pratilaBe punar aparam kula putra mAyAdevyAH kapila vastunaH mahA nagarAt nizkramantyAH iha lumbinI vane daSa mahA vaBAsa pUrva nimittAni prAduraBUv yezAm prAdurBAvAt aprameyANAm sattvAnAm sarvajQa tA Darma Aloka prIti vegAH vivarDitAH katame daSa yat uta  DaraNI tala gatezu sarva ratna kUwa AgAra garBezu avaBAsaH prAdurBUtaH sarva ganDa kusuma mukulezu avaBAsaH prAdurBUtaH aSeza ratna padma mukulezu vikasamAnezu sarva patreByaH vaBAsaH prAdurBUtaH maDuraH ca sujAta jAta SabdaH eByaH niScarati sma yaH ca daSasu dikzu boDisattvAnAm praTama citta utpAda avaBAsaH saH idam lumbinI vanam avaBAsya aByuditaH yat ca daSasu dikzu boDisattvAnAm sarva boDisattva BUmi AkramaNa avaBAsa vikurvitam tat iha lumbinI vane prAduraBUt yaH ca daSasu dikzu boDisattvAnAm sarva pAramitA parinizpatti jQAna aDigama Aloka avaBAsaH saH iha lumbinI vane prAdurbaBUva yaH ca daSasu dikzu boDisattvAnAm sarva praNiDAna vaSitA jQAna Aloka avaBAsaH saH iha lumbinI vane prAdurbaBUva yaH ca daSasu dikzu sarva boDisattvAnAm paripAka vinaya jQAna Aloka avaBAsaH saH iha lumbinI vane prAdurbaBUva yaH ca daSasu dikzu sarva boDisattvAnAm DarmaDAtu naya jQAna aDigama Aloka avaBAsaH saH iha lumbinI vane prAdurbaBUva yaH ca daSasu dikzu sarva boDisattvAnAm budDa vikurvita janma aBinizkramaNa boDi vibuDi anajQAna aDigama Aloka avaBAsaH saH iha lumbinI vane prAdurbaBUva imAni daSa mahA vaBAsa nimittAni prAdurbaBUvuH yEH ananta maDyAnAm boDisattvAnAm citta ASaya gahana anDakArANi avaBAsitAni gv tatra kula putra mAyAyAH devyAH plakza druma nilaya gatAyAH saMnipatitAnAm sarva loka indrANAm sarva kAma DAtukAnAm ca deva putrANAm sa apsaraH gaNa deva kanyA parivArANAm saMnipatitAnAm sarvezAm ca rUpAvacarANAm deva putrANAm nirAma ganDAnAm sarvezAm ca deva nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahoragANAm sa parivArANAm saMnipatitAnAm boDisattva pUjA saMprayuktAnAm mAyAdevyAH tejasA SriyA varNena rUpeNa sarva pUjA vyUhAH kAyAH ca avaBAsitAH baBUvuH asyAm ca tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrAyAm lokaDAtO yAH praBAH tAH api sarvAH grastAH ca aBiBUtAH ca aBUvan sarva roma vivara visRtAH ca mAyAdevyAH praBAva BAsAH tad anyABiH praBABiH anupahatA anAvRtAH apravyAhRtAH asaFgAH sarva diSaH sParitvA sarvANi nErayikANi duHKAni sarvANi tEryagyonikAni duHKAni sarvANi ca yAma lOkikAni duHKAni sarva Bava gati paryApannAnAm ca sattvAnAm sarva duHKAni saMkleSAn= ca praSamayitvA tizWanti BAsante tapanti virocante sma idam kula putra boDisattvasya lumbinI vane praTamam janma vikurvitam punar aparam kula putra yasmin samaye mAyAyAH devyAH kukzO sarva AvatIyam tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrA lokaDAtuH antargatA pratiBAsa prAptA s tasyAm ca tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrAyAm lokaDAtO kowI Sata cAturdvIpikAnAm lokaDAtUnAm sarve jambudvIpezu nAnA nAmaDeyAsu rAjaDAnIzu nAnA nAmaDeyezu vana zaNxezu nAnA vRkza mUlezu mAyAdevI upagatA evam eva saMdRSyate sma sarva loka indra parivRtA boDisattva janma pratyupasTAnA acintyena boDisattva jananI jQAna vikurvitena idam kula putra boDisattvasya lumbinI vane dvitIyam janma vikurvitam punar aparam kula putra mAyAyAH devyAH sarva roma vivareByaH ekEkasmAt roma muKAt yAvantaH BagavatA pUrvam boDisattva caryAm caratA taTAgasatkRtAH gurukRtAH mAnitA pUjitAH te sarve saMdRSyante sma yaH ca tEH taTAgatEH DarmaH deSitaH sa sarvaH teByaH roma vivareByaH budDa svara aFga saMprayuktaH niKilena SrUyate sma tat yaTA api nAma vAri rASe rajasi kanaka paramANu rajasi vA AdarSa maNxale vA svacCe su prasanne vA udake gagana maNxalam Aditya candra jyotigraha gaNa pratimaNxitam gamBIra meGa pawala nigarjita nirGoza pratiBAsa prAptam saM evam eva kula putra mAyAyAH devyAH sarva roma muKa maNxalezu pUrva taTAgata vikurvitAni saMdRSyante sma sarva Darma deSanA nirGozANi idam kula putra boDisattvasya lumbinI vane tRtIyam janma vikurvitam punar aparam kula putra mAyAyAH devyAH sarva kAyAt sarva roma muKa maNxaleByaH ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt yAvatsu sarva kzetrezu yAvatsu loka DAtu samudrezu yAvatsu lokaDAtu vaMSezu yAvatsu lokaDAtu saMjQA gatezu BagavAn boDisattva cArikAm akArzIt yad pratizWAnezu kzetrezu yat saMsTAnezu yat vyUhezu yat SarIrezu yat parvata alaMkArezu yad grAma nagara nigama janapada pawwana alaMkArezu yat udyAna nadI hRdataxAga sAgara alaMkArezu yat gagana meGa alaMkArezu yat sattva nilayezu yat yAna nirdeSezu yat kalpanAma saMKyAsu yat budDa utpAda praBavezu yat viSudDi paramezu yaTA AyuH pramANa sattvezu yaTA loka janma upapattizu yaTA sattva samavaDAnezu yaTA kalyANa mitra saMniSrayezu yaTA kuSala Darma prayogezu yaTA Darma pratipati aBiyogezu gv budDa kzetrezu boDisattva cArikAm acaran te sarve budDa kzetra prasarAH mAyAyAH devyAH sarva roma muKeByaH saMdRSyante sma yAvadBiH ca kAyEH BagavAn pUrvam boDisattva cAri kAm akArzIt avivarti asTAna prAptaH yEH AkArEH yEH vihArEH yEH pariBogEH yEH suKa duHKa pratisaMvedIBiH yezu jAti parivartezu tat sarvam ekEkasmin roma vivare saMdRSyate sma sarvezu ca tezu tAsu tAsu upapattizu mAyAdevI boDisattvasya jananI baBUva sarve ca te boDisattva kAyAH mAyAyAH devyAH roma vivarezu vikurvita pratiBAsa prAptAH saMdRSyante sma idam kula putra boDisattvasya lumbinI vane caturTam janma vikurvitam punar aparam kula putra yAvadBiH kAyEH BagavAn pUrvam boDisattva cArikAm acarat yat varNEH yat saMsTAnEH yat AkArEH yat pariBogEH yat suKa duH te sarve mAyAyAH devyAH kAye sarva roma muKezu pratiBAsa prAptAH saMdRSyante sma idam kula putra lumbinI vane boDisattvasya paQcamam janma vikurvitam punar aparam kula putra yAvantaH BagavatA pUrvam boDisattva cArikAm caratAH duzkara parityAgAH parityaktAH hasta pAda parityAgAH vA karNa nAsA parityAgAH vA jihvA daMzwrA parityAgAH vA nayana uttamAFga parityAgA vA mAMsa SoNita parityAgAH vA asTi majjA parityAgAH vA vakzaH hRdaya parityAgA vA Cavi carma parityAgA vA bAhya ADyAtmika vastu parityAgAH vA putra duhitR BAryA parityAgA vA Atma BAva parityAgA vA Boga ratna parityAgAH vA grAma nagara nigama janapada rAzwra rAjaDAnI parityAgA vA Dana DAnya koSa kozWAgAra parityAgA vA maNi muktA vExUrya SaFKa SilA pravAla jAtarUpa rajata parityAgA vA viviDa ratna ABaraNa parityAgA vA SayyA Asana parityAgAH vA gRha vimAna parityAgA vA sarva upaBoga parityAgA vA te ca dAyaka boDisattva vigraha kAyEH rUpEH parityajanti sma te ca pratigrAhakAyEH rUpEH pratigRhNanti sma tAni ca deSa vastUni yAni parityaktAni te ca deSa pradeSAH te ca boDisattva parivArAH sarve te mAyAyAH devyAH sarva roma vivareByaH pratiBAsa prAptAH saMdRSyante sma idam kula putra lumbinI vane boDisattvasya zazWam janma vikurvitam punar aparam kula putra  lumbinI vana zaNxe samavasRtA aBijAta jagat vijQAnA prAduraBavat idam kula putra lumbinI vane boDisattvasya saptamam janma vikurvitam punar aparam kula putra yAvantaH sarva deva indra Bavana vyUha pariBoga samatikrAntAH sarva nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnaram ahoH agaman sarva boDisattva pariBogAH yat uta sarva maNi rAja kUwa AgAra pariBogAH vA maNi rAja vimAna pariBogAH vA maNi rAja jAla pariBogA vA maNi rAja vigraha pariBogAH vA maNi rAja bimba pariBogAH vA maNi rAjavyUhA vA sarva ABaraNa pariBogA vA sarva ganDa rAja pariBogAH vA SuBa apratikUla sarva ArambaNa pariBogAH vA te sarve mAyAyAH devyAH kukzeH anyonya asaMBinnAH niScaritvA iha lumbinI vane samanta vyUhAH samavAsTizanta idam kula putra lumbinI vane boDisattvasya azwamam janma vikurvitam gv punar aparam kula putra mAyAyAH devyAH kukzeH praTamataram daSa budDa kzetra anaBilApya kowI niyuta Sata sahasra paramANu rajaH samA boDisattvAH BagavataH vErocanasya sadRSa rUpa varNa saMsTAnAH sadRSa lakzaNa anuvyaQjana alaMkArAH sadRSa praBAH sadRSa raSmi pramuQcanAH sadRSa liFga lIlAH sadRSa vikramAH sadRSa virocana vikurvitAH sadRSa parivArAH sadRSa vyUhAH niScaranti sma BagavataH varNa samudrAn udIrayamANAH idam kula putra lumbinI vane boDisattvasya navamam janma vikurvitam punar aparam kula putra boDisattvasya janma kAla samaye pravRtte mAyAyAH devyAH purastAt aDo vajra talAt mahA pRTivIm aBinirBidya sarvaratnavyUha garBam nAma mahA maNi ratna padmam aByudgatam aBUt aparAjita mahA vajra maNi rAja garBa sar daSa budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH sama patra paFkti su viBaktam viviDa maNi rAja patra maNxalam cintAmaNi rAja viSudDa karNikam sarva ratna varNa aprameya kesara paFkti vyUham asaMKyeya maNi rAja ratna vyUha jAla saMCannam aBedya nArAyaNa vajra maNi rAja indra kUwa saMCAditam sarva deva indra kAya parivRtam sarva nAga indra ganDa meGa aBipravarzitam divya puzpa pANi puwa prayukta sarva yakza indra parivRtam sarva ganDarva indra pUrva budDa utpAda sTAna maDura ruta saMgIti nirGoza saMprayukta stuti meGa AvizkRtam nihata mAna mada darpa sarva asura indra praNata SarIra namaskRtam sarva garuxa indra aBipralambita ratna pawwa gagana meGa alaMkAra boDisattva gaNa saM prIti manoBiH sarva kinnara indrEH saMprekzitam sarva mahA uraga indra prIti saMBava prayukta naya rucira nirGoza vyUha meGa aBipravarzitam idam kula putra lumbinI vane boDisattvasya daSamam janma vikurvitam imAni kula putra lumbinI vane boDisattvasya daSa janma vikurvitAni prAduraBUvan tatas paScAt boDisattvaH cintyA pramANa praBA secanaka darSanaH mAyAyAH devyAH kukzeH aByudgataH sUrya maNxalam iva gagana talAt vidyut kalApaH iva meGa saMGAtAt sAMDyaH iva mahA GanaH SEla SiKara antarAt mahA pradIpaH iva tamaH nDakArAt iti evam boDisattvaH mAyAyAH devyAH kukzeH aBinizkramaNam saMdarSayAmAsa mAyA gata rUpa vijQapti saMdarSana Darma tayA anAgata Darma tayA a iti evam aham kula putra BagavataH vErocanasya janma vikurvita samudrAn avatarAmi iha lumbinI vane viharamANA yaTA ca aham kula putra syAm BAgavatyAm cAturdvIpikAyAm BagavataH vErocanasya janma vikurvita samudrAn avatarAmi taTA sarvAvatyAm tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrAyAm lokaDAtO sarva cAturdvIpikAsu kowI Sata jambudvIpAnAm sarvatra BagavataH vErocanasya janm yaTA ca aham kula putra asyAm tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrAyAm lokaDAtO sarva cAturdvIpikAsu kowI Sata jambu dvIpAnAm BagavataH vErocanasya kow evam sarva tri sAhasra mahA sAhasra loka DAtu paryApanna paramANu rajaH ntargatezu sarva budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH praveSa jQAna anugatezu praticitta kzaNam ekEkena citta praveSena budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAni BagavataH vErocanasya janma vikurvitAni avatarAmi tad anantareNa cittena budDa kzetra sahasra paramANu raja untargatezu budDa kzetrezu ekEkatra budDa tad samAni eva boDisattva janma vikurvid etena nayena budDa kzetra paramANu raja untargatezu gv budDa kzetrezu ekEkasmin budDa kzetre sarvANi boDisattva janma vikurvitAni avatarAmi na ca paryantam upEmi sarva paramANu rajaHsu ekEkasmin paramANu rajasi budDa kzetra paraMparANAm na ca paryantam upEmi sarva kzetrezu ekEkasmin budDa kzetre b yaTA ca iha lokaDAtO sarvANi boDisattva janma vikurvitAni avatarAmi taTA daSasu dikzu ananta maDyAsu lokaDAtuzu sarva paramANu rajaHsu praticitta kzaNam ekEkena citta praveSena sarva AkArANi sarva boDisattva janma vikurvita anyavatarAmi apratiprasrabDi aDizWAna yogena evam ukte su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH su tejaH maNxala rati Sriyam lumbinI vana devatAm evam Aha kiyat cira pratilabDaH tvayA ayam devate aprameya kalpa sarva ArambaNa boDisattva janma vikurvitam saMdarSayamAnaH boDisattva janma vimokzaH Aha  BUta pUrvam kula putra atIte Dvani budDa kzetra kowI paramANu rajaH samAnAm kalpAnAm pareNa parataram ISvaraguNa aparAjitaDvajaH nAma taTAgataH rhan samyaksaMbudDaH loka udapAdi vidyA caraNa saMpannaH sugataH loka vid anuttaraH puruza damya sAraTiH SAstA deva manuzyANAm budDaH BagavAn samantaratnAyAm lokaDAtO samApadyate kalpe SIti budDa kowI niyuta Sata sahasra praBave tasyAm Kalu kula putra samantaratnAyAm lokaDAtO vicitravyUhapraBA nAma maDyamA cAturdvIpikA aBUt tasyAm Kalu cAturdvIpikAyAm maDye jambudvIpasya meruviSudDavyUhaDvajAH nAma rAjaDAnI a BUt tasyAm Kalu rAjaDAnyAm ratnArci netrapraBaH nAma rAjA aBUt rAjQaH Kalu kula putra ratna arci netra praBasya rAjQaH suharzitapraBeSvarAH nAma BAryA aBUt tat yaTA api nAma kula putra asyAm BAgavatyAm cAturdvIpikAyAm iha jambudvIpe mAyAdevI BagavataH vErocanasya janetrI evam eva kula putra tena kAlena tena samayena tasyAm vicitra vyUha praBAyAm cAturdvIpikAyAm

column1: jambudvIpe suharzitapraBeSvarAH nAma tasya BagavataH ISvara guNa aparAjita Dvajasya taTAgatasya mAtA aBUt yaTA tezAm aSIti budDa kowI niyutAnAm pUrvaMgamasya prATamakalpikasya BagavataH ISvara guNa aparAjita Dvajasya taTAgatasya mAtA aBUt sA Kalu kula putra su harzita praBeSvarA devI boDisattvasya janma kAla samaye viMSatyA strI niyuta Sata sahasrEH sArDam suvarNa puzpa ABamnAma mahA udyAnam niryayO yatra tam ISvara guNa aparAjita Dvajam kumAram janayAmAsa acintyena boDisattva vikurvitena tena Kalu punar samayena suvarNa puzpa ABa maNxalasya nAma mahA udyAnasya maDye SuBaratnavicitrakUwam nAma kUwAgAram aBUt
column2: chos 'dzin pa dang rin chen sbyin dpal dang // rgyal ba yon tan khor yug dpal gyi sprin //

column1: tasmin kUwAgAre sarva kAmaMdada vRkza SAKAm aDyAlamba tayA su harzita praBeSvarAyAH devyAH sa BagavAn ISvara guNa aparAjita DvajaH taTAgataH j tena Kalu samayena tasya BagavataH janma kAle vimalasaMBavapraBA nAma DAtrI pratyupasTitA aBUt jAta mAtram ca boDisattvam loka indrAH vicitra suraBi manojQa divya puzpa utkara udgAriBiH parama suraBi ganDA udaka kalaSEH visnApya tad arhABiH ca acintya asaMKyeyABiH uttam ABiH pUjABiH aBipUjya tasyAH vimala saMBava praBAyAH DAtryAH aFke prAyacCan parigRhIta mAtre ca tasmin boDisattve tayA DAtryAH uBAByAm pANiByAm aMse ca tad kzaNam eva sA DAtrI mahA prIti prAmodya vega pratilabDA samantacakzuH vizayam nAma boDisattva samADim pratyalaBata yasya samADeH gv saha pratilABAt tasmAt daSasu dikzu nAnA loka DAtu sTitAH aprameyAH taTAgatAH cakzuzaH ABAsam agaman eza ca aprameya kalpa sarva ArambaNa boDisattva janma vikurvita saMdarSanaH boDisattva vimokzaH vakra antar su sUkzmaH tat yaTA api nAma tad divasa avakrAnte mAtuH kukzO garBa vijQAnam yasya vimokzasya pratilamBAt anayA sarva taTAgata janma vikurvita saMdarSana mahA praNiDiH aBinirhRtaH tat kim manyase kula putra  anyA sA tena kAlena tena samayena vimala saMBavapraBA nAma boDisattva DAtrI aBUt na Kalu punar tvayA evam drazwavyam aham sA tena kAlena tena samayena vimala saMBava praBA nAma boDisattva DAtrI aBUvam tat kim manyase kula putra  anyAni tena kAlena tena samayena viMSati strI niyuta Sata sahasrANi aBUvan na Kalu evam drazwavyam imAni tAni viMSati devatA niyuta Sata sahasrANi yAni iha lumbinI vane prativasanti mama parivArAH tat kim manyase kula putra  anyA sA tena kAlena tena samayena supraharzitapraBeSvarAH nAma devI aBUt ISvara guNa aparAjita Dvajasya kumA na Kalu evam drazwavyam iyam sA mAyAdevI tena kAlena tena samayena supraharzitapraBeSvarAH nAma devI aBUt tat kim manyase kula putra  anyaH sa tena kAlena tena samayena ratnArci netrapraBaH nAma rAjA aBUt na Kalu evam drazwavyam ayam sa rAjA SudDodanaH tena kAlena tena samayet ratnArci netrapraBaH nAma rAjA aBUt sA Kalu aham kula putra tatas upAdAya sarva cit takzaNezu avirahitAH aBUvam BagavataH vErocanasya boDisattva janma vikurvita sAgara avataraNa tayA sattva naya vRzaBitA vikurvita sAgara avataraNa tayA yaTA ca aham kula putra asyAm sahAyAm lokaDAtO BagavataH vErocanasya mahA praNiDAna samudra sAgara saMBavAnAm taTAgatAnAm sarva cit takzaNezu sarva paramANu rajaH praveSa samavasRtena jQAnacakzuzA sarva paramANu rajaHsu kzetra samudrAn avatarAmi tezu ca kzetrezu taTAgata utpAda sAgarAn avatarAmi yaTA tezAm taTAgatAnAm boDisattva janma vikurvita mahA samudrAn avatarAmi taTA daSasu dikzu ananta maDyAnAm taTAgatAnAm sarva cit takzaNezu boDisattva janma vikurvita sAgarAn avatarAmi yaTA ca asyAm tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrAyAm lokaDAtO sarva paramANu rajaH prasara paraMpara avatAreNa samyaksaMbudDa boDisattva janma aBimuKIB evam daSasu dikzu budDa kzetra anaBilApya kowI niyuta Sata sahasra paramANu rajaH prasara antargatAn kzetra sAgarAn avatarAmi tezu ca vipulAn budDa samudrAn avatarAmi tAn= ca budDAn BagavataH boDisattva BUta janma vikurvita saMmuKIBAva gatAn paSyAmi taTAgata BUtAn api pUjayAmi tezAm ca taTAgatAnAm Darma deSanAm SRNomi Darmasya ca anuDarmam pratipadye aTa Kalu su tejaH maNxala rati SrIH lumbinI vana devatA evam eva aprameya sarva kalpa sarva AvaraNa boDisattva janma vikurvita saMdarSana boDisattva paridIpayamAnAH budDa aDizWAnena daSa diSaH vyavalokya tasyAm velAyAm imAH gATAH aBAzata budDa putra SRNu mahya BAzitam yasmi pRcCasi janitva gOravam gv SAnta durdRSu jinAna gocaraH hetu kAraNa nayEH nidarSitaH kzetra kowi paramANu sAdRSAn pUrva kalpa smaramI acintiyAn kalpaH AdiH iva ananta nAyakaH yatra aSItina yutA jinAn aBUt

column1: ISvara ajita guNa DvajaH tadA tezu aBUt praTamakaH taTAgataH jAnamAna maya drazwu nAyakaH svarNa puzpa praBave vana uttame nAmataH vimala saMBava praBA tasya Asi ahu DAtri paNxitA lokapAla mama aMsi tam sTapI jAta mAtra kanaka uttama praBam aMsi tam grahiya agra pudgalam mUrDnimasya na praBomi prekzitum tam acintiyam prekzamANa na ca antu paSyami lakzaNa iBi pratimaNxitam SuBam kAyam asya vimalam sudarSanam dRzwa me ratana bimba sAdRSam prIti vega atulAH vivarDitAH cintayitva guNa tasya me mitAn puNya sAgara ameya varDitAH

column1: prArTayitva jina varNa sAgarAn varDitaH praNiDi sAgaraH mama sarva kzetra prasarAH viSoDitA sarva durgati paTAH vivartitAH pUjanAya sugatAn acintiyAn sarva kzetra prasarezu anAgatAn gv sattva duHKita vimocanAya ca proditaH praNiDi sAgaraH mama Srutva Darmam aTa tasya tAyinaH labDimam vara vimokza maNxalam boDi SoDitu caritva cArikAm kalpa kzetra raja kowi sAdRSAn yezu yAnta kupapan na nAyakA te aSeza mayi sarvi pUjitAH SAsanam ca maya tezu DAritam SoDanAH imu vimokza sAgaram kzetra kowi paramANuBiH samAH ye Bavan daSa balAH atItakAH
