column1: Darma cakru maya teza DAritam BAvitam vara vimokza maNxalam budDa kzetri raja yAvataH iho tAn raja agra prasara abDi paSyatI ekam eki raji kzetra sAgarAn pUrva SoDita jinena paSyatI tezu kzetra prasarezu nAyakAn jAyataH vana varezu paSyami ekacitta prasare acintiyA darSayanta vipulA vikurvitA paSyami kvaci ca kzetri nAyakAn prArTayanta vara boDim uttamAm tizWatam tuzita lokam    kzetra kowina yutEH acintiyEH jAyamAna vipulEH vikurvitEH kzetra sAgara Satezu paSyami nAri saMGa vara saMpuraskRtAH BAzamANu Darma nAyakAn gv kzetra kowi paramANu sadRSa aneka citta kzaNe vIra paSyami darSayanta jagatAm anekaDA eki kzaNi SAnta nirvRtim janma yAtuka jinAna paSyami prekzamANa raji kzetra sAgarAn janmi janmi bahu kAya kowiBiH pUji teza karuNAm upAgami kzetra sAgara nayEH acintanEH akzayA gati pracAra yAtukAH tezu sarva jagat AmuKAH aham Darma meGa vipulAn pravarzam i etam aham jinasutA acintiyam jAnamI vara vimokza maNxalam kalpa kowina yutEH acintiyEryam na Sakya ayu sarva darSitum etam aham kula putra aprameya kalpa sarva ArambaNa boDisattva janma vikurvita saMdarSanam boDisattva vimokzam jAnAmi kim mayA Sakyam boDisattvAnAm cit takzaNe cit takzaNe sarva kalpa prasTAna garBa saMBUta cittAnAm sarva Darma naya niDi apti jAti nidarSakAnAm sarva taTAgata pUjA praNiDi saMBUta ASayAnAm sarva budDa Darma aBisaMboDi praNiDi paramANAm sarva kula gotra upapatti gati saMdarSana pratiBAsa kalpAnAm sarva taTAgata pAda mUla padma garBa upapattInAm sarva jagat paripAka kAla aBijQAnAm sarva vinaya aBimuKa janma upapatti vikurvita saMdarSakAnAm sarva kzetra prasara vikurvita meGa saMdarSakAnAm sarva jagat gati jAti kula pratiBAsa prAptAnAm caryAm jQAtum guNAn vA vaktum gacCa kula putra iyam iha eva kapila vastuni mahA nagare gopAH nAma SAkya kanyA prativasati tAm upasaMkramya paripRcCa  kaTam boDisattvena boDisattva paripAkAya saMsAre saMsaritavyam aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH su tejaH maNxala rati SriyaH lumbinI vana devatAyAH pAdO SirasA aBivandya su tejaH maNxala rati Sriyam lumbinI vana devatAm aneka Sata sahasra kRtvas pradakziNIkRtya punar punar avalokya su tejaH maNxala rati SriyaH lumbinI vana devatAyAH antikAt prakrAntaH gv gopA aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH su tejaH maNxala rati SriyaH lumbinI vana devatAyAH antikAt apakramya yena kapilavastu mahA nagaram tena upasaMkramya etam eva aprameya kalpa sarva ArambaNa boDisattva janma vikurvita saMdarSanam boDisattva vimokzam BAvayan avataran vipulIkurvan anutizWan uttApayan parijayan paricintayan pravicinvan anupUrveNa yena DarmaDAtu pratiBAsa praBaH boDisattva saMgIti prAsAdaH tena upasaMkrAmat tasya upasaMkramaNasya aSokaSrIH nAma boDisattva saMgIti prAsAda devatAH daSaBiH gRha devatA sahasrEH sArDam pratyudgamya su Danam SrezWi dArakam evam Aha  svAgatam te mahApuruza mahA prajQA jQAna vikrAmin acintya boDisattva vimokza BAvanA aDyAlambana praNiDi citta vipula Darma vimAna gocara cArin Darma nagara aBimuKa ananta boDisattva upAyanayA avatAraNA pratiprasrabDa taTA gata guNa sAgara avaBAsa pratilabDa sarva jagat vinaya pratiBAsa pratiBAna jQAna aBimuKa sarva sattva caryA jQAna kAya mantra anuvartana caryA aBimuKa citta sarva jagat vedanA prIti samudra vega vivarDana praNiDAna sarva taTAgata Darma prativeDa mArga pratipanna yaTA tvAm paSyAmi animiza netra gamBIra caryA IH yApaTa viSudDa gocaram nacireNa tvam anuttara taTAgatakAya vAc citta alaMkAra viSudDim pratilabDaH lakzaNa anuvyaQjana pratimaNxitena kAyena daSa bala jQAna Aloka alamlokam vicarizyasi yAdRSIm ca te dRXa vIrya parAkramatAm paSyAmi nacireNa tvam sarvatri aDva taTA gata saMmuKIBAva darSana samaFgI sarva taTAgata Darma meGAn saMpratIcCan sarva boDisattva DyAna vimokza samADi samApatti SAnta Darma vimAna ratim anuBavan gamBIram budDa vimokzam anupravekzyasi taTA hi tvam kalyANa mitra upasaMkramaNa darSana paryupAsana anuSAsanIH saMpratIcCan= tad guNa pratinayezu prayujyamAnaH na pariKidyase na vinivartase na paritapasi na ca te kaScid antarAyaH vA AvaraNam vA nivaraNam vA prasahate mArAH vA mAra kAyikAH vA devatAH tena acirAt eva tvam sarva sattvAnAm prIti karaH Bavizyasi evam ukte su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH Soka Sriyam boDisattva saMgIti prAsAda devatAm etat avocat  taTA astu devate yaTA vadasi aham Kalu devate sarva sattva kleSa saMtApa vyupaSamena paramAm prItim vindAmi sarva sattva vizaya karma vipAka vinivartanena sarva sattva suKa saMBavena sarva sattva anavadya karma pratipattyA paramAm prItim vindAmi yadA ca devate sattvAH viviDa vizaya karma kleSa prayoga Akzipta cittAH durgatizu prapatanti su gatizu vA viviDAni kAyika cEtasikAni duHKa dOrmanasyAni pratyanuBavanti durmanasaH tasmin samaye boDisattvAH Bavanti parama durmanasaH tat yaTA api nAma devate puruzasya ekAnta tRzNA caritasya eka putrakaH Bavet priyaH manApaH sa tasya aFga pratyaFgezu cCidyamAnezu ekAnta tRzNA carita tvAt parama durmanAH syAt anAtta manaskaH evam eva devate boDisattvaH boDisattva cArikAm caran sattvAn karma kleSa vaSena tisRzu durgatizu patitAn dRzwvA durmanAH Bavati param yasmin vA punar samaye sattvAH kAyava aFBa naH su carita samAdana hetoH kAyasya BedAt sugatO svarga loke devezu upapadyante deva manuzya gatizu ca kAyika cEtasikAni suKAni pratyanuBavanti parama suKI tasmin samaye boDisattvaH Bavati sumanAH Atta manaskaH pramuditaH gv prIti sOmanasya jAtaH na Kalu punar devate boDisattvAH Atma arTAya sarvajQa tAm aBiprArTayante na vicitra saMsAra rati suKa praBavana arTam na kAmaDAtu paryApannam viviDa rati vyUha prArTanayA saMjQA citta dRzwi viparyAsa vaSena na saMy na tRzNA dRzwi vaSa gatAH na viviDa sattva saMsarga rati saMjQA vinibadDa cetasaH na DyAna rati suKa AsvAda parigRdDAH na viviDa AvaraNa AvRtAH saMsAra gatizu parivartante api tu Kalu punar devate boDisattvAH Bava samudra gatAnAm aparimita duHKa prapIxitAnAm sattvAnAm antike mahA karuNAm saMjanayitvA sarvaj te mahA karuNA praNiDi aBinirhAra bala vegena sattva paripAka vinaya prayuktAH saMsAre boDisattva caryAm carantaH saMdRSyante te sarva sattvanAm sarva AvaraNa sarvajQa tA jQAnam paryezamANAH sarva taTAgata pUjA upasTAna praNiDim aBinirharanti te taTAgata pUjA upasTAna praNiDi vaSEH na pariKidyante boDisattva caryAyAm te boDisattva caryAm carantaH saMklizwAni kzetrANi saMpaSyantaH sarva budDa kzetra pariSoDana praNiDim aBinirharanti saMklizwAn kzetra sAgarAn pariSoDayamAnAH sarva sattvAnAm Ayatana nAnA tvam saMpaSyamAnAH anAnAtvA anuttara Darma kAya pariSudDaye praNiDim aBinirharanti saMklizwa kAya vAc citta tAm sattvAnAm saMpaSyamAnAH sarva sattva kAya vAc citta alaMkAra pariSudDaye praNiDim aBinirharanti vikala Ayata nAnapariSudDa cetasaH sarvAn saMpaSyamAnAH sarva sattva citta caritAni pariSoDayamAnAH boDisattva caryAm carantaH na pariKid evam hi devate boDisattvAH ananta maDyAm boDisattva caryAm carantaH pariKinna cittAH evam carantaH laMkAra BUtAH Bavanti sa devakasya lokasya deva manuzya saMpatti saMjanana tayA mAtA pitR BUtAH Bavanti boDisattva utpAda pratizWApana tayA DAtrI BUtAH Bavanti boDisattva mArga avataraNa tayA nitya anubadDa sahaja devatAH Bavanti durgati prapAta BayA rakzaNa tayA mahA dASa BUtAH Bavanti saMsAra samudra uttAraNa tayA SaraNa BUtAH Bavanti sarva mAra kleSa Baya vinivartana tayA parAyaNa BUtAH Bavanti anta param a SIti BAva upanayana tayA tIrTa BUtAH Bavanti sarva budDa samudra avataraNayA saMgrAhaka BUtAH Bavanti Darma ratna dvIpa upanayana tayA puzpa BUtAH Bavanti sarva budDa guNa saMpuzpita citta tayA alaMkAra BUtAH Bavanti vipula puNya jQAna praBA pramuQcana tayA parama prIti karAH Bavanti samanta prAsa Adika tayA aBigamanIyAH Bavanti anavadya karma pratipattyA samantaBadrAH Bavanti sarva AkAra vara aFga su paripUrNa kAyatayA asecanaka rUpAH Bavanti apratikUla darSana tayA avaBAsa karAH Bavanti jQAna raSmi pramuQcana tayA Aloka karAH Bavanti Darma pradIpa DAraNa tayA pradyota karAH Bavanti boDyA Saya pariSoDana tayA senApati BUtAH Bavanti mAra karma vinivartana tayA sUrya BUtAH Bavanti prajQA raSmi jAla praBA pramuQcana tayA candra BUtAH Bavanti gagana budDi candra udAgamanatayA meGa BUtAH Bavanti sarva jagat mahA Darma meGa aBipravarzaNa tayA evam Kalu devate pratipadyamAnAH boDisattvAH priyAH Bavanti sarva sattvAnAm aTa Kalu aSoka SrIH boDisattva saMgIti prAsAda devatA sArDam tEH daSaBiH gRha devatA sahasrEH suDanam SrezWi dArakam divya samatikrAntEH manaH mayEH puzpa mAlya ganDa cUrNa vilepana ratna ABaraNa varzEH pravRzya anuparivArya boDisattva Bavanam praviSantamABiH gATABiH aByazwAvIt gv utpadyante jinAH loke kadAci jQAna BAskarAH saMboDO cittam utpAdya sarva sattva anukampayA bahuBiH kalpana yutEH durlaBam tat ca darSanam avidyA anDasya lokasya jQAna sUryaH mahAnasi dRzwvA lokam viparyastam ajQAna timira AvRtam mahA kRpAm saMjanayya prasTitaH si svayaMBu tAm viSudDena ASayena tvam budDa boDi arTam udyataH kalyANa mitram Bajase napekzaH kAya jIvite na niSrayaH te loke smin na niketaH na saMstavaH anAlayaH sya saMkIrNaH niHsaFga gagana ASayaH boDi caryAm carasi agrAm puNya maNxala supraBaH udaya astamite loke jQAna raSmi pramuQcanaH lokAn na ca eva uccalasi loka DarmEH na lipyase asaFgaH carase loke mArutaH gagane yaTA kalpa uddAhe yaTA vahniH pradIptaH satata udyataH agni kalpena vIryeNa carase boDi cArikAm siMha kalpa mahA vIra dRXa vIrya parAkramaH jQAna vikrama saMpannaH tvam carasi aparAjitaH DarmaDAtu samudre smin ye kecid naya sAgarAH sat mitra sevayA SUra tvam tAn avatarizyase aTa Kalu aSoka SrIH boDisattva saMgIti prAsAda devatA su Danam SrezWi dArakamABiH gATABiH aBizwutya gacCantam pRzWatas samanubaDnAti sma aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH DarmaDAtu pratiBAsa praBa boDisattva saMgIti prAsAdam upasaMkramya anupraviSya samantAt anuvilokayAmAsaSAkya kanyAyAH darSana kAmaH saH paSyat gopAm SAkya kanyAm DarmaDAtu pratiBAsa praBasya boDisattva saMgIti prAsAdasya maDye sarva boDisattvasya gRha avasana pratiBAsa maNi padma garBAsana nizaNNAm strINAm caturaSItyA sahasrEH parivRtAm sarvAsAm pArTiva kula saMBavAnAm pUrva boDisattva caryA sa BAga kuSala mUlAnAm pUrva dAna saMgraha saMgRhItAnAm SlakzNa maDura vacana samudAcArANAm sarvajQa tA arTa aBimuKa suKa saMgRhItAnAm budDa boDisattva samudAgama samAna arTa tayA su saMgRhItAnAm mahA karuNA pUrvaMgama putra dAra parigraha su saMparigRhItAnAm mahA mEtrI upeta sva dAra anuvartana pariSoDitAnAm pUrva boDisattva acintya upAya kOSalya pariparipAcitAnAm sarvANi ca tAni caturaSIti strI sahasrANi avEvartikAni anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO boDisattva pAramitA anaya avatIrNAni sarva boDisattva SikzAsu apara praNeyAni sarva graha vigata citAni sarva saMsAra rati virata mAnasAni asaFga Darma DAtu naya pariSudDAni sarvajQa tA aBimuKa citta vegAni gv sarva nivaraNa AvaraNa jAla vigatAni sarva aFga paTa samatikrAntAni Darma kAya su nirmita vicArANi sarva loka paripAka vinaya aBimuKAni vipula puNya samudra saMBUta cittAni samantaBadra boDisattva caryA praNiDAna niryAtAni vipula boDisattva bala vega saMvarDitAni jQAna sUrya maNxala citta pradIpAni aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH yena gopA SAkya kanyA tena upasaMkramya gopAyAH SAkya kanyAyAH krama talayoH sarva SarIreNa praNipatya utTAya puratas prAQjaliH sTitvA evam Aha mayA Arye anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO cittam utpAditam na ca jAnAmi kaTam boDisattvAH saMsAre saMsaranti saMsAra dozEH ca na lipyante sarva Darma samatA svaBAvam ca avabuDyante SrAvaka pratyekabudDa BUmO na ca pratizWante budDa Darma avaBAsa pratilabDAH ca Bavanti boDisattva caryAm na ca vyavacCindanti boDisattva BUmO ca pratizWitAH Bavanti sarva taTAgata vizayam ca saMdarSayanti sarva loka gati samatikrAntAH ca Bavanti sarva loka gatizu ca upavicaranti Darma kAya parinizpannAH ca Bavanti ananta varNAn= ca rUpakAyAn aBinirharanti alakzaNa Darma kAya parAyaNAH ca Bavanti sarva jagat varNa saMsTAnAn= ca kAyAn AdarSayanti anaBilApyAn= ca sarva DarmAnavaranti sarva vAc paTa nirukti udAhArEH ca sattvAnAm Darmam deSayanti niHsattvAn= ca sarva DarmAn prajAnanti sattva DAtu vinaya prayogAt ca na vinivartante anutpAda aniroDAn= ca sarva DarmAn avataranti sarva taTAgata pUjA upasTAna prayogAt ca na vinivartante akarma vipAkAn= ca sarva DarmAn avataranti kuSala karma aBisaMskAra prayogAt ca na vinivartante evam ukte gopA SAkya kanyA su Danam SrezWi dArakam etat avocat  sADu sADu kula putra yaH tvam boDisattvAnAm imAm evaMrUpAm caryAm Darma tAm pariprazwavyAm manyase yaTA api tad samantaBadra praNiDAna caryA aBimuKasya ayam praSna udAhAraH tena hi kula putra SRNu sADu ca suzWu ca manasi kuru BAzizye budDa anuBAvena daSaBiH kula putra DarmEH samanvAgatAH boDisattvAH imAm evaMrUpAm indrajAla tala upamAm samanta jQAna praBAm boDisattva caryAm paripUrayan katamEH daSaBiH yat uta udAra kalyANa mitra saMniSrayeNa vipula aDi mukti pratilABena udAra kalyANa ASaya viSudDyA vipula puNya jQAna samudra upastabDa citta tayA budDa utpatti saMBava mahA Darma nirdeSa SravaNa pratilABena tri aDva taTA gata aDimukti cetanA saMvAsena sarva boDisattva caryA maNxala samatA anugamena sarva taTAgata aDizWAna pratilABena prakRti mahA karuNa aDyASaya viSudDyA sarva saMsAra cakra upacCeda citta bala ADAna pratilABena eBiH kula putra daSaBiH DarmEH samanvAgatAH imAm evaMrUpAm indrajAla tala upamAm samanta jQAna praBAm boDisattva caryAm paripUrayanti tatra kula putra avivartya vIryAH boDisattvAH etAn DarmAn pratilaBya akzaya AkAra aBinirhAreNa BAvayantaH bahulIkurvantaH kalyANa mitrANi katamEH daSaBiH yat uta kAya jIvita anapekza tayA saMsAra upakaraNa AnarTika tayA sarva Darma svaBAva samatA anugamena sarvajQa tA praNiDAna avivartyatayA sarva Darma DAtu naya vyavalokana tayA sarva Bava samudra uccalita mAnasatayA anAlaya Darma gagana pravizwa anAlayatayA sarva boDisattva praNiDAnAnAvaraNa tayA sarva kzetra sAgara prasaraNa tayA gv anAvaraNa boDisattva jQAna maNxala su paryavadApita tayA eBiH kula putra daSaBiH AkArEH boDisattvAH kalyANa mitrANi ArAgayitvA aBirADayanti aTa Kalu gopA SAkya kanyAH etam eva arTanayam saMdarSayamAnAH budDa aDizWAnena daSa diSaH vyavalokya tasyAm velAyAm imAH gATAH aBAzata ye prasTita amala viSAla DiyaH para arTAH sat mitra sevana parAH gata SAWya mAyAH

column1: sarva svara aFga ruta Goza nayEH jinAnAm ye Darma garjita SRNonta na yAni tRptim Darmam naya anugata prajQa praBa pradIpAH tezAm iyam jaga pradIpa karANa caryA ye te daSat diSi taTAgata aprameyAn sarvatra citta kzaNi otari anyam anyAn sarvAn= taTAgata samudra vicintayanti budDa ASayAn anugatAn amayam praveSaH paSyanti ye parizadaH vipulAH jinAnAm tezAm samADi naya sAgaram otaranti praNiDAna sAgara nayam ca ananta maDyam tezAm idam caritam indra tala upamAnAm gv ye DizWitAH daSasu dikzu jinEH aSezEH kalpAn= caranti anapara anta samantaBadrAH sarvatra kzetra prasare pratiBAsa prAptAH tezAm iyam cariya Darma praBaMkarANAm ye te mahA karuNa maNxala jQAna sUryAH dRzwvA jagat vyasana prAptam udenti DIrAH Darma aBayA jagati moha viDUya tezAm iyam cari divAkara sAdRSAnAm dRzwvA prajAm Bava gatO parivartamAnAm saMsAra srota praviloma sTitAH sumeDAH sadDarma cakram amitam samudAnayantaH caryA samantavara Badra matim caranti te tra Sikzita nayehi ananta maDyAn kAyAn yaTA ASaya jagati upadarSayitvA pratiBAsa bimba sadRSEH api tEH sva kAyEH paripAcayanti janatAm Bava sAgarezu mEtrI nayEH su vipulEH janatAm sParitvA nAnA aDimuktizu janezu carim vidarSya Darmam yaTA ASaya jagati aBivarzamANAH boDAya sattvana yutAn vinayanti DIrAH aTa Kalu gopA SAkya kanyA imAH gATA BAzitvA su Danam SrezWi dArakam etat avocat aham Kalu kula putra sarva boDisattva samADi sAgara naya vyavalokana vizayasya boDisattva vimokzasya lABinI suDanaH Aha  kaH etasya Arye sarva boDisattva samADi sAgara naya vyavalokana vizayasya boDisattva vimokzasya vizayaH Aha  etam aham kula putra boDisattva vimokzam samApannAH iha loka DAtO= ana BilApya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAn kalpAn avatarAmi tezu ye sattvAH sarva gati paryApannAH tAn prajAnAmi yAvanti ca tezAm sattvAnAm cyuti upapatti muKAni tAni prajAnAmi yAvanti aBinirvRtti muKAni yAvatyaH karma aBisaMskAra samApattayaH yAvatyaH karma vipAka vicitra tAH tAH api prajAnAmi kuSalam api ezAm karma samAdAnam prajAnAmi akuSalam api nEryANikam api anEryANikam api niyatam api aniyatam api miTyAtva niyatam api sa anuSayam api niranuSayam api kuSala mUla saMpannam api kuSala mUla vipannam api kuSala mUla parigRhItam api gv akuSala mUla parigRhItam api kuSala akuSala parigRhItam api samudAnIta kuSala mUlam api asamudAnIta pApa Darmam api ezAm karma samAdAnam praj tezu ca anaBilApya budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samezu kalpezu ye budDAH Bagavantam utpannAH tezAm nAma samudrAn avatarAmi tezAm ca budDAnAm BagavatAm praTama citta utpAda samudrAn api prajAnAmi sarvajQa tA prasTAn anaya samudrAn api prajAnAmi sarva praNiDi sAgara aBinirhArAn api prajAnAmi pUrva budDa utpAda prasTAna samudrAn api prajAnAmi pUrva budDa pUjA upasTAna prayoga samudrAn api prajAnAmi pUrva boDisattva caryA paripUri samudrAn api prajAnAmi niryANa vyUha samudrAn api prajAnAmi tezAm ca budDAnAm BagavatAm sattva paripAka vinaya samudrAn api prajAnAmi aBisaMboDi samudrAn api prajAnAmi Darma cakra pravartana vRzaBitA vikurvitAni api prajAnAmi sarva budDa vikurvita samudrAn api prajAnAmi tezAm ca budDAnAm BagavatAm parzad maNxala viBaktIH api prajAnAmi tezu ca parzad maNxalezu ye SrAvakAH tezAm niryANa nayam api prajAnAmi pUrva kuSala mUlAni api prajAnAmi mArga BAvanA nAnAtvam api prajAnAmi jQAna pratilABa saMpad viSudDa praBedam api prajAnAmi ye ca tEH taTAgatEH sattvAH pratyeka boDO pratizWApitAH tAn api prajAnAmi yAni ca tezAm pratyekabudDAnAm pUrva kuSala mUlAni tAni api prajAnAmi ye ca tezAm pratyekabudDAnAm pratyeka boDi aDigamAH tAn api prajAnAmi yAni ca tezAm pratyekabudDAnAm SAnta vihAra vikurvita vimokza muKAni tAni api prajAnAmi yAni ca tezAm pratyekabudDAnAm viviDa vikurvitAni tAni api prajAnAmi yaH ca tezAm pratyekabudDAnAm sattva paripAkaH tam api prajAnAmi yA ca tezAm pratyekabudDAnAm Darma deSanA tAm api prajAnAmi yAni ca tezAm pratyekabudDAnAm ananta samADi vihAra viviDa vimokza krIxitAni tAni api prajAnAmi yat ca tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm parinirvANam tat api prajAnAmi ye ca budDAnAm BagavatAm boDisattva parzad maNxala samudrAH tAn api prajAnAmi tezAm ca boDisattvAnAm praTama kuSala mUla avaropaNAni api prajAnAmi praTama citta utpAda praNiDAnAni api prajAnAmi praNiDAna vimAtra tAm api sarva boDisattva caryA niryANa vyUha aBinirhAra vimAtra tAm api prajAnAmi pAramitA mArga aFga saMBAra viSudDi vimAtra tAm api prajAnAmi boDisattva mArga pratipatti vyUha vimAtra tAm api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi AkramaNa saMBAra vimAtra tAm api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi AkramaNa vega vimAtra tAm api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi saMkrama samADi maNxala vimAtra tAm api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi AkramaNa vikurvitAni api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi AkramaNa vihArAn api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi pratizWAnAni api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi BAvanA vicArAn api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi pariSoDananayAn api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi saMvAsAn api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi nimittAni api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi vaSitAm api prajAnAmi boDisattva BUmi AkramaNa jQAnam api prajAnAmi boDisattva saMgraha jQAnam api prajAnAmi boDisattva paripAka jQAnam api prajAnAmi boDisattva vyavasTAna saMvAsam api prajAnAmi boDisattva caryA maNxala vistArAn api prajAnAmi boDisattva caryA vikurvitAni api gv  prajAnAmi boDisattva samADi sAgarAn api prajAnAmi boDisattva vimokza naya samudrAn api prajAnAmi tezAm ca boDisattvAnAm praticitta kzaNam nAnA samADi samudra pratilABAn api prajAnAmi sarvajQa tA avaBAsana pratilABAn api prajAnAmi sarvajQa tA vidyut Aloka meGAn api prajAnAmi boDisattva kzAnti pratilABanayAn api prajAnAmi sarvajQa tA avagAhana vikramAn api prajAnAmi tezAm boDisattvAnAm kzetra samudra anugamAn api prajAnAmi Darma samudra nayA avatArAn api prajAnAmi sarva samudra lakzaNa nAnA tvam api prajAnAmi sarva boDisattva vihAra naya vikurvitAni api prajAnAmi nAnA praNiDAna naya samudrAn api prajAnAmi viviDa vikurvita samudra vimAtra tAm api prajAnAmi yaTA ca aham kula putra asyAm lokaDAtO atIta vartamAnAn kalpa samudrAn nAnAviDAnavata rAmi evam apara anta paraMpara avyavacCinnA anana AgatAn kalpa samudrAn prajAnAmi yaTA ca sahAyAm lokaDAtO prajAnAmi taTA saha Aloka DAtu samavasaraNAsu sarva loka DAtu paraMparAsu prajAnAmi yaTA ca saha Aloka DAtu samavasaraNAsu sarva loka DAtu paraMparAsu prajAnAmi evam saha Aloka DAtu paramANu rajaH ntarga tAsu api sarva loka DAtu paraMparAsu prajAnAmi yaTA ca saha Aloka DAtu paramANu rajaH ntarga tAsu sarva loka DAtu paraMparAsu prajAnAmi evam saha Aloka DAtu daSa diS Anantarya sTitAsu api lokaDAtuzu prajAnAmi yaTA ca saha Aloka DAtu daSa diS Anantarya sTitAsu sarva loka DAtuzu prajAnAmi evam saha Aloka DAtu daSa diS Anantarya paraMpara AsTitAsu api sarva loka DAtuzu prajAnAmi yaTA ca saha Aloka DAtu daSa diS Anantarya paraMpara AsTitAsu sarva loka DAtuzu prajAnAmi evam samantadiS praBAsa vErocana loka DAtu vaMSa paryApannAsu api sarva loka DAtuzu prajAnAmi yaTA samantadiS praBAsa vErocana loka DAtu vaMSa paryApannAsu api lokaDAtuzu prajAnAmi evam samantadiS praBAsa vErocana loka DAtu vaMSa diS a anantarya paraMpara AsTitAsu sarva loka DAtuzu prajAnAmi yaTA ca asya samantadiS praBAsa vErocanasya lokaDAtu vaMSasya daSa diS Anantarya paraMpara avasTitAsu sarva loka DAtuzu prajAnAmi evam iha sarvAvati kusuma tala garBa vyUha alaMkArezu lokaDAtu sumeruzu loka DAtu samudra antargatezu lokaDAtu prasarezu prajAnAmi evam lokaDAtu nayezu lokaDAtu cakrezu lokaDAtu maNxalezu loka DAtu viBAgezu kusuma tala garBa vyUha alaMkAre loka DAtu samudre prajAnAmi evam daSasu dikzu ananta paryantezu DarmaDAtu paramezu AkASa DAtu paryavasAnezu sarva loka DAtu samudrezu vErocanasya pUrva praNiDAna sAprajAnAmi avatarAmi anusmarAmi pUrva yoga samudrAn api avatarAmi pUrva samudra Agamana sAgarAn api avatarAmi ananta maDya kalpa boDisattva caryA saMvAsam api avatarAmi kzetra pariSudDinayAn api avatarAmi sattva paripAka upAyanayAn api avatarAmi pUrva taTA gata ArAgaNa upasaMkramaNa vikurvitAn api avatarAmi pUrva taTAgata pUjA upasTAna prayoganayAn api avatarAmi pUrva taTAgata Darma deSanA saMpratIcCananayAn api avatarAmi gv  pUrva boDisattva samADi pratilABanayAn api avatarAmi parizkAra vaSitA pratilABanayAn api avatarAmi pUrva taTAgata guNa samudra pratipattinayAn api avatarAmi dAna pAramitA Anaya samudrAn api avatarAmi boDisattva SIla vrata maNxala pariSudDi aBinirharaNanayAn api avatarAmi boDisattva kzAnti pratilABanayAn api avatarAmi boDisattva vIrya vega samudrAn api avatarAmi sarva DyAna aFga parinizpatti naya sAgarAn api avatarAmi prajQA maNxala pariSudDi naya samudrAn api avatarAmi sarva loka upapatti kAya pratiBAsa saMdarSana upAyanayA an api avatarAmi samantaBadra caryA praNiDAna maNxala pariSudDinayAn api avatarAmi sarva kzetra sAgara sParaNa tAm api avatarAmi sarva kzetra pariSudDi naya samudrAn api avatarAmi sarva taTAgata jQAna avaBAsa samudrAn api avatarAmi sarva budDa boDyA kramaNa vikurvita sAgarAn api avatarAmi sarva taTAgata jQAna avaBAsa pratilABanayAn api avatarAmi sarva jQAta aDigama avatAra naya samudrAn api avatarAmi aBisaMboDi vikurvita samudrAn api avatarAmi Darma cakra pravartana vRzaBitA vikrIxita naya samudrAn api avatarAmi nAnA parzad maNxala samudrAn api avatarAmi tezu ca sarva parzad maNxalezu sarva boDisattvAnAm pUrva kuSala samudrAn api avatarAmi praTama praNiDAna naya samudrAn api avatarAmi sattva paripAka vinaya upAyanaya samudrAn api avatarAmi ye ca BagavatA purvam boDisattva caryAm caratA sattva samudrAH paripAcitAH tAn api avatarAmi tezAm ca boDisattvAnAm praticitta kzaNam kuSala mUla vivarDana upAyanaya samudrAn api avatarAmi samADi pratilABa naya samudrAn api avatarAmi DAraNI muKa samudra pratilABa naya sAgarAn api avatarAmi pratiBAna jQAna maNxala viSudDi naya samudrAn api avatarAmi sarva boDisattva BUmi AkramaNa vikurvitanaya samudrAn api avatarAmi caryA jAla aBinirhAra naya samudrAn api avatarAmi anupUrva samudrAn api avatarAmi anupUrva samudAgama diS praveSa jQAna naya samudrAn api avatarAmi tezAm ca sarva indriya bala boDi aFga DyAna vimokza samADi samApatti vikurvita samudrAn api avatarAmi yaTA ca BagavataH vErocanasya sarvasmin DarmaDAtO boDisattva carita samudrAn api avatarAmi prajAnAmi aBinirharAmi evam sarva taTAgatAnAm daSasu dikzu DarmaDAtu paramezu AkASa DAtu paryavasAnezu sarva loka DAtu samudrezu asaMBinna sarva boDisattva caritaprajAnAmi aBinirharAmi evam sarva taTAgatAnAm daSasu dikzu DarmaDAtu paramezu AkASa DAtu paryavasAnezu sarva loka DAtu samudrezu asaMBinna sarva boDisattva carita praveSam ananta mAyA jAla praveSam ananta Darma DAtu sParaNam ananta muKa nirdeSam apar prajAnAmi aBinirharAmi tat kasya heto eza hi kula putra asya sarva boDisattva sama aDi naya sAgara vyavalokana vizayasya boDisattva vimokzasya vizayaH yat etam samApannA sarva sattva citta cari tanayAn prajAnAmi sarva sattva kuSala saMcayAn prajAnAmi sarva sattva saMkleSa vyavadAn a nayAn prajAnAmi sarva sattva karma nAnAtvam prajAnAmi sarva SrAvaka samADi dvArANi prajAnAmi sarva SrAvaka samADi BUmim prajAnAmi sarva pratyekabudDa SAnta vimokza vikurvitam avatarAmi sarva boDisattva samADi samudra nayAn prajAnAmi sarva boDisattva vimokza naya sAgara avatAram prajAnAmi sarva taTAgata vimokza naya sAgara avatAram api prajAnAmi gv aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH gopAm SAkya kanyAm etat avocat  kiyat cirapratilabDaH tvayA ayam Arye boDisattva samADi naya sAgara vyavaloke Aha  BUta pUrvam kula putra atIte Dvani budDa kzetra Sata paramANu rajaH samAnAm kalpAnAm pareNa aBayaMkarA nAma lokaDAtuH aBUt tasyAm Kalu lokaDAtO gatipravaraH nAma kalpaH BUt tasyAH Kalu punar lokaDAtoH maDye kzemAvatI nAma cAturdvIpikA aBUt tasyAm Kalu cAturdvIpikAyAm maDye jambudvIpasya drumameruSrIH nAma rAjaDAnI a BUt catura SIteH nagara kowI sahasrANAm pramuKA sA Kalu punar druma meruSrI rAjaDAnI tAni caturaSIti nagara kowI sahasrANi pratyekam nIla vExUrya BUmi BAga saMsTApitAni sapta ratna maya prAkAra parikziptAni vicitra varNa praBA jAla SuBa ganDa Sakawa cakra pramANa utpala padma kumuda puNxarIka saMCanna kanakavAlikA ratna maya sapta vedikA jAla sapta tAla paFkti parivRtAni sapta ratna maya vRkza mAlA parikziptAni upari meGa jAla saMCAditAni ratna azwApada su viBakta vicitra ratna Bakti virAjita BUmi BAgAni sidDa gaNa vicaritAni aBijAta pakzi saMGa manojQa ruta ravita nirGoza nikUjitAni udyAna kowI Sata sahasra upaSoBitAni RdDi sPItAni pramudita nara nArI gaNa Sata sahasra AkIrNAni SuBa aBilazaNIya mAruta Irita anuparata puzpa vRzwi sahasra aBipravRzwAni pArTiva indra Sata sahasra aDyuzitAni tezAm Kalu punar mahA nagarANAm sarva ratna vRkza hema jAla alaMkAra AdiByaH vAta saMGawwiteByaH bahu tUrya nirGoza sa maruta niScariteByaH yam evaAnanda SabdaH niScarati sma  snAta pibata KAdata Darmam carata boDi cittam utpAdayata avinivartanIya BUmi vaSitAm aDigacCata Badram astu vaH  iti tasyAm Kalu druma meru SriyAm rAjaDAnyAm DanapatiH nAma rAjA aBUt maNxalikaH tasya caturaSIti strI sahasrANi antaHpuram aBUt paQca ca amAtya SatAni aBUvan rAjQaH Kalu punar DanapateH paQca putra SatAni aBUvan sarvezAm SUrANAm vIrANAm varAFga rUpiNAm para sEnya pramardakAnAm prAsAdikAnAm darSanIyAnAm parama SuBa varNa puzkala tayA samanvAgatAnAm rAjQaH Kalu punar Dana pateH padmaSrIgarBasaMBavAH nAma agra mahizI aBUt tezAm caturaSIteH strI sahasrANAm pramuKA tasyAm tejoDipatiH nAma putraH BUt aBirUpaH prAsAdikaH darSanIyaH dvAtriMSat mahApuruza lakzaNa samalaMkRta kAyaH tasya imAni dvAtriMSat mahApuruza lakzaNAni aBUvan

column1: yat uta  su pratizWita pANi pAdaH tejoDipati rAja kumAraH BUt samam mahA pRTivyAm pAda talO= utkzipati samam nikzipati nikzipan= ca sarvAvat pAda talAByAm samam mahA pRTivIm saMspRSati pAda talayoH ca asya cakrANi jAtAni sahasrArANi sanABIni sanemikAni sarva AkAra paripUrNAni surucirANi darSanIyAni ucCaFKa pAda tA ca asya aBinirvRttA aBUt su vyakta parama upaSoBitA upari pAda= Ca vi kusuma garBa atireka praBAsvarA uBe ca asya hasta pAda tale jAlinI aBUtAm vicitra su viBaktAt CidrA parisrAviNI tat yaTA DRtarAzwrasya haMsarAjasya Ayata pAda pArzNitA asya aBinirvRttA aBUt pariSudDA praBAsvarA sarva ratna varNa avaBAsa pramuktA dIrGAH asya aFgulayaH BUvan vRttAH samAyata saMDayaH sa tAH samam pRTivyAm pratizWApayAmAsa samudDarati sma mRdUni ca asya gv hasta pAda talAni aBUvan kAcilindikA atireka suKa saMsparSAni sa tEryAn spRSati striyam vA puruzam vA dArakam vA dArikAm vA sarve te prIti manasaH BUvan parama suKa sOmanasya samarpitAH eNeyajaFGa tA ca asya aBinirvRttA aBUt tasya jaFGe anupurvasam udgate aBUtAm racite vRtte sujAte eNeyasya iva mRgarajQaH na enam kaScid samarTaH nu javitu m ana prAptum vA na ca vrajan klamam Apadyate sma sapta utsadaH Kalu punar sa tejoDipati rAja kumAraH BUt tasya dvayoH pAdayoH dvO= utsadO jAtO= aBUtAm vRttO sujAtO su paripUrNO= adRSya saMDI sura citO darSanIyO dvO hastayoH dvA= aMsa kUwayoH pRzWatas grIvAyAm ekaH koSa gata basti guhyatA ca asya mahApuruza lakzaNam aBinirvRttam aBUt su guptam asya koSa basti guhyam aBUt nimagnam saMCAditam tat yaTA hasti AjAneyasya vA aSva ajAneyasya vA na asya kaScid strI vA puruzaH vA dArakaH vA dArikA vA vRdDaH vA maDyaH vA daharaH vA guruH vA guru sTAnIyaH vA nirvasanasya api apaSyat anyatnEmittikena vA kAma upacitena siMha pUrva arDa kAyaH Kalu punar sa tejoDipati rAja kumAraH BUt anupUrva udgata SarIraH upavistIrNa vRta uraskaH BijAta mRgarAja atireka su saMsTita samucCrayaH citA antara aMsaH Kalu punar aBavat su upacita SarIraH suviBakta samucCrayaH sarva kAya sama BAga pratizWitaH anUna gAtraH anunnata gAtraH pariNata gAtraH maNi saMvRtta skanDaH Kalu punar aBavat vRttO= asya skanDO= aBUtAm pInO SuBO su paripuzwO pralamba bAhutA mahApuruza lakzaNa pratilabDaH sa Kalu punar aBavat saH nava na manena uBAByAm pANiByAm jAnu maNxale parimArjati parAmRSati sama BAga sTitena SarIreNa vRha dRju gAtra mahApuruza lakzaNa pratilabDaH sa Kalu punar aBavat sarva avara upeta paramANu sama gAtraH praSama gAtraH guru gAtraH prasanna g kambu grIvatA mahApuruza lakzaNa pratilabDaH sa Kalu punar aBavat adIna kaNWaH ca tasya yAvatyaH grIvA sAmantakena muKa sAmantakena ca rasa haraNyaH tAH sarvAH samAH aBUvan samantAH su paripUrNAH siMha hanutAmahApuruza lakzaNa pratilabDaH sa Kalu punar aBavat su nizpIxita hanuH su paripUrNa muKa maNxalaH sujAta pariSudDa muKa maNxalaH su a Ayata muKa dvAraH pavi varaH samacatvAriMSat danta tA mahApuruza lakzaNa pratilabDaH sa Kalu punar aBUt anUna daSanaH tasya kiMcid Bakta pariBogezu eka vAram api muKa Baktam parivartamAnam asaMBinnam aByavahAram agamat antaSas ekodana binduH api aviralA vizamadanta tA mahApuruza lakzaNa pratilabDaH sa Kalu punar aBavat aviralAH avizamAH asya dantAH aBUvan acCidra saMDayaH samAm suviBaktAH yEH asya AhAram pariBuQjAnasya na aBUt saFgaH vA parisaFga uparuD vaFgaH vA upakledaH vE aBizyandaH vA paryavanAhaH vA ati sarjanam vA sama danta tA mahApuruza lakzaNa pratilabDaH Kalu punar aBavat samadantaH nonadantaH na aDika dantaH na unnata dantaH na saMnata dantaH na saMBinna dantaH samantamaDyadantaH nutsanna dantaH avinirBinna dantaH su Sukla daMzwraH ca kumAraH BUt nirupakleSa dazwraH su prasanna daMzwraH su pariSudDa daMzwraH su saMsTita vicitra daMzwraH su praBUta jihvatA mahApuruza lakzaNa pratilabDaH Kalu punar aBavat gv  praBUtA ca asya jihvA aBUt tanvI mRdvI sukumArA karmaNyA kamanIyA laGu parivartinI muKa maNxala saMCAdanI taTya paTyA arTa vyaQjana p brahma svaraH ca sa kumAraH BUt aBi rucira svaraH sarva tUrya nirnAda gIta vAdya Goza manojQaruta ravita AlApa saMlApa vAc karma pravyAhAraH vAc paTABiH ati saMjananIm sarva loka aBinandinIm vAcam udIrayati sma brahma atirekeNa svareNa ca parzad maNxalam atikrAmati sarvam ca anuravati aBinIla samantaBadra boDisattva caryA praNiDAna paripUryAm BagavatA pratizWApitAH asmin= eva parzad maNxale saMnizaNNA sarva loka DAtu pratiBAsa prAptena kAyena sarva boDisattva samADi vihAra saMBinnena cittena sarva taTAgataH saMmuKa BAva vadana vijQaptena cakzuzA sarva taTAgata gagana svara aFga meGa cakra nigarjita nirGoza vijQaptena SrotreNa sarva Darma vihAra vaSavartinA ASvAsa praSvAsena sarva budDa kzetra anucalitena nirGozeNa sarva taTAgata parzan maNxala upasaMkramaNa apratiprasrabDena boDisattva kAyena boDisattva yaTa ASaya aBimuKena paripAka vinaya anukUlena Atma BAva aBinirhAreNa aSeza sarva diS jAla prasRtena nAnAgata sarva kalpa avyavacCinnena samantaBadra boDisattva caryA praNiDAna paripUri samudAgamena samanvAgatAH BagavataH parzad maNxale saMnizaNNAH sa Kalu kula putra sUrya gAtra pravaraH taTAgataH tejoDipatinA cakravartinA ca mayA ca yAvajjIvam upasTitaH BUt cIvara piNxapAta SayanAH tasya Kalu punar kula putra sUrya gAtra pravarasya taTAgatasya parinirvRtasya anantaram tasyAm eva lokaDAtO prasanna gAtraH nAma taTAgaudapAdi saH pyasmABiH ArAgitaH satkRtaH gurukRtaH mAnitaH pUjitaH tasya anantaram sarvagAtra jQAnapratiBAsacandraH nAma taTAgataH loke udapAdi pUjitAni cIvara piNxapAta Sayana Asana glAna pratyaya BEzajya parizkArEH tezAm Kalu kula putra zazweH budDa kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANAm sarva paScimaH vipula Darma aDimuktisaMBava tejaH nAma taTAgataH utpannaH BUt tasya BagavataH nagare pravizwasya mayA rAja BAryA BUtayA sArDam svAminA sarva AkAra pUjA muKam prayuktayA taTAgata pUjayA pUjAm kRtvA sarva taTAgata utpatti saMBava pradIpaH nAma taTAgata Darma paryAyaH tasya BagavataH ntikAt SrutaH yasya saha SravaNAt mayA jQAnacakzuH pratilabDam eza ca sarva boDisattva sama aDi naya sAgara vyavalokana vizayaH boDisattva vimokzaH pratilabDaH sA Kalu aham kula putraH etam vimokzam BAvayamAnAH budDa kzetra Sata paramANu rajaH samAn kalpAn AgatAn boDisattvena sArDam boDisattva car tezu ca me budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samezu kalpezu ananta maDyAH taTAgatAH ArAgitAH kvacid kalpe kalpa sTaH pi ekataTAgataH ArAgitaH kvacid kalpe dvO taTAgatO= ArAgitO kvacid kalpe yAvat anaBilApyAH taTAgatAH ArAgitAH kvacid kalpe budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samAH taTAgatAH ArAgitAH na ca me jAtu boDisattvasya kAyaH jQAtaH  kiMpramANaH kIdRS saMsTAnaH kIdRS varNaH na kAya karma jQAtam na vAkkarma na manaskarma jQAtam na jQAna darSanam na jQAna gocaram na jQAna samADi vizayaH jQAtaH ye Kalu punar kula putra sattvAH boDisattvam boDisattva cArikAm carantam dRzwvA boDisattvasya antike nunaya cittam utpAdayAmAsuH nAnA saMketEH nAnA saMvAsEH ca prasAdam janayAmAsuH sarve te boDisattvena lOkika loka uttarEH viviDEH upAyEH saMgRhItAH boDisattvasya parivArAH Bavanti sma te boDisattvasya boDisattva caryAm carataH parivAra saMvAse na avEvartikAH Bavanti sma anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO sA aham kula putra vipula Darma aDimukti saMBavatejaH taTAgatasya saha darSanAt imam sarva boDisattva samADi sAgara vyavalokana vizayam boDisattva vimokzam pratilaBya boDisattvena sArDam budDa kzetra Sata paramANu rajaH samAn kalpAn AgatAH etam vimokzam saMBAvayamAnA ye ca tezu budDa kzetra paramANu rajaH samezu kalpezu taTAgatAH utpannAH sarve te mayA taTAgatAH ArAgitAH pUjitAH upasTitAH sarvezAm ca me tezAm taTAgatAnAm Darma deSanA SrutA SrutvA udgRhItA saMDAritA sarvezAm ca mayA tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm antikAt eza vimokzaH pratilabDaH nAnA anayEH vA nAnA sUtra antanaya nirGozEH nAnA vimokza SarIrEH nAnA vimokza dvArEH nAnA vimokza vicArEH nAnA Dvaja praveSEH nAnA budDa kzetra sAgara avatArEH nAnA budDa darSana samudra vijQaptiBiH nAnA taTA gata parzad maNxala avatArEH nAnA boDisattva praNiDAna sAgara naya paTEH nAnA boDisattva caryA prasarEH nAnA boDisattva caryA aBinirhArEH nAnA boDisattva prasarEH na ca boDisattvasya samantaBadra vimokza nayam avatarAmi tat kasya hetoH AkASa tala praveSa apramANAH hi kula putra samantaBadrANAm boDisattvAnAm vimokza nayAH sarva sattva saMjQA gata tala apramANAH tri aDva parivagv diS samudra tala apramANAH DarmaDAtu naya sAgara tala apramANAH taTAgata vizaya sama SarIrAH hi kula putra samantaBadrANAm boDisattvAnAm vimokza nayAH sA aham kula putra budDa kzetra parma aNu rajaH samAn kalpAn boDisattva SarIram prekzamANAH atRptA eva darSanena tat yaTA api nAma kula putraH ekAnta rAga caritayoH strI puruzayoH anyonya samAgame saMketa kRtayoH apramANA ayoni SomanasikAra praBavAH SuBa saMjQA vitarka saMmoha saMBavAH citta utpAdAH utpadyante evam eva kula putra mama boDisattvasya SarIram prekzamANAyAH ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt ananta maDya apramANa nirdeSA lokaDAtu vaMSa prasarA nAnA pratizWAnA nAnA saMDi vyUhA nAnA saMsTAnA nAnA parvata vyUhA nAnA pRTivI tala vyUha nirdeSAH nAnA gagana meGa saMCanna alaMkArA nAnA kalpa nAma saMKyA nirdeSA nAnA budDa utpAda taTA gata vaMSa praBavA nAnA boDimaNxa alaMkArA nAnA taTA gata Darma cakra pravartana vikurvitA nAnA taTA gata parzad maNxala vyUhA nAnA sUtra antanaya nirdeSa nirGozA nAnA yAn anaya nirhAra praBavA nAnA pariSudDa praBA loka avaBAsAH adRzwa pUrva nimittAH praticitta kzaNam cakzuze ABAsam AgacCanti ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt ananta maDyAH budDa samudrAH cakzuze ABAsam AgacCanti nAnA boDimaNxa alaMkArAH nAnA Darma cakra pravartana vikurvitAH nAnA sUtra anta nirGoza vikurvitAH apratisrabDa yogena praticitta kzaNam cakzuz ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt ananta maDyAH sattva samudrA nAnA Bavana ArAma parvata vimAna nadI samudra nilayA nAnA rUpa kAyAH nAnA pariBoga vizayAH nAnA AcAra yoga cAra prayogAH nAnA indriya parinizpatti saMsTAnAH praticitta kzaNam cakzuze ABAsam AgacCanti ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt anantam aDyAstri aDva sAgara praveSanayAH avaBAsam AgacCanti ananta maDyAH boDisattva praNiDAna samudrAH viSuDyante ananta maDyAH boDisattva BUmi caryA vimAtra tA samudrAH ABAsam AgacCanti ananta maDyAH boDisattva pAramitA naya sAgara pariSudDayaH vaBAsam AgacCanti ananta maDyAH boDisattva pUrva yoga samudrAH ABAsam AgacCanti ananta maDyAH budDa kzetra pariSoDana naya samudrAH ABAsam AgacCanti ananta maDyAH boDisattva mahA mEtrI naya samudrAH sarva sattva mahA mEtrI naya samudrAH sarva sattva paripAka vinaya parAkrama prayoga sAgarAH av ananta maDyAH boDisattva mahA karuNA meGa naya sAgarAH saMBavanti ananta maDyAH boDisattva mahA prIti vega sAgarAH vivarDante praticitta kzaNam ananta maDyAH sarva sattva saMgraha prayoga sAgarAH nizpadyante sA aham kula putra tezu budDa kzetra Sata paramANu rajaH samezu kalpezu boDisattvasya ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt praticitta kzaNam ananta maDyAn Darma naya sAgara anavataramANA paryantam na aDigacCAmi na ca avatIrNa pUrvam avatarAmi na pratilabDa pUrvam pratilaBe yAvat antaHpura maDya gatasya api aham kula putra sarva arTa sidDasya strI gaNa parivRtasya nAnA vimokza nayasA ekEkasmAt roma vivarAt ananta maDyAn= tri aDvanaya sAgarAn avatArAmi DarmaDAtu avatAra naya samudra avatAreNa etam aham kula putra sarva boDisattva samADi sAgara vyavalokana vizayam boDisattva vimokzam prajAnAmi samApadye kim mayA Sakyam boDisattvAnAm ananta maDya upAyanaya sAgara prasRtAnAm sarva sattva sama sadRSa saMsTAna saMsTita kAya vijQapti saMdarSakAnAmgv ananta maDya varNa nirmita meGa samudra sarva roma muKa pramuQcakAnAm sarva SarIra DarmatA svaBAva prakRti pariSudDAnAm AkASa lakzaNa jagat prakR sarvatra anugata budDi viniScaya taTAgata sama vikurvita paramANAm ananta maDya vimokza vizaya vikurvita niryAtAnAm vipula Darma DAtu citta utpAda praveSa vihAra vaSavartinAm samanta muKa sarva Darma BUmi vimokza sAgara vikrIxitAnAm caryAm jQAtum guNAn vA vaktum niKilAn vA guNa niDIn saMdarSayitum gacCa kula putra iha eva BagavataH vErocanasya pAda mUle viviDa ratna vyUha mahA maNi rAja padma garBAsana nizaNNA boDisattva janetrI mAyA nAma devI tAm upasaMkramya paripRcCa  kaTam boDisattvAH boDisattva caryAm carantaH nupaliptAH Bavanti sarva loka Darma malEH apratiprasrabDAH Bavanti taTAgata pUjA prayogezu avEvartikAH Bavanti sarva boDisattva karmAnteByaH sarva AvaraNa vigatAH Bavanti boDisattva vimokza avatArezu apara pratyayAH Bavanti sarva boDisattva vihArezu saMmuKIBAva gatAH Bavanti sarva taTAgatAnAm na vivartante sarva sattva saMgraha prayogeByaH na nivartante parAnta kowI gata kalpa sarva boDisattva caryA saMvAseByaH na pratyudAvartante mahAyAna praNiDAnAt na saMsIdanti jagat kuSala mUla saMDAraNa vivarDana tayA aTa Kalu gopA SAkya kanyA etam eva vimokza muKa nayam saMdarSayantI budDa aDizWAnena tasyAm velAyAm imAH gATAH aBAzata saMboDi caryA caraNa prayuktam paSyanti sattvAH Kalu ye grasat tvam prasanna cittAH pratiGAtinaH vA vrajanti te saMgraham asya sarve yAvanti hi kzetra Sate rajAMsi smarAmi kalpAn iha tAvataH ham

column1: meru praBA BUt vara lokaDAtuH tatas param vyUha sanAmni kalpe zaxviMSatiH kowi ayutAni tasmin sahasra saMKyA hi aBavat munInAm tezAm aBUt yaH caramaH muni indraH Darma DvajaH nAma jagat pradIpaH SrI tejanAmA nRpatiH tadAnIm tasmin muni indre parinirvRte Ta jambuDvaje smin= ihata ari cakraH saH vyAhata ajQaH parameSvaraH BUt gv SUrANi vIrANi aTa rUpavanti paQca aBavan putra SatAni tasya sarva aFga saMpUrNa viSudDa kAyAni anuttama SrI pratimaNxitAni rAjA sa putraH sugate prasannaH pUjAm akArzIt vipulAm jinasya nityam ca sat Darma parigrahaH sO Darma aBiyuktaH Bavat aprakampyaH

column1: suraSmi nAmA ca nRpasya tasya viSudDa sattvaH yamaBUt kumAraH sudarSanIyaH ca manojQa rUpaH triMSat vara alaMkRta lakzaNa aFgaH rAjyam parityajya nRNAm sa paQcakowI vRtaH pravrajitaH tadAnIm sa pravrajitvA dRXa vIrya yuktaH saMDArayAmAsa jinasya Darmam drumAvatI nAma purI vRtA aBUt kowI sahasrEH nagara uttamAnAm AsIt vanam tatra vicitra SAKam praSAnta nirGozam anuttara Sriyam yatas suraSmiH vijahAra tasmin viSAradaH DI pratiBAna SudDaH sa dyotayAmAsa jinasya Darmam saMklizwa sattva oGa viSoDanAya piNxAya DImAn sa puram viveSa prAsAdi keryA paTa SAnta vezaH anutkzipta cakzuH smRtimAn prajAnan gamBIra cezwaH sTira DIra gAmI nandIDvajaH BUt pravaraH purANAm SrezWI tadAnIm su viGuzwa kIrtiH tasya aham Asam duhitA manApA BAnupraBA nAma su cAru rUpA gv dvAre Ta tasya uttara mandirasya dRzwaH mayA aBUt sa gaNaH suraSmiH prAsAdikaH lakzaNa citrita aFgaH tatra aBavat me su mahAn prasAdaH yadA gRha dvAra gataH mama aBUt pAtre pradattaH sya maNiH tadA me muktvA ca sarva ABaraNAni mEtra citta anunIta aham adAt tadA asmE sa rAga cittena viDAya pUjAm suraSmi ketoH sugata Atmajasya arDa tRtIyAni SatAni nAgAm kalpa uttamAyAm Kalu jAtu apAyAn devezu devendra kulezu jAtA narendra putrI manujezu ca aham ananta varNena samucCrayeNa sarvatra ca AdAt saha darSanam me arDa tRtIyezu gatezu kalpa Satezu jAtA asmi aBayaMkarANAm sudarSanAyAH gaNikA uttamAyAH saMcAlita AKyA duhitA tadAnIm dRzwvA aTa tejoDi patim kumAram pUjA m akArzam muditA aham asya AtmAnam asya eva nivedayitvA BUtA asmi vaSyA Kalu tasya BAryA saMpUjitaH tena mayA saha aBUt sa sUrya gAtra pravaraH mahA RziH prasannayA ca eva tamIkzya budDam utpAditam me vara boDi cittam pUrNA jinAnAm Kalu zazwi kowyaH tatra eva kalpe su samutTitAnAm gv baBUva tezAm caramaH jinAnAm budDaH tadAnIm aDimukti tejAH tasmin viSudDam mama Darma cakzuH Darma svaBAvaH ca mayA avabudDaH ayoniSas tyanta vikalpa SAntA labDa avaBAsa asmi aBavam tatas rvAk samADi BUmim ca vilokayAmi tatas praBRti eva jinOrasAnAm kzetra arNava an ekamanaH kzaNena cintA vyatItAn= ca diSAmi dikzu nAnA viSudDAni ca sarva dikzu kzetrANi paSyAmi amita adButAni dRzwvA manaH tezu na sajjate me klizwezu na eva pratihanyate ca kzetrezu tezu eva ca boDimaNxe paSyAmi budDAn niKilezu aSezAn praBA samudrA n amitAn= ca tezAm ekena cittena vilokayAmi taTA eva tezAm ca parzad samudrAn= cit takzaNena avatarAmi asaFgAn tezAm samADIna KilAn avEmi sarvAn vimokzAn api ca aprameyAn caryAm ca tezAm vipulAm Daremi BUmInayAn= ca avatarAmi aSezAn praNiDya saMKyeya mahA samudrAn pratikzaNam ca avatarAmi anantAn saMprekzatI sat puruzasya kAyam kalpAn anantAn= caratI ca caryAm ekEka romnaH sya vikurvitAnAm na eva iha paryantam upEmi jAtu gv saMKyA vyatItAn api ca eva romni kzetra udaDIn api avalokayAmi sa mAruta skanDa mahA jala oGAn agni prapUrNAn pRTivI SarIrAn nAnA pratizWAna vikalpa rUpAn vicitra saMsTAna naya praveSAn nAnAviDAn DAtu SarIra BedEH ananta maDya akRta vigrahAn= ca kzetra udaDizu amitezu alApyAn DAtUn pRTak yAn avalokayAmi Darma aBiDAnEH janatAm vinItAm tezu eva paSyAmi jinAn prayuktAn na kAya karma asya mayA avabudDam na vA agna cittam na tayoH ca karma RdDiH na na eva asya pRTak vikurvA kalpAn= carantyAH vipulAm sucaryAm aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH gopAyAH SAkya kanyAyAH pAdO SirasA aBivandya gopAm SAkya kanyAm aneka Sata sahasra kRtvas pradakziNIkRtya punar punar avalokya gopAyAH SAkya kanyAyA antikAt prakrAntaH gv mAyA aTa Kalu suDanasya SrezWi dArakasya mAyAyAH devyAH sakASam gamana aBimuKasya budDa gocara vicAra jQAna pratipannasya etat aBavat  kena upAyena mayA Sakyam sarva loka uccalita zaz AyatanAnAm apratizWitAnAm kalyANa mitrANAm sarva saFga samatikrAnta kAyAnAm asaFga gati gAminI pratipadA pratipannAnAm Darma kAya su viSudDAnAm kAya karma mAyA su nirmita SarIrANAm jQAna mAyA gata loka vicArANAm praNiDi rUpa kAyAnAm budDa aDizWAna manaH maya SarIrANAm anutpanna anirudDa kAya anAm asatyAmRzakAyAnAm asaMkrAnta vinazwa kAyAnAm asaMBava aviBava k alakzaNa eka lakzaNa kAyAnAm advaya saMFga vinirmukta kAyAnAm anAlaya nilaya kAyAnAm anakzata kAyAnAm pratiBAsa sama nirvikalpa kAyAnAm svapna sama vicAra kAyAnAm AdarSa maNxala sama sadRSa AkrAnta kAyAnAm diS sama praSAnta pratizWa kAyAnAm sarva diS sParaNa nirmANa kAyAnAm tri aDva asaMBinna kAya anAm aSarIra citta nirvikalpa kAyAnAm sarva loka cakzuzpaTa samatikrAnta kAyAnAm samantaBadra cakzuH prasara vijQeya vinaya kAyAnAm asaFga gagana gocarANAm kalyANa mitrANAm darSanam ArAgayitum saMmuKIBAvatAm anuprAptum samavaDAnam ca Aptum nimittam ca udgrahItum Goza maNxalam vA vijQAtum mantra vyavacArAn vA AjQAtum anuSAsanIm ca column1: bahu kalpa sAgara caranti jagat hita arTA tezAm vihAru ayu sarva guNa AkarANAm ye eki vAla paTi uttaramAna kzetrAt budDAn= ca sattva taTa kalpa ananta maDyAn praviSanti enta na punA ca upenti sImAm tezAm asaFga naya nAna mayam vihAraH ye ekacitta kzaNi kalpa mahA samudrAn praviSanti kzetra taTa budDa jagat pracArAn tezAm anAvaraNa jQAnam ati sTitAnAm ezaH vihAra guNa pAramitA udgatAnAm gv ye sarva kzetra paramANu rajAn gaNitvA bindu pramANa tulayitva jala oGa sarvam tAvat pramANa praNiDIn aBinirharanti tezAm asaFgata gatAnamayam vihAraH praNiDAna DAraNi samADi muKa praveSAn DyAnAH vimokza praNiDAna muKAni ca eva aBinirharanti vicaranti ananta kalpAn iha te pravizwa sugatAna sutAH smRti imAH iha te sTitAH jinasutAH viviDAH vicitrAH aBinirharanti bahu SAstra kaTA arTa yuktAH sOKya AvahAni jagatAm iha Silpa sTAnAni anucintayanta viharanti satAm vihAraH iha te sTitAH mahaaBijQa OpAya jQAne yAvanta sattva gati Beda daSat diSAsu sarvatra janma cyuti Beda vidarSayanti mAyA gate sTita vimokza asaFga caryAH iha te sTitA praTama citta samudBava AdyAm darSenti Darma caryAm vasu Darma nizWAm ApUrya nirmita GanEH api DarmaDAtum evam vikurvita SatAni upadarSayanti ye ekacitta prasareNa vibudDa boDim praviSanti jQAnam ati karma ananta maDyA saMmohaketu avraji loku yaH cintayAnaH evam durAsada gatAnamayam vihAraH ezaH asaFga matinAm anAvaraNa Darma DAtu caraNAnAm anilamBa gocarANAm vihAru vimala ASaya matInAm ye te asaFga cArI aniketa vihAri sarva kzetrezu advaya jQAna vihArI ayu teza vihAru asamAnAm Ka prakRti samAn ye ete Darma AnanAlayAn SAntAn viharanti gagana gocara tezayam AvAsu virajAnAm iha te kRpA Saya matI sTitvA jagadIkzya duHKa Soka hatam loka hita cintana parAH viharanti mahakaruNa lABI gv iha te ananta rahitAH dRSyante sarva sattva Bavanezu SaSi sUrya maNxala samADi mukta saMsAra pASeByaH iha te sTitAH jinasutAH sarva jinAnAm ca pAda mUlezu dRSyanti sarva kzetrezu ananta kalpAn kzapayamANAH iha te jagat aNxa samEH sarva jinasuta ASraya pramANEH ca sarva diSaH nava SezAH sParanti nirmANa meGeBiH iha te pravizwa SUrAH sarvam jina gocaram tulayamAnA viharanti kalpana yutAn na ca api tRptim samupayAnti iha te samADina yuta anaBilApyAni pratikzaNam budDyA
column2: bdag gis rgyal ba rgya mtsho de dag mchod //

column1: darSenti budDa vizayam yaTA samADi praveSena iha te kzaNa avalambA kalpa kzetrANi budDa nAmAni praviSanti vipula budDI kalpAn kzapayanti aparimANAn iha te sTita aprameya AkalpAn praviSanti ekacittena parikalpa saMjQa vigatAH jagataH saMjQA vaSa gatena iha te samADi Bavana pratizWa paSyanti trayaH DvAnaH eka kzaNa kowi prAptAH vimokza Bavane vicaramANAH iha te sTitAH vihAre paryaFka nizaNNa anuccalita kAyAH sarvezu kzetrezu yugapad dRSyanti sarva gatAH iha viharantaH vRzaBI Darma samudrAt pibanti sugatAnAm avatIrNa jQAna sAgaram akzaya guNa pAramitA prAptAH iha sarva kzetra saMKyAm kalpAnAm ca eva Darma saMKyAm ca sarva jinAnAm saMKyAm cintenti anAvaraNa cintI iha te sTitAH jinasutAH yAvat kzetra astriyaDva saMKyAtAH eka kzaNena tezAm saMBava viBavam vicinvanti iha te sTitAH jinAnAm caryAm praNiDim ca indriyam jagatAm paSyanta samatAyaH jinasuta Bavane vicaramANAH eka raja agra gatAn ye sarva raja samAnana AvaraNa asyAm paSyanti parza sAgara kzetrAn sattvAni kalpAn= ca sarva raja agrezu evam pariza kzetrANi sattva kalpAn= ca pratiBAsa gatAn sarvAn suviBaktAn saMprapaSyanti gv iha te Darma svaBAvam sarva kzetra aDva kalpa saMbudDAn BAva svaBAva vigatAn asaMBavanayEH vicinvanti sTitvA iha sattva sama tAm Darmezu budDa sama tAm ca prekzya tri aDvani kzetra sama tAm praNiDAna sama tAm ca praviSanti vinayanti sattvana yutAn anye mahayanti budDana yutAni vimRzanti apare DarmAn iha te Bavana vare sTitAH DIrAH kalpana yutEH na yezAm praNiDAna jQAna vizayam ati kalpAH SakyAH mayA hi vaktum vistIrNaH nantu budDInAm tezAm aninditAnAm anAvaraNa gocaram ca niratAnAm AvAsam vande ham kRta karaNa koSaH praNata kAyaH tam api jina jyezWa sutam nirAvaraNa caryam Arya mEtreyan nirupama viSudDa budDim tadanu smRtimAm praNipatAmi iti hi su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH vErocana vyUha alaMkAra garBa mahA kUwa AgAra nivAsinaH boDisattvAn evam ca apramANEH boDisattva stavEH aBizwutya vanditvA namaskRtya praNipatya udvIkza citrIkRtya AmuKIBUya aBisaMpUjya vErocana vyUha alaMkAra garBasya mahA kUwa AgArasya mUle tizWan mEtreyasya boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya darSanam aBilazamANaH mEtreyasya boDisattvasya samavaDAnam AkAFkzamANaH saH drAkzIt mEtreyam boDisattvam bahirDA kUwAgArasya anyatamasmAt pradeSAt AgacCantam aneka prANi Sata sahasra parivAram aneka deva nAgayak vAma dakziNAByAm Sakra brahma lokapAlEH namasyamAnam janma BUmikEH ca bahuBiH jQAti saMbanDiBiH brAhmaNa Sata sahasrEH parivRtam puraskRtam vErocana vyUha alaMkAra garBa kUwa AgAra aBimuKam AgacCantam dRzwvA ca tuzwaH udagre Atta manAH pramuditaH prIti sOmanasya jAtaH yena mEtreyaH boDisattvaH tena aBimuKaH BUtvA dUratas eva mEtreyasya bsarva SarIreNa praNipatitaH aTa Kalu mEtreyaH boDisattvaH suDanam SrezWi dArakam vyavalokya sarva parzadaH dakziNena hastena upadarSya BUtEH guNEH saMvarNayan gAT paSyaTemu su viSudDaa ASayam sUDanam dRXa DanAnaH Atmajam ezam ANu vara boDi cArikAm AgataH mama samIpi paNxitaH svAgatam ti kRpa mEtra saMBava svAgatam vipula mEtra maNxalA svAgatam praSama SAnti locana mA kilAmi asi carantu cArikAm gv ehi svAgatu viSudDaA ASayAH ehi svAgatam aKinna mAnasA ehi svAgata malIna EndriyAH mA kilAmyAsi carantu sUrata sarva Darma vicarAya utTitA sarva sattva vinayAya utsukA sarva mitra BajanAya prasTitA svAgatam ti acalA dRXa vratA svAgatam SuBa paTena AgatA svAgatam guNa paTe pratizWitA svAgatam jinapaTena prasTitA mA Sramam kila samarTasva kvacid ehi svAgatu guNezu tat mayA svAgatam ti kuSala aniBi syandita sADu svAgatam ananta gocarAH darSanam tava su durlaBam jage lABa alABa sama tulya mAnasA ninda duHKa ayaSaH vivarjitA loka Darmi kamala utpala upamA sADu svAgatam aBra anta mAnasA mAya SAWya vigatA SuBa ASaya mAna darpa vigatA suBAjana kroDa roza vigatAH anunnata sADu te darSanam sudarSanam ehi sarva diSa gocarA muKAH ehi sarva diSa koSa saMBavA ehi sarva jina koSa varDanA svAgatam ti akila anta mAnasA ehi svAgatu triyaDva gocarA DarmaDAtuaDimukti maNxalA sarva budDa guNa garBa saMBavA svAgatam ti akila anta sUrata gv ehi maQju Siri jQAna paFkajaH ehi meGa Siri toya varDita ehi sarva jinaputra prezita darSayAmi ti anAvRtAm diSam paSyaTa praNiDi jAlu kIdRSam DarmaDAtu sParaNam acintiyam boDisattva cari mArga karzaNam vistarantu suDanaH iha AgataH ezam ANu sugatAna gocaram mArgamANu virajAna cArikAm pRcCamAna praNiDAna sAgaram AgataH ayam aKinna mAnasaH
column2: bskal pa sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed po //

column1: yatra SikzitaH atIta nAyakAH Sikzizenti taTa ye anAgatAH tizWatAm ca sugatAna yA carI pRcCamANu ayu tAm iha AgataH eti mitra mama Darma BANakAH sarva Darma pratipatti deSakAH boDisattva cari mArga deSakAH eva citta ayam AgataH iha boDisattva mama budDi varDikAH budDa putra mama boDi dAyakAH eti mitra mama budDa varNitAH eva citta kuSalaH iha AgataH mAtR BUta jana kAyime mama DAtri BUta guNa stanya dAyakAH boDiaFga paripAlakAH sadA eti mitra ahitAn nivArakAH vEdya BUta jara mRtyu mocakAH Sakra BUta amRta aBivarzikAH candra BUta SuBa pUrNa maNxalAH sUrya BUta Siva mArga darSakAH gv meru BUta sama mitra Satruzu sAgara upama akzoBya cetasaH karNaDAra paripAlaka upamAH eva cinti suDanaH iha AgataH SUra BUta aBaya pradAyakAH sArTavAha SaraNam parAyaNam
column2: de dag tu ni rgyal ba gang byung ba //

column1: nAyakAH mama suKaMdadAH ime eva citta ayu mitra sevate sarva Darma diSasu darSakAH sadA sarva budDa guNa jQAna darSakAH sarva durgatia pAya SoDakAH eti mitra mama sADu darSakAH eti sarva jina koSa dAyakAH eti sarva jina gaQja rakzakAH eti sarva jina guhya DArakAH eva mitra Bajateza paNxitaH jQAna saMpada atas viSuDyate rUpa Boga kula janma saMpadaH atas na durlaBAH evam ASaya ayam iha AgataH paSyaTAH ayam udAraa ASayaH sevamAnaH ima mitra paNxitaH yAdRSIm pratijana iti sUrataH eva yUyam anuSikzaTaH sadA eza pUrva SuBa puNya hetunA dRzwa maQju Siri boDi prasTitaH anuSAsti ayu tasya kurvataH paSyaTA kaTam awatya KedavAn eza sarva suKa sOKyaH ujJiyaH utsRjitva amara upamam gRham DAtri mAtR pitR Boga vistaram dAsa BUtaH ima mitra sevate gv ezaH ASaya viSoDya paNxitaH sva ASrayam jahiya mAnuzam imam sarva budDa Bavanam pravekzyate IdRSam Palam atas Bavizyati eza dRzwva jana vyADi pIxitAn prANinaH duKa SatEH upadrutAn janma mRtyu Baya Soka tApinaH tezu arTi carate kRpA ASayaH duHKa yantra paripIxitam jagat dRzwva paQcagati cakra maNxale jQAna vajram ayam ezate dRXam duHKa yantra gati cakra Bedanam rAga doza tRNaTa aNu kaNwakam dRzwi saFga bahukam kzata aFkuram sattva kzetra pariSoDana arTikaH prajQa lAFgala dRXam gavezate moha vidya gahana ASayam jagat prajQacakzu hata nazwa dESikam tasya kzema diSa darSana praBuH sArTavAhu jagataH Bavizyati
column2: bde gshegs de dag thams cad bdag gis mchod //

column1: kzAnti Darma trivimokza vAhanaH jQAna KaFga ripu kleSa DarzakaH SUra BUta aBayasya dAyakaH deSikaH hi jagatAm Bavizyati DarmanAva samudAnayati ayam jQAna sAgara paTe su SikzitaH SANti ratna vara dvIpa nAyakaH karNaDAra tri Bava arNave ayam jQAna raSmi praNiDAna maNxalaH sarva sattva Buvana avaBAsanaH gv DarmaDAtu gagane mahA praBaH budDa sUrya samudezyate ayam mEtra candana samAna SItalaH sarva sattva samacitta su praBaH Sukla Darma paripUrNa maNxalaH budDacandra samudezyate ayam ASaye dRXa tala pratizWitaH boDicarya anupUrvaH udgataH sarva Darma ratana AkaraH hi ayam jQAna sAgara varaH Bavizyati boDi citta Bujaga indra saMBavaH DarmaDAtu gagane samudgataH Darma meGa yugapad pravarzaNe sarva Sukla Pala sasya varDanam SudDa varti tri malam tamaH haram mEtra sneha smRti BAjanam dRXam boDi citta vimala agni su praBam Darma dIpa mayu jAlayizyati boDi citta kalalaH kRpA arbudaH mEtra peSi raNvanASayaH GanaH boDiaFga anupUrva saMBavaH budDa garBu ayu saMpravarDate pUnya garBam aBivarDayizyati jQAna garBam api SoDayizyati jQAna garBu samuddiSyate ayam yAdRSaH praNiDi garBa saMBavaH IdRSaH karuNa mEtra varmitaH sattva mocana matI hita ASayaH durlaBaH jagi sa deva mAnuze yAdRSaH ayu viSudDa mAnasaH gv IdRSa ASaya sumUla saMsTitaH IdRSaH dRXa prayoga varDitaH IdRSaH tri Bava CAdana praBaH jQAna vRkza Pala daH su durlaBaH ezA guNa saMBavana arTikaH sarva Darma paripRcCana arTikaH sarva saMSaya vidAraNa arTikaH sarva mitra Bajate atandritaH eza mArakali kleSa sUdanaH eza dRzwi mala tRzNa SoDanaH eza sarva jagama ukzaNa udyataH eza te sat aviSeza paNxitaH eza durgati viSoDayizyati eza svargam upadarSayizyati mokza mArgam upanezyate jagat yAdRSe guNa paTe pratizWitaH eza sarva gati duHKa mocakaH eza sarva gati sOKya dAyakaH eza sarva Bava pASa CedanaH Bezyate Bava gatI nizUdanaH dRzwi saMkawa vimocayizyati tRzNa jAlalata Cedayizyati
column2: rnam par thar ba'i tshul ni 'di la zhugs //

column1: nandirAgam upaSoDayizyati Bezyate tRBava mArga darSakaH eza loka SaraNam parAyaNam eza sarva jagati praBAkaraH nAyakaH triBuvane Bavizyati sarvatas Bava viBAva kovidaH kleSa supta janatA viSoDakaH kAma paFka taru tArakaH viduH saMjQa sakta parimocakaH ayam banDa mokza karaNaH Bavizyati gv DarmaDAtu tala Beda BAsanaH lokaDAtu tala Beda SoDanaH sarva Darma tala Beda pAragaH Bezyase suDana prItimAn Bava yAdRSam tava prayoga sUrataH SradDa yAdRSa tavAH aninditaH yAdRSaH ca guNavAn= tava ASayaH sarve Apa paripUrayizyati sarva budDa nacireNa drakzyasi sarva kzetra nacireNa yAsyasi sarva Darma nacireNa jQAsyasi tAdRSam ti SuBam AtmanA kRtam kzetrasAgara viSoDayizyase sattva sAgara vimocayizyasi carya sAgara prapUrayizyasi tAdRSaH  pratipatti sAgaraH tvam Bavizyasi guNAn BAjanam tvam Bavizyasi SuBAnaH saMBavaH tvam Bavizyasi jinOrasEH samaH yAdRSam ti aDimukti maNxalam mAra maNxala parAjitam tvayA karma maNxala viSoDitam ca te kleSa maNxala viSoDitam tvayA yAdRSam ti praNiDAna maNxalam jQAna vartani viSoDayizyase Darma vartani praBAvayizyasi karma kleSa duKa yantra varta nim na UcireNa vinivartayizyasi loka cakra Bava cakram ASritam paQcagaNxa gati cakra mohitam gv sarva sattva duKa cakra= Cedanam Darma cakra taru vartayizyasi budDa vaMSam anuDArayizyasi Darma vaMSa pariSoDayizyasi saMGa vaMSa parikarzayizyase ratna saMBava karaH Bavizyasi tRzNa jAla vinivartayizyase dRzwi jAla gahanam taTA eva ca duHKa jAla jagu mocayizyase tAdRSaH praNiDijAlu SoDitaH sattva DAtu paripAcayizyase lokaDAtu pariSoDayizyasi jQAna DAtum utTApayizyase ASayasya tava DAtu tAdRSaH sarva sattva hita prIti nandanaH boDisattva kula vaMSa nandanaH sarva budDa praNiDAna nandanaH Bezyase suDana nandivarDanaH sarva sattva gati vAsa darSanaH sarva kzetra pratiBAsa darSanaH sarva Darma avaBAsa darSanaH tvam Bavizyasi jinaH sudarSanaH Darma DAtua vaBAsana praBaH sarva durgati SamaMkara praBaH Bezyase tri Bava duHKa SaMkaraH svarga dvAram upadarSayizyase budDadvAru vivarizyase jage mokza dvAram upanezyase jagat dvAru tAdRSu viSoDitam tvayA miTya mArga vinivartayizyase Arya mArga janatAm vinezyasi gv boDimArga taTa tvam anudDataH mArgase dRXa mate atandritaH tvam Bava arNava gatAna dehinAm duHKa pAra gamanAya utsukam tArayizyasi jagat Bava arNavAt tAdRSam Bava mahA guNa arNavaH kleSa sAgara viSozya dehinAm jQAna sUrya vara raSmi sAgarEH tAn niveSya pratipatti sAgare jQAna sAgara pratizWapezyasi budDi sAgara vivarDayizyasi caryasAgara viSoDayizyasi sarva budDa praNiDAna sAgaram na UcireNa avagAhayizyasi kzetra sAgara bahu pravekzyasi drakzyase parizasAgarAn bahUn budDi sAgara balena paNxitaH budDa meGana yutAni drakzyase pUja meGa vipulAm karizyasi Darma meGana yutAni Srozyasi tAdRSA praNiDi meGa kurvasi sarva sattva BavanA sParizyase sarva kzetra BavanAni yAsyasi sarva budDa Bavanam pravekzyase tAdRSAya diSAya prasTitaH tvam samADi Bavanam pravekzyase tvam vimokza BavanAni lapsyase DarmaDAtu Bavana pratizWitaH sarva sattva Bavane udezyase candra sUrya pratiBAsa sAdRSaH gv udgamizyasi jinAna saMmuKam tAdRSaH tava mahA paTa udgamaH tvam carizyasi nataH su gocare sarva lokaa niketa gocare tvam Bavizyasi praSAnta gocaraH tAdRSaH tava aBijQa gocaraH indrajAla tala Bedane viduH kzetra jAla tala Beda yAvataH na UcireNa sParam ANu paSyase mArutaH va gagane asaFgavAn DarmaDAtu prasaram pravekzyase lokaDAtu prasarAn gamizyase sarva budDa prasarAn= triyaDvagAn drakzyase suDana prIti vindahi mA eva Keda janayAhi sUra tA tuzwi vindi vipulAm nirAmizam yena te imu vimokzu IdRSaH dRzwu paSyasi ca BUyu drakzyase tvam su BAjana guNAn sUDanA     jina anuSAstizu tvam samarTaH imu DAritum nayam tena paSyasi idam vikurvitam yeza kalpana yutEH su durlaBam darSanam kutu guNa praBAvana tehi dRzwaH carataH su cArikAm budDa putra aniketa gocarAH lABa BUya vipulA acintiyA svAgatam ca tava mAnuzaH Bava yena maQju Siri dRzwa saMmuKam IdRSam kRtu guNAn BAjanam sarva durgati paTAH vivarDitAH sarva akzaNaa pAya SoDakAH gv duHKa Darma tvayi sarve ujJitAH sarva Keda ca vivarjitA Bava bAla BUmi vinivartitA tvayA boDisattva guNa BUmi susTitaH jQAna BUmi paripUryaH uttamA budDa BUmi nacireNa lapsyase boDisattva cari sAgara upamA budDa jQAna viDi AkASa sAdRSam tad pramANa praNiDAna sAgarAH eza tAni Bava tuzwa mAnasaH IdRSaH apariKinna EndriyAH ASaya dRXa prayoga niScitAH ye Bajanti ima mitraH IdRSAH te Bavanti nacireNa nAyakAH dRzwva sattva vinayaMga tA bahu boDisattva cari citra yAvat mA tu jAtu vimatim karizyase sarva Darma muKa boDicArikam puNya saMpada acintiyA tava arTa Darma guNa SradDa saMpadaH yena saMpadaH imA tvam IdRSI budDa putraH iha adya paSyasi paSya lABa tava kIdRSaH mahAn paSyataH jinasutA nirantaram darSayanti praNiDI sva ka svakAn= tvam ca tAn aKilataH nugacCasi
column2: rnam par thar pa'i tshul 'di sgom byed cing //

column1: durlaBA Bava SatEH api IdRSA boDisattva caritezu BAjanA tena caH jinasutAH nirantaram te vimokza naya darSayanti mAm kalpa kowina yutAni te janAH saMvasanti sugata AtmajEH saha gv te pi tezu na vidanti gocaram na Atma tEH hi guNa BAjanam kRtam
column2: bskal pa mtha' yas bdag gis sngon spyad kyi //

column1: tvam SRNozi ime IdRSam nayam paSyase ca su durlaBam jage boDisattva mahatAm vikurvitam sUDanAH Bava agra mAnasaH sarva budDa samanvAharanti te boDisattva tava saMgraha sTitAH tvam ca teza anuSAsani sTitaH sADu sUDana su jIvitam tava boDisattva kula Darmi vartase Sikzase jinasutAna tvam guNEH Bezyase sugata vaMSa varDanaH prIti vindahi udAra suDanA sarva budDa pitaraH tava asamA boDisattva tava sarvi BrAtaraH boDiaFga tava sarvi jQAtayaH tvam sujAtu sugatAnaH orasaH DarmarAja kula vaMSa DAriNaH boDisattva kula vaMSa varDanaH DarmarAjam acireNa lapsyase sUDanA tuzwa Bava prINita indriyaH
column2: khyod kyis thos nas nan tan myur gyis shig /

column1: sarva budDam aBizekam uttamam na UcireNa   lapsyase dButam Bezyase sama samEH jina OrasEH tAdRSaH Bava saBA gataH Bava yAdRSam vapati bIja yaH naraH tAdRSam laBati tasya saH Palam prIti vinda vipulAm acintiyAm eza te dya samanvAsayAmi aham gv cIrNa kalpana yutAna ye carI boDisattvana yutA acintiyA te pi saMpada laBanti na IdRSIm eka janmi pratilabDa yA tvayA sarvam etat iha muktitaH Palam ASayasya dRXa vIrya tAya ca yasya cArika Bavet iyam priyA saH Dareya suDanasya yA carI sarva carya praNiDAna saMBavA sarva Darma aDimukti saMBavA suDanaH eva samudAnitAH tvayA nityam eza hi viSeza cArikA yAtukA Bujaga cetana udBavAH tAtukaH Bavati vAri saMBavaH yAtukA praNiDi jQAna gocarastAtukA sParati boDicArikA eza Botu tava darSitaH tayA BadranAma cariyAya sUDana eta jQAtva sa kadAci Bezyate sevamAnaH iha mitra tad mayaH kAya kowi smara pUrvikA tvayA kAma hetu kzayitA nirarTakam adya boDiya mArgaNaH hi ayam kAya tarjatu vratena suvrataH kalpa kowi ati nAmitAH tvayA sarva duHKam anuBUtu saMskRte gaFgavAlika sama tA virAgi tAH budDaH no ca SrutaH IdRSaH nayaH saH idAni kzaNa labDa mAnuzaH budDa pAdu imu mitru IdRSAH SrUyate ca vara boDi cArikA viSudDi na Bavizyate kaTam gv anna pAna pariBoga ramaNIyAni vA gIta vAdya tUrya saMgIti viviDa rati krIxA ramaNIyAni vA paSyet udyAna ArAma tapaH vana ramaNIyAni vA vRkza nadI puzkiriNI parvata ramaNIyAni vA mAtA pitR mitra jQAti sa Alohita samavaDAna gatam vA AtmAnam saM mahA samudram vA paSyet sumerum vA parvata rAjAnam sarva deva BavanAni vA jambudvIpam vA anenaka yojana Sata sTitam vA AtmAnam saMjAnIte tat ca gRham vA avacarakam vA vipulam paSyet sarva guNa alaMkAra samavasRtam divasam eva saMjAnIte na rAtri dIrGam ca saMjAnIte na hrasvam na svapnaH iti saMjAnIte suKa upasTAnam ca AtmanaH paSyet sa prasrabDa kAya saMskAraH vigata styAnam idDaH sarva rati apakarzitaH vipula prIti suKa saMvedI dIrGam ca vipulam ca saMjAnIte divasam vA sapta aham vE arDa mAsam vA saMvatsaram vA varza Satam vA tatas vA uttari saMjAnIte prativibudDaH ca tat sarvam anusmaret evam eva su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH boDisattva aDizWAnena sarva tra eDAtuka svapna samavasaraNa jQAnena parItta saMjQA gata nirudDa cetA vipula mahat gatAn AvaraNa boDisattva saMjQA gata vihArI boDisattva vizaya anugataH cintya boDisattva naya praveSa anusRta budDiH tat sarva vyUha vikurvitam apaSyat saMjAnIte nuBavati vicArayati nimittIkaroti Alakzayati tatra ca sTitam AtmAnam saMjAnIte tat yaTA glAnaH puruzaH carame citta utpAde vartamAnaH upapatya Anantarya citte pratyupasTite karma Bave AmuKIBUte yaTA kRta karma upacayaviaSuBa karma pratyayena narakam vA paSyet tiryagyonim vA preta vizayam vA yama puruzAn vA dRXa praharaNa gRhItAn ruzitAn AkroSataH rudita AkroSita Sabdam ca nArakANAm SruNuyAt tAm ca kzAra nadIm paSyet tAn= ca kzura DArA parvatAn tAm ca kUwASAlmalIm tat ca asipatravanam paSyet tAn= ca mahA nara kAn AdIptAn gv saMprajvalita an eka jvAlIBUtAn tAH ca loha kumBIH paSyet tAH kAraNAH kAryamANAn tAn= ca vedanAm anuBUyamAnAn saMjAnIt tAni ca nErayikAni agni saMtApa duHKAni paSyet anuBavet SuBa karma upacayena vA deva Bavanam paSyet deva parzad apsaraH gaNam sarva vyUha alaMkArAn= ca paSyet udyAna vimAna nadI puzkariNI ratna parvata kalpavRkza pariBogAn vA paSyet anuBavet tad AyuH kAlam ca saMjAnIyAt  itas cyutaH tatra vA upapannaH nantarhitaH eva karma vizaya acintya tayA etAm kriyAm paSyet saMjAnIta anuBave evam eva su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH boDisattva karma vizaya acintya tayA tat sarva vyUha vikurvitam adrAkzIt tat yaTA BUta graha AvizwaH puruzaH viviDAni rupagatAni paSyati yat ca paripRcCate tat vyAkaroti evam eva su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH boDisattva jQAna aDizWAna balena tAn sarva vyUhAn adrAkzIt tat yaTA nAga Bavana pravizwaH puruzaH nAga saMjQA gata praveSena divasam vA sapta aham vE arDa mAsam vA mAsam vA saMvatsaram vA varza Sat nAga saMjQA gata utsRzwaH manuzya saMjQA gatena muhUrta mAtram paSyet evam eva su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH boDisattva saMjQA gata anusmRta budDiH tad mEtreyasya boDisattvasya aDizWAna vaSena tat muhUrtam bahUni kalsaMjAnIte sma tat yaTA asti sarva jagat varavyUha garBam nAma mahA brahmaNaH vimAnam tatra sarva tri sAhasra mahA sAhasraH lokaDAtuH ABAsam AgacCati pratiBAsa yogena sarva ArambaNa Ami SrIBUtaH evam eva su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH tAn sarvAn vyUhAn anyonya asaMkIrNAn sarva ArambaNezu pratiBAsa prAptaH tat yaTA kRtsnA Ayatana samApatti vihArI BikzuH ekaH dvitIyaH Sayane vA caMkrame vA nizadyAyAm vE utTitaH vA nizaNNaH vA yaTA kRtsna samApatti vizaya avatAreNa sarva lokam saMjAnIte paSyati anuBavati DyAyi viSeza acintya tAyE evam eva su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH tAn sarvAn vyUhAn yaTA vizaya avatAreNa paSyati saMjAnIte tat yaTA ganDarvanagarANAm sarva vyUha alaMkArAH gagana tale saMdRSyante na ca kasyacid AvaraNa tvAya kalpante tat yaTA yakza vimAna pravizwAni manuzya vimAnAni yakza vimAna antargatAni anyonya asaMBinnAni yaTAkAma vizaya pariSudDyA saMdRSyante tat yaTA mahA samudre sarvasya tri sAhasra mahA sAhasrasya lokaDAtoH pratiBAsa samudrAH saMdRSyante tat yaTA mAyA kAraH mantra vidyA ozaDi bala aDizWAnena sarva rUpa gatAni sarva kriyAH ca saMpaSyati evam eva su DanaH SrezWi dArakaH mEtreyasya boDisattvasya aDizWAna jQAna mAyA acintya pradeSena tAni sarva vyUha vikurvitAni adrAkzIt Darma jQAna mAyA bala aBinirhRtena boDisattva vaSita aDizWAna jQAna mAyA gatena

column1: aTa Kalu mEtreyaH boDisattvaH tad kUwa AgAram praviSya tad aDizWAnam avasRjya su Danam SrezWi dArakamacCawA Sabdam kRtvA etat avocata  uttkula putra ezA DarmANAm DarmatA avizWapana pratyupasTAna lakzaNAH kula putra sarva DarmAH boDisattva jQAna aDizWitAH evam svaBAva aparinizpannAH mAyA svapna pratiBAsA upamAH aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH tena AcCawA Sabdena tatas samADeH vyutTitaH tam mEtreyaH boDisattvaH Aha  dRzwA te kula putra boDisattva aDizWAna vikurvAH dRzwAH te boDisattva saMBAra bala nizyandAH dRzwA te boDisattva praNiDi jQAna viWapanA dRzwAH te boDisattva caryA samudAgamAH Srutam te boDisattva niryANa muKam dRzwA te budDa kzetra vyUhA pramANa tA dRzwAH gv te taTAgata praNiDi vESAradya vESezika tA anugatA te boDisattva vimokza acintya tA anuBUtam te boDisattva samADi prIti muKam suDanaH Aha  dRzwam Arya kalyANa mitra aDizWAnena kalyANa mitra praBAveNa api tu Kalu Arya kaH nAma eza vimokzaH mEtreyaH Aha  sarvatri aDvArambaNa jQAna praveSa asaMmoza smRti vyUha garBaH nAma kula putraH eza vimokzaH IdRSAnAm ca kula putra vimokzANAm anaBilApya anaBilApyAnAm eka jAti pratibadDaH boDisattvaH lABI suDanaH Aha  kva asO Arya vyUhaH gataH mEtreyaH boDisattvaH Aha  yatas eva AgataH suDanaH Aha  kutas AgataH mEtreyaH boDisattvaH Aha  boDisattva jQAna aDizWAna aBinirhArAt AgataH tatra eva aDizWAnena tizWati na kvacid gataH na AgataH na rASIBUtaH na saMcaya BUtaH na kUwasTaH na BAva sTaH na BAva sTitaH na deSa sTaH na pradeSa sTaH tat yaTA kula putra nAgAnAm meGa jAlam na kAyena cittena aByantarIBUtam na saMcaya sTitam na saMdRSyate nAga cetanA vaSena apramANAH vAri GArAH pramuQcati nAga vizaya acintya tayA evam eva kula putra te vyUhAH na aDyAtma gatAH na bahirDA gatAH na ca na saMdRSyante boDisattva aDizWAna vaSena tava ca suBAjana tayA tat yaTA kula putra mAyAkArasya sarva mAyA gata vizayam saMdarSayamAnasya mAyA na kutaScid AgacCanti na vigacCanti na kvacid saMkrAnti saMdRSyate ca mantra ozaDi balena evam eva kula putrate vyUhAH na kvacid gatAH na kutaScid AgatAH na kvacid rASIBUtAH saMdRSyante ca acintya boDisattva jQAna mAyAsu Sikzi tvAt pUrva praNiDAna aDizWAna jQAna vaSi tayA suDanaH AhaMkiyat dUrAt AryaH AgacCasi Aha  anAgata gatiMgataH kula putra boDisattvAnAm gatiH acalanA sTAna gatiH anAlayA niketa gatiH acyuti upapatti gatiH asTAna saMkrAnti gatiH acalana anutTAna gatiH anavekzA niketa gatiH akarma vipAka gatiH anutpAda aniroDa gatiH anucCeda aSASvata gatiH api tu kula putra mahA karuNA gatiH boDisattvAnAm vineya sattva avekzaNa tayA mahA mEtrI gatiH boDisattvAnAm duHKita sattva paritrANa tayA SIla gatiH boDisattvAnAm yaTA ASaya upapatti tayA praNiDAna gatiH boDisattvAnAm pUrva aDizWAnena aBijQA gatiH boDisattvAnAm sarva suKa saMdarSana tayA anaBisaMskAra gatiH boDisattvAnAm sarva taTAgata pAda mUlAnuccalana tayA anAyUha viyUha gatiH boDisattvAnAm kAya cittA saMpravaNa tayA prajQA upAya gatiH boDisattvAnAm sattva anuvartana tayA nirmANa saMdarSana gatiH boDisattvAnAm pratiBAsa pratibimba nirmita SarIra sama tayA api ca kula putra yadvat asi  kiyat dUrAt tvam AgacCasi iti aham asmin kula putraH AgacCAmi janma BUmeH mAladeByaH janapadeByaH kuwigrAmakAt tatra gopAlakaH nAma SrezWI tam budDa Darmezu pratizWApya janma BUmakAnAm ca manuzyANAm yaTA BAjana tayA Darmam deSayitvA mAtA pitR jQAti saMbanDinaH ca brAhmaNa gRmahAyAne samAdApya suDanaH Aha  katamA Arya boDisattvAnAm janma BUmiH Aha  daSa imAH kula putra boDisattvAnAm janma BUmayaH katamA daSa yat uta boDi citta utpAdaH boDisattvAnAm janma BUmiH boDisattva kula janaka aDyASayaH boDisattvAnAm janma BUmiH kalyANa mitra kule janayitAH BUmi pratizWAnam boDisattvAnAm janma BUmiH pAramitA Akule janakam praNiDAna aBinirhAraH boDisattvAnAm janma BUmiH anutpattika Darma kzAnti kule gu  janakO sarva Darma pratipattiH kula putra boDisattvAnAm janma BUmiH atIta anAgata pratyutpanna sarva taTAgata kule janayitrI janma BUmiH imAH kula putra boDisattvAnAm daSa janma BUmayaH prajQApAramitA kula putra boDisattvAnAm mAtA upAya kOSalyam pitA dAna pAramitA stanyam SIla pAramitA DAtrI kzAntI pAramitA BUzaNa alaMkAraH vIrya pAramitA saMvarDikA DyAna pAramitA caryA viSudDiH kalyANa mitrANi SikzA caryaH sarva boDi aFgAni sahAyAH sarva boDisattvAH BrAtaraH boDi cittam kulam pratipattiH kula DarmAH BUmi avasTAnam kzAnti pratilamBaH kula aBijAtiH praNiDAna aBinirhAraH kula vidyA lABaH caryA viSudDiH kula Darma anuvartana tA mahAyAna samAdApanA kula vaMSa avyavacCedaH aBizeka eka jAti pratibadDa tA DarmarAjezu putra tvam sarva taTAgata samudAgamaH kula vaMSa pariSudDiH evam hi kula putra boDisattvaH tikrAntaH Bavati bAla pRTagjana BUmim avakrAntaH Bavati boDisattva niyAmam saMBUtaH Bavati taTAgata kUle pratizWitaH Bavati taTAgata vaMSe avyavacCedAya pratipannaH Bavati tri ratna vaMSasya paripAlana aBiyuktaH Bavati boDisattva kulasya pariSudDaH Bavati jAti gotreNa anupakruzwaH Bavati varNa jAtyoH anavadyaH Bavati sarva jAtaH adozaH sa devake loke samArake sa brahmake sa SramaNa brAhmaNikAyAm prajAyAm kulInaH Bavati uttama budDa kula saMBUtaH mahA praNiDi garBa SarIraH evam kula jAti samRdDAH ca kula putra boDisattvAH pratiBAsa Ayatana sarva Darma parijQAta tvAt na vijugupsante sarva loka upapattizu nirmita upama sarva Bava upapatti parijQAta tvAt na saMkliSyante sarva Bava gati upapatti saMvAsezu nirAtma sarva budDa tvAt na pariKidyante sarva sattva paripAka vinayezu mahA mEtrI mahA karuNA SarIra tvAt na SrAmyanti sarva sattva anugrahezu svapna upama saMsAra aDimukta tvAt na paritrasanti sarva kalpa saMvAsezu mAyA mayam ca skanDa parijQAta tvAt na krAmyanti sarva janma cyuti maraNa saMdarSanena DarmaDAtu prakRtikatva Ayatana muci tvAn na kzaNyante sarva vizayezu marIci upama sarva saMjQA gata su BAvita tvAt na muhyanti sarva saMsAra gatizu mAyA upama sarva Darma vikrIxita tvAt anupaliptAH Bavanti sarva mAra vizayEH sarva kAya praBAvita tvAt avaQcanIyAH Bavanti sarva kleSEH upapatti vaSitA labDa tvAt gatiMgatAH Bavanti sarva gatizu saH ham kula putra sarva loka DAtu upapatti antargatena kAyena sarva jagat rUpa samEH bala viSezEH sarva sattva upamEH nirukti saMBedEH sarva jagat upamABiH nAmaDeya vimAtra tABiH sarva sattva aDi mukti samEH IryA paTEH sarva jagat vinaya pramANEH loka anuvartanEH sarva viSudDi samEH janma kula upapatti saMdarSanEH kriyA avatAra muKEH sarva sattva saMjQA anupraveSEH sarva boDisattva praNiDi nirmANa samEH Atma BAva saMdarSana praBAvanEH sarva DarmaDAtum sParitvA pUrva saBAga caritAnAm sattvAnAm pranazwa boDi cittAnAm paripAcana arTam jambudvIpe ca janma upapatti saMdarSana arTam iha dakziNApaTe mAladezu janapadezu kUwAgrAmake brAhmaNa kulezu upapannAnAm mAtR pitR jQAti saMbanDinAm vinaya arTam brAhmaNa kula jAti viSezeNa ca ezAm jAti aBimAnikA niraBimAna tAyE taTAgata kule saMjanana arTam iha upapannaH saH ham kula putraH iha dakziNApaTe anena upAyena yaTASayAnAm sattvAnAm yaTA vineyAnAm paripAka vinayam kurvan iha eva vErocana vyUha alaMkkUwAgAre gv prativasAmi itas ca aham cyutaH tuzita Bavane upapattim saMdarSayizyAmi yaTASaye sattva anuvartana tAyE tuzita kAyikAnAm ca sa BAga caritAnAm deva putrANAm paripAkAya sarva kAma DAtu samatikrAntAnAm boDisattva puNya jQAna nirmANa vyUha saMdarSana tAyE kAmarati tRzNA vinivartana tAyE sarva saMsAra anitya tva paridIpana tAyE vipatti paryavasAn a sarva deva upapatti saMdarSana tAyE cyavana AkAram nAma mahA jQAna Darma muKam eka jAti badDEH boDisattvEH sArDam saMgAyanAya saha paripAcitAnAm ca tatra upapatti saMgrahaNa tAyE SAkya muni saMprezitAnAm ca vineya kalAnAm praboDana tAyE kAle paripUrNa aBiprAya sarvajQa tAm aDigamizyAmi boDi prAptam ca mAm kula putra tvam punar api drakzyasi sArDam maQju SriyA kalyANa mitreNa api tu Kalu punar kula putra  gacCa tvam tam eva maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam

column1: upasaMkramya paripRcCa  kaTam boDisattvena boDisattva caryAyAm Sikzitavyam kaTam pratipattavyam kaTam samantaBadra caryA maNxalam avataritavyam kaTam aBinirhartavyam kaTam praNiDAtavyam kaTam vipulIkartavyam kaTam anusartavyam kaTam paryadAtavyam kaTam pravezwavyam kaTam paripUrayitavyam sa te kula putra kalyANa mitra saMdarSayizyati tat kasya hetoH sa kula putra boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANAm praNiDAna viSezaH saMvidyate yaH maQju SriyaH kumAra BUtasya vistIrNaH kula putra maQju SriyaH kumAra BUtasya caryA nihAram apramANaH maQju SriyaH kumAra BUtasya praNiDAna aBinirhAraH apratiprasrabDaH maQju SriyaH kumAra BUtasya sarva boDisattva guNa viSeza aBinir mAtA maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH budDa kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANAm avavAdakaH maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrANAm udyuktaH maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH sarva sattva DAtu paripAka vinayAya vistIrNa nAma cakraH maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH daSa diS sarva lokaDAtuzu kaTA puruzaH maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH naBilApyezu taTAgata parzat maxalezu saMvarNitaH maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH sarva taTAgatEH gamBIra Darma jQAna vihArI maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH sarva Darma yaTArTa darSI durAgata gocaraH maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH sarva vimokza nayezu avatIrNaH samantaBadra boDisattva caryAyAm sa te kula putra kalyANa mitra ajanakaH taTAgata kule saMvarDakaH sarva kuSala mUla anutTApakaH boDi saMBArANAm darSakaH BUta kalyANa mitrANAm samAdApakaH sarva guNezu avatArakaH mahA praNiDAna jAle pratizWApakaH sarva praNiDAna aBinirhArezu SrAvayitA sarva boDisattva guhyAnAm saMdarSakaH sarva boDisattva cintyatAyAH sa BAga caritaH pUrva janma saMvAsezu tasmAt tarhi tvam kula putra maQju SrI pAda mUla gataH eva mA parIttamanam utpAdaya mA pariKedam janaya sarva guNa anuSAsanI pratilamBezu tat kasya hetoH yAvanti tvayA suDana kalyANa mitrANi dRzwAni yAvanti caryA muKAni SrutAni yAvantaH vimokzanayAH avatIrNAH yAvantaH praNiDAna viSezAH avagAXAH sarvam maQju SriyaH kumAra BUtasya anuBAvaH DizWAnam ca drazwavyam

column1: sa ca maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH parama pAramitA prAptaH aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH mEtreyasya boDisattvasya pAdO SirAsA aBivandya mEtreyam boDisattvam mahAsattvam aneka Sata sahasra kRtvas pradakziNIkRtya punar punar avalokya mEtreyasya boDisattvasya antikAt prakrAntaH gv maQjuSrIH aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH daSa uttaram nagara Satam awitvA sumanA muKa diS pratyuddeSam gatvA atizWat maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam cintayan anuvilokayan maQju SriyaH kumAra BUtasya darSanam aBilazan prArTayamAnaH samavaDAnam AkAFkzamANaH aTa Kalu maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH daSa uttarAt yojana SatAt pANim prasArya sumanA muKa nagara sTitasya eva suDanasya SrezWi dArakasya mUrDni pratizWApya evam Aha  sADu sADu kula putra na Sakyam SradDA indriya virahitEH Kinna cittEH lIna cittEH anaByasta prayogEH pratyudAvartya vIryEH itvara guNa saMtuzwEH eka kuSala mUla tan kalyANa mitra aparigRzwItEH budDa asamanvAhRtEH iyam DarmatA jQAtum eza nayaH eza gocaraH eza vihAraH jQAtum vA avagAhayitum vA avataritum vE aDimoktum vA kalpayitum vA pratyavagantum vA pratilabD sa tam Darma kaTayA saMdarSayitvA samAdApya samuttejya saMpraharzayitvA asaMKyeya Darma muKa samanvAgatam kRtvA ananta jQAna mahA avaBAsa prAptam kRtvA aparyanta boDisattva DAraNI pratiBAna samADi aBijQa jQAna veSa Avizwam kRtvA samantaBadra caryA maNxale vatArayitvA sva deSe ca pratizWApya suDanasya SrezWi dArakasya antikAt prakrAntaH gv samantaBadra caryA praNiDAnam aTa Kalu suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH tri sAhasra mahA sAhasra loka DAtu paramANu rajaH sama kalyANa mitra paryupAsitaH sarvajQa tA saMBAra upacita cetAH sarva kalyANa mitrOvavAda anuSAsanIzu pradakziNa grAhitayA pratipannaH sarva kalyANa mitra ASaya sama tA prasRtaH sarva kalyANa mitra ArA gaNa AvirA gaNa budDiH sarva kalyANa mitrOvavAda anuSAsa nI naya samudra anugataH mahA karuNa ASaya sAgara saMBUta garBaH mahA mEtrI naya meGa sarva jagat virocanaH mahA prIti vega saMvarDita SarIraH vipula boDisattva vimokza praSAnta vihArI samanta suKa prasRta tyAga cakzuH sarva taTAgata guNa samudra pratipatti su paripUrNaH sarva taTAgata aDimukti paTa prasRtaH sarvajQa tA saMBAra vIrya vega vivarDitaH sarva boDisattva citta ASaya su pariNA amita budDiH sarvatri aDva taTA gata paraMpara avatIrNaH sarva budDa Darma naya sAgara anubudDaH sarva taTAgata Darma cakra naya sAgara anugataH sarva loka upapatti pratiBAsa saMdarSana gocaraH sarva boDisattva praNiDAna naya sAgara avatIrNaH sarva kalpa boDisattva caryA saMprasTitaH sarvajQa tA vizaya avaBAsa pratilabDaH sarva boDisattva indriya vivarDitaH sarvajQa tA mArga avaBAsa pratilabDaH sarva diS vitimira Aloka prAptaH sarva DarmaDAtu naya prasRta budDiH sarva kzetra naya avaBAsa saMjAtaH sarva sattva prasAra arTa kriyA pratisrotonugataH sarva AvaraNa prapAta parvata vikiraNaH na AvaraNa
